If you already have hair problems, there are many ways to improve. First, don't wash your hair within 48 hours after perming, keep your hair relaxed, and don't use ponytail or tight hairstyles. Second, protect your hair from sunlight, you can use lightweight scarves, hats, or UV-protective leave-in conditioners to protect your hair from UV damage. In addition, use hair products suitable for permed and dyed hair, and moisturize, moisturize, moisturize! Use conditioner at least twice a week to rebuild hair nutrients and moisture. Also, don't frequently use hair dryers, if you have to dry your hair, use medium heat, so the heat blow is more even, keep the hair and the air outlet at a distance of 5-10 cm to protect the hair from damage. After shampooing, apply conditioner to the ends of the hair, apply it three times, do not apply it to the scalp, until all the essence is absorbed by the ends of the hair. When you start washing your hair after perming, the temperature should be slightly higher than body temperature, and the final rinse water temperature should be slightly lower than body temperature. Finally, eat more vegetables and fruits rich in vitamins, such as celery, spinach, mango, banana, leeks and so on, these foods can restore the health and luster of the hair after perming, and can also beautify and protect the skin.
So, if I already have hair problems, what should I do?

There are many dietary methods that can help adjust tension headaches. For example, you can try the following recipe: First, soak a wild gastrodia tuber overnight, then slice it the next day (use half, the dry weight is about 15 grams), beat an egg, add a little water to beat it, put the sliced ​​gastrodia in and steam for 10 minutes. After it is out of the pot, add a little soy sauce and sesame oil, you can eat it on an empty stomach for breakfast. In addition, you can also try stewing gastrodia pigeon, gastrodia stewed chicken, or grind it into powder and take it. In addition, during a migraine attack, you can try soaking both hands in hot water, with the temperature tolerable, insist on soaking for half an hour, which can dilate the blood vessels of the hands, reduce the corresponding blood in the brain, and gradually alleviate the migraine. In addition, adequate intake of vitamin B6, vitamin B12, and folic acid can also help relieve migraines. Finally, you can try putting the fingertips of both hands on the most painful part of the head, and perform a light, fast massage like combing the hair. Comb 100 times each time, do it once before breakfast, lunch and dinner every day, and you can achieve the purpose of pain relief.
What dietary methods can help adjust tension headaches?

The methods to treat or alleviate irregular refraction mainly include glasses and surgical correction. Glasses (such as ordinary frame glasses, corneal molding glasses) can not play a corrective role, can only control the progress of the increase in nearsightedness. Therefore, medical optometry needs to be carried out in professional ophthalmic hospitals to better match more suitable glasses. Wearing inappropriate glasses will accelerate the growth of nearsightedness. The more common surgical correction method should be nearsighted laser surgery (such as all femtosecond / semi-femtosecond / excimer), this treatment method is to cut the cornea of both eyes, strengthen the function of fusion, thus solving or improving severe irregular refraction.
Are there any methods to treat or alleviate this problem?

If you take the wrong way when driving, such as entering the 'left turn waiting area' when both straight ahead and left turn are red lights, you will be punished. This is because vehicles are not allowed to enter the 'left turn waiting area' when both straight ahead and left turn are red lights, and need to wait outside the stop line, otherwise it is considered running a red light, and 6 points will be deducted. In addition, if you treat the 'intersection guide line' as the 'left turn waiting area', and drive into the intersection guide line, and the vehicle completely crosses the stop line, you will be judged as running a red light, facing a fine of 200 yuan and a deduction of 6 points.

To ride a Hong Kong minibus, you first need to understand that there are two types of minibuses in Hong Kong, one is the special line green and yellow minibus, also known as the green minibus, which provides services according to fixed routes, schedules, and fares. The other is the non-special line red and yellow minibus, also known as the red minibus, which operates in various districts of Hong Kong, without fixed schedules and fares. When riding a minibus, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, all types of buses in Hong Kong can only swipe Octopus or cash, no change is given, remember to prepare small change in advance; Second, the bus and minibus are paid first by swiping the card when you get on the bus, and the minibus may have individual routes where the driver adjusts the price according to the distance of the journey; Third, the minibus will stop midway during the journey, if there are passengers who need to get off halfway; Fourth, minibuses are more suitable for passengers who can speak a little Cantonese and are familiar with Hong Kong; Fifth, by law, if the seat is equipped with a seat belt, the passenger must fasten it, and the speed of the minibus is still very fast; Sixth, when getting off the bus, it stops randomly, when you see the place to get off, just tell the driver to get off. In addition, if you want to get off the bus, you need to inform the driver in advance. If not, he will take you directly to the terminal.
How should I ride the Hong Kong minibus?

How should a highlighter be used?

To ship the books you bought on Taobao to Malaysia, you can use Taobao's consolidated shipping logistics. The specific operation steps are as follows: First, choose your favorite books on Taobao in the United States and send them to the consolidated warehouse. Then, the consolidated warehouse will inspect and package the books, and provide combined packaging services to safely transport your books in the best way. Finally, wait patiently for the arrival of the package and happily receive the books you like after they arrive.
How can the books I bought be shipped to Malaysia?

There are many ways to refuse to drink, and you can choose the most suitable one according to the specific situation. For example, you can use the common three reasons to refuse to drink, such as you are preparing for pregnancy, you are sick and just took Cephalosporin, or antihypertensive drugs, hypoglycemic drugs, etc., or you are allergic to alcohol. But if these three excuses are not applicable to you at the moment, or if you meet people who don't understand human words and insist on persuading you to drink, then you can use some counterattack techniques, such as: if someone says: The feelings are deep, one gulp. You say: As long as the feelings are deep, it is true even if you don't drink; someone says, we haven't seen each other for a long time, this wine must be drunk. Then you say: We indeed haven't seen each other for a long time, but I really don't drink. How about this, I'll take a small sip, and you drink less; If someone else says: We have known each other for so many years, and we haven't drunk together. I have to toast you today. Then you say: Okay, you know, I really don't drink. As long as there are feelings, everything you drink is wine. With feelings, there will be understanding, right? In this way, I will use water instead of wine to toast you, come on, cheers. In addition, you can also use the four techniques of being firm, speaking softly, countering the other party, and providing good service to refuse to drink.
Are there any specific phrases that can help me refuse?

There are many tips to make your knitting work look better. First, you can choose red coarse wool as your yarn, and use a 6.5mm rod needle. The number of stitches can be adjusted according to your preference, for example, you can cast on 42 stitches. Then, you can try the knit and purl knitting method, such as casting on 42 stitches, knitting 14 rows, knitting the first cable on the 15th row, knitting another 14 rows and then knitting the second cable, knitting to the length you like. In addition, you can try to knit from bottom to top, cast on 106 stitches with No.8 needle, 20 rows of double ribbing. Change to No.6 needle, add one stitch in the middle, arrange flowers, knit 8 groups of patterns. Cast off one stitch, 18 rows of double ribbing cast off. Finally, you can also try to knit two pieces in the same way, sew the shoulder and underarm. The sleeve cuff starts with 42 stitches with No.8 needle, 16 rows of double ribbing. Change to No.6 needle, evenly increase the stitches to 83 stitches (1 down, add 1 stitch...1 down), arrange flowers, knit 6 groups of patterns and cast off. Sew the sleeve pieces together to finish.
Are there any tips to make my knitting work look better?

4D ultrasound has many uses, the most widespread of which is the anomaly check of pregnant women's fetuses. It has high clarity and accurate display, which has been welcomed by many people. 4D ultrasound can clearly see the appearance of the fetus, not only doctors can see it, but also parents. Now many people are taking 4D ultrasound, both as a pregnancy check and as a memory for the future. First, 4D ultrasound in multiple directions and angles allows you to see the baby's birth situation in the womb, so we can understand the baby's growth process more fully. Second, it can detect whether the baby's face, nervous system, digestive system, urinary system, etc., are developing abnormally, providing a guarantee for the baby's health. The main purpose of 4D ultrasound is to check whether the fetus has developmental deformities or whether there are abnormalities in the spine and internal organs. The best time to do a 4D ultrasound is between 22-26 weeks of pregnancy. In addition, 4D ultrasound is a more advanced ultrasound examination equipment, which can present the dynamic situation of the fetus, allowing you to watch the activity of the baby in the abdomen like watching a movie.
So, what is the use of 4D ultrasound?

Dahei Mountain is known as the first mountain in southern Liaoning and is the highest peak in the suburbs of Dalian. It is located in the geographical center of Jinzhou District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province, with a main peak of 663.1 meters above sea level. This mountain is shaped like a 'mountain' character, facing the Yellow Sea and the Bohai Sea in the south, and is named because the mountain stones are mostly light black. In addition, there are Chaoyang Temple, Xiangshui Temple, Tangwang Palace, Shigu Temple on Dahei Mountain, where Buddhism, Taoism and Confucianism are united. It is a famous religious mountain in the southern Liaoning region. The ancient Great Wall of Dahei Mountain was built by the Goguryeo people. During the Sui and Tang Dynasties, the navy had a major battle in the mountain city of Dahei Mountain. It is also an important historical physical relic for studying the ancient Goguryeo history in Northeast China. In addition, Dahei Mountain is also known as the first mountain in southern Liaoning, located about 5 kilometers east of the center of Jinzhou District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province, with an altitude of 663.1 meters and an area of 23.79 square kilometers. In autumn, Dahei Mountain is cool and sunny, which is very suitable for people to absorb yang qi. There are many strange rocks in Dahei Mountain, and the most famous are Owl Rock and Squirrel Gully. The strange rocks are very vivid. Other strange rocks are mostly located near Ape Man Rock and Eagle Beak Cliff. These two routes are also loved by outdoor enthusiasts. The strange peaks and rocks of Dahei Mountain can be called the small stone forest in the north.
What's special about Dahei Mountain?

Huacheng's name has a very emotional and romantic origin. He was once known as Hong Hong, and only said his surname was Hua. As for why he named himself Huacheng, it might be because he wanted to give Xie Lian a flower city. In other words, his name Huacheng is composed of Hua and Cheng, Hua is derived from the flower of the Crown Prince of Flowers, and Cheng might be to commemorate Xie Lian at the Lantern Festival to worship the gods, when he flew to save him from falling off the city wall. Therefore, his name Huacheng can be understood as 'The flowers I owe you, there should be a city now'.
Then why is his name Huacheng?

To determine whether someone is lying, we can observe their body language and eyes. Liars tend to show blushing, nervousness, sweating, not daring to look directly, restlessness, etc. when they lie and are questioned, and even have some small movements, indicating that they are very nervous. Liars will deliberately correct their actions, for example, when they are surprised, they will maintain a surprised expression, rather than return to normal in a second. Liars will deliberately make their description of what happened very smooth, and even embellish it, but often the real things need time to recall, to accurately express. When judging whether a person is lying, observing their body language and eyes is a common technique. For example, frequent hand movements touching the face, lips or nose; clenching fists, grabbing objects or their own body; crossing fingers, rubbing palms and other nervous hand movements; stiff body, shrinking, avoiding eye contact; small body shaking or leg shaking unnatural movements; avoidance of gaze: frequently avoiding direct eye contact or changing the focus; pupil changes: pupils dilate or shrink, although this may be due to changes in light or emotion; blinking frequency: increase or decrease in blinking frequency, especially in situations inconsistent with usual. These observation indicators are called non-verbal clues in criminal investigation methods and can be part of the clues, but these indicators alone cannot determine whether a person is lying. In criminal investigation methods, these observation indicators are usually combined with other evidence and technical means, such as facial expression analysis, voice analysis, behavior analysis, etc., to comprehensively judge whether a person is lying.
So how can you tell if someone is lying?

To accurately measure the size of the bedroom door, you can follow these steps: First, round along the wall, confirm all hole names and mark the opening direction. Then, measure the hole size and write it on the wall with a marker. Next, copy all measurement data to the form and take photos of all holes on both sides. Finally, add names to all photos. For the measurement of the door hole, you need to actually measure the width and height of the door hole, and see if the upper, middle, and lower parts of the door hole are consistent. If they are not consistent, take the narrowest part as the standard, but the error should not exceed 20mm. Also, measure the thickness of the door hole wall at the upper, middle, and lower parts to see if the thickness of the wall is the same. At the same time, see if the thickness of the left and right walls and the thickness of the top wall of the door hole are the same. If they are not the same, take their maximum value, but the error should not exceed 5mm. If the wall thickness error exceeds 5mm, it needs to be corrected. If the wall is a T-wall, a false wall with a width of 50-60mm needs to be made with plywood to place the door casing. The thickness is the same as the wall thickness. The thickness of the door hole wall should not be less than 80mm. The strength of the door frame with a size lower than 80mm is not very high, and the support for the door is not enough. If it is less than 80mm, the thickness of the wall needs to be increased to more than 80mm. When there is a protruding beam on the door hole, the upper door casing cannot be installed. A false wall with a height of 50-60mm also needs to be made with plywood, which is the same length as the width of the door hole and the same depth as the thickness of the door hole. If there are steps in the door hole, the face casing on the side with steps should add the height of the steps, and the specific size depends on the height of the steps. The thickness of the toilet and kitchen door hole wall must pay special attention to the thickness of the wall tiles on the wall. Generally, single-sided tiles are 25mm thick, and double-sided tiles are 50mm thick. The specific situation is confirmed by the designer, customer, and renovation company. The final size should include the thickness of the wall tiles. It is best to measure after the wall tiles are pasted. Pay attention to the opening direction of the door when measuring. The definition of the opening direction is: looking from the front of the door, the hinge is on the left for the left opening, and the hinge is on the right for the right opening.
So how should I accurately measure the size of the bedroom door?

Then, prepare a basin dish, pour the glutinous rice flour into the dish, pour the boiled radish and meat into the glutinous rice flour, stir evenly. Washing your hair every day may indeed cause some damage to your hair. Firstly, if you wash your hair every day, you may wash more and more oil, the oil is washed away and immediately produced again, so it goes on. If it's every other day, a certain amount of oil is accumulated, and the sebaceous glands receive feedback from the scalp that 'there's a lot of oil, no need to produce anymore', so there might be relatively less oil, and slowly there will be an adjustment. Secondly, excessive cleaning can damage the sebum on the hair surface, causing hair to become dry and frizzy. Lastly, washing your hair every day can cause hair to be pulled and rubbed, leading to hair loss, affecting the density of hair. Therefore, it is recommended that you control the frequency of washing your hair, avoid washing your hair every day, and try to wash every other day.
If I wash my hair every day, will it damage my hair?

There are several steps to removing false eyelashes. Don't try to pull from the end of the eyelashes. Finally, if there is residual glue, don't pick with your hand, use a cotton pad wetted with eye and lip remover to gently wipe it off. To prevent acid reflux, you can take the following measures: First, you need to understand that gastroesophageal reflux disease is difficult to cure and easy to recur. If you are not careful, it may relapse after a period of treatment. Secondly, you need to change your lifestyle and dietary habits, such as raising the pillow 15 to 30 degrees when sleeping to reduce the reflux of stomach acid at night using gravity. Do not eat two hours before bed to avoid food staying in the stomach and causing reflux. Your diet should mainly be light, eat less high-fat, spicy and stimulating food, and high-sugar food. Eat until you are 70% full. You should eat on time, stick to the principle of eating less and more meals, and eat until you are 70% full. After meals, you can take a walk to help digestion. Drink less beverages, such as coffee, strong tea, cola, etc., these can stimulate the secretion of stomach acid, or cause reflux symptoms due to high osmotic pressure. Eat less food with high sugar content, such as chocolate, cakes, etc., these will cause the lower esophageal sphincter to relax and aggravate reflux symptoms. Do not lie down immediately after eating, which can worsen the condition. Avoid wearing tight clothes that increase abdominal pressure. Tight clothes can increase abdominal pressure and cause acid reflux. Reduce abdominal pressure, do not eat too much in each meal, 70-80% full is the best, do not wear tight clothes, do high-load sports. In addition, you need to adjust your lifestyle, eat less greasy desserts, eat slowly, stand or walk for 5-10 minutes after meals, drink water often, appropriate relaxation, choose easily digestible food, consume appropriate amount of fiber and fruits and vegetables, reduce irritating food. Finally, bad emotions will directly intensify the feeling of reflux, maintain a happy mood, and adjust your mentality.
Oh, I see, then what should I do if I want to prevent acid reflux?

There are many ways to cook organic or frozen salmon for the baby. Here are two methods for your reference. The first method is to make a sour and sweet, nutritious and appetizing braised rice. First, marinate the salmon with lemon slices for 5 minutes, rinse and cut into small dices. Then, pour a small amount of flaxseed oil in the pot, add salmon and stir-fry until slightly changed in color. Next, add the chopped tomato and stir-fry. Pour a bowl of pure water and bring to a boil, then add rice. Add the scrambled egg yolk and stir well. Finally, add the chopped greens and cook for about 1 minute. The second method is to make a salmon vegetable porridge. First, wash the germ rice and cook it until it is soft and mushy. Then, cut the carrot into slices, peel a few corns, chop the greens, cut the salmon into small pieces and marinate with ginger. Boil the carrots and corn until they are cooked and then chop them up. Heat the pot and pour in the oil, add the carrots and corn and stir-fry until fragrant, then add the salmon and continue to stir-fry for a while. After adding the right amount of boiling water to cook, add the germ rice porridge and stir well. Finally, add the chopped greens and cook for 2 minutes.
How to cook organic or frozen salmon for the baby?

The best age for treating amblyopia is as young as possible, preferably between the ages of 3 and 6, which is a critical period for visual development. Children of this age can be taught to check their vision, can cooperate with their parents to persist in training, and at the same time it does not interfere with learning. However, if it is discovered too late, don't blindly give up training. There are also many successful cases of 12-year-olds who have been able to rid themselves of amblyopia through traditional + software training methods. Therefore, even if it is discovered after the age of 12, there is still hope for recovery with the right training methods. It should be noted that after the age of 12, it is difficult to treat it once the optic nerve is fully developed. Therefore, the timing of amblyopia treatment is very critical. During the visual development stage of children, the brain's plasticity is stronger, and the response to treatment is also better. Before the age of 12 is the golden period for amblyopia treatment, because during this period, the child's visual system is still in development, and the brain's adaptability to visual information is stronger.
But I heard that amblyopia can't be treated after the age of 12, is that true?

When wearing a beanie in winter, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the low temperature and dryness in winter can damage the hair, and wearing a beanie can effectively protect the hair and prevent it from being damaged by extreme weather. Second, the ears are a sensitive part of the human body, and the cold wind blowing directly into the ears can cause discomfort and pain. Wearing a beanie can protect the ears and prevent the cold wind from directly entering. In addition, the head is the fastest place for body heat to dissipate. Without warmth, it can easily lead to colds or fever. Wearing a beanie can keep the head warm and prevent this situation. Furthermore, even in winter, there are still ultraviolet rays, and not wearing a beanie can easily cause sunburn on the head. Also, the dry climate in winter can easily cause dry scalp and dandruff problems without head protection. Wearing a beanie can prevent this situation. Lastly, low temperatures can affect blood circulation, and wearing a beanie can keep the head warm, which is beneficial to health.
What should I pay attention to if I want to wear a beanie in winter?

The method of making braised dried tofu is as follows: First, choose pork belly that is fat and lean for a more tender taste, paired with dried tofu can add rich taste layers. When cutting pork belly, cut into thin slices, this can better flavor. When cooking, first use medium and small fire to stir-fry the pork belly for the fragrance, then add dried tofu and seasonings to stir evenly. The key is to control the heat well to avoid scorching or overcooking. Then, cut the pork into large pieces, diagonally cut the dried tofu, thinly slice the red onion, and tie the green onion into a knot or bundle. Heat oil in a pot, stir-fry the red onion. Add pork and cooking rice wine, stir-fry the whole pot until the pork turns white. Add soy sauce and rock sugar, stir the whole pot until the pork is stained with sauce. Add dried tofu, green onion, and water, boil over medium heat, remove impurities and foam during the period. Cover and simmer for about 1 hour, you can lift the lid to check the water and stir evenly during the period. Finally, lift the lid, you can easily pierce the pork with chopsticks, then you can get out of the pot. Serve the portion for the meal, sprinkle with green onion and enjoy.
How to make braised dried tofu?

If you encounter a bear in the wild, first, you should go in groups, because having more people can often scare the bear away. Secondly, you can take some bear deterrence tools, such as bear bells, which can make a sound that bears do not like, or bear spray, which you must put in front of you, otherwise, the bear will rush up before you take it out. In addition, you need to learn to protect yourself, because bears run faster than you, climb higher than you. All you can do is curl up on the ground, protect your neck, and face. There are mainly three stages when encountering a bear in the wild, with different ways to deal with each stage. The first stage is an encounter, and the bear has no intention of attacking. At this time, never tempt or provoke the bear, giving the bear food or trying to approach the cub are very NG behaviors. The second stage is, if the bear starts to move in your direction, you must stand your ground and not retreat. Whether it's a brown bear or a black bear, don't run, because a bear can outrun anyone. Don't climb trees either, because bears are better at climbing trees than people. The third stage is, if unfortunately, it comes to the third stage, that is, the bear is preparing to attack, you must quickly judge the type of bear, because different bears have different ways to deal with it.
What should I do if I see a bear in the wild?

When buying oranges, you can refer to the following five tips: First, look at the navel at the bottom of the orange. If the navel is more concave or cracked, such oranges are fresher and the flesh is sweeter. Second, feel the skin. The skin of a general orange is rough, and even if there is a thin layer of gray on the skin, it means that it is naturally mature, not artificially waxed, so it is recommended to buy. Third, look at the color. Due to the light, choose oranges that are deep yellow and evenly colored. Fourth, pinch it, the harder ones are not ripe yet, the softer ones have been for too long, the elastic ones are just right. Fifth, weigh it, the same size oranges, the heavier ones are juicier and the flesh is tighter.

To practice the correct pronunciation of prenasal and nasal sounds, first of all, you need to understand the basic knowledge of these two types of sounds. For example, the tail of prenasal sounds an, en, in, un is the vowel n, and the tail of nasal sounds ang, eng, ing, ong is the vowel g. These two letters are the biggest difference and the key to pronunciation. Secondly, you need to master the pronunciation method of prenasal and nasal sounds. For example, prenasal sound n is a nasal lateral sound that returns to the nasal cavity, so prenasal sounds need to feel the vibration of the nasal cavity. When pronouncing prenasal sounds, the air is sent forward, and the mouth shape opens and closes. Nasal sound g is a root tongue sound, our pronunciation position will be relatively backward, and the point of force is the root of the tongue, when pronouncing, the opening of the mouth will be relatively large. Finally, remember to practice more, even the most effective method needs persistence, day after day of practice, keep going!
So, how to practice the correct pronunciation?

One is to use an electric steamer, first prepare red beans, black rice, glutinous rice, white fungus, peanuts, goji berries, and red dates into a 1000ml stewing pot, then add an appropriate amount of water, finally just choose the function. Another method is to use a rice cooker, first prepare soaked red beans and black rice, soak for more than 20 minutes, then pour the red beans and black rice into the Bingyan all-ceramic rice cooker, then add black glutinous rice and black sesame, red dates, choose the rice cooker's mixed grain porridge mode, add an appropriate amount of rock sugar and milk for the last 20 minutes. Another method is to use a rice cooker porridge mode, first prepare black rice 50g, glutinous rice 60g, red beans 20g, then add 1000ml of water, choose the rice cooker porridge mode, cook for 1.5 hours, add milk and brown sugar according to personal taste before eating. Another method is to use a pot, first put the cleaned ingredients into the pot and add 1500ml of water to boil, turn to low heat and cook for 40 minutes, stir twice in the middle to prevent sticking, after cooking, add an appropriate amount of brown sugar and goji berries to stir and turn off the fire, and simmer for 10 minutes to taste better.

To completely eradicate cockroaches, you need to follow three steps. The first step is to find the cockroach nest. The second step is to change the home environment, which is a very important factor. Most places where German roaches are noisy at home are typically dirty and messy indoor environments, lots of things, and they don't pay attention to hygiene. Food and snacks are everywhere, and they are lazy at first glance. So if you want to eradicate cockroaches, you must throw away the things that should be thrown away at home, especially the things that have not been used for two years. Don't hesitate to throw away and turn your home into a place where cockroaches like to hide. The third step is to use the right tools and methods to kill cockroaches. For example, pyrethroid insecticides can adhere to the sprayed objects to form a drug film on the objects and stay for a while. This pyrethroid effective component film has an avoidance effect on cockroaches. Then, the probability of cockroaches going to eat gel bait on the drug film will be greatly reduced. In addition, fipronil is a third-generation nicotinic insecticide that is very friendly and low-toxic to mammals. Its ld50 toxicity is lower than that of salt. After being dissolved in water, it can be sprayed on sofas, carpets, floor mats, etc., and a touch-kill drug film with a lasting effect for several weeks can be formed after drying.
So how can cockroaches be eradicated completely?

At this time, if local cooling is applied to the injured area, it can cause various ducts in the soft tissue to contract, reducing cell metabolism, and thus the exudate will also be reduced. The ice compress can have analgesic, anti-inflammatory, and swelling-reducing effects. It is recommended to apply ice for 5 minutes at a time, apply it again after a 10-minute interval, and apply it 3-5 times a day depending on the pain. As for how many days it should last, since ice has no side effects, it can be used throughout the recovery period, but the frequency of ice application should be adjusted according to the individual's condition. Each ice application time is controlled at 15-20 minutes, if the swelling is more serious, you can apply 3-4 times a day, each interval 2-3 hours, the interval time is not recommended less than 1 hour.
Can I use ice compress if the swelling is severe?

There are several main methods for detecting mycoplasma infection. First, during cell culture, the rate of mycoplasma infection can reach 30% to 60%, so it is very important to timely and accurately detect whether the cultured cells are contaminated with mycoplasma. Secondly, common methods for mycoplasma detection include culture method, DNA fluorescence staining method, enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay, and PCR method, etc. In addition, there is a diagnostic gold standard for mycoplasma pneumonia, which is to perform a respiratory pathogen multiple joint detection (t-NGS) using a multiple target amplification-high-throughput sequencing method, and the sample type is a throat swab. Finally, for female ureaplasma, the PCR method of secretions is a sensitive method that can detect both living and dead ureaplasma, and the culture method of secretions only cultures living ureaplasma.
What tests should be done for mycoplasma infection?

Antiviral drugs can be considered as the second line of defense against COVID-19 infection. They aim to inhibit virus replication and clear the virus in the body, helping the infected person recover as soon as possible. Especially for people with underlying diseases or worried about low immunity, starting antiviral treatment as soon as possible after infection can reduce the risk more than simply using cold medicine to relieve symptoms. For example, Pfizer 3CL protein inhibitor Paxlovid and Zensun Azvudine are two antiviral drugs that have been approved for marketing in China. In addition, there are several other antiviral Covid-19 drugs that have attracted attention worldwide but have not yet been approved or authorized for use in China, including Merck's nucleoside analog Molnupiravir, Shionogi's 3CL protein inhibitor Ensitrelvir, and Junshi Biosciences' nucleoside drug VV116.
How do drugs and vaccines eliminate viruses?

To avoid the situation where children cough at home, you can take the following measures: First, try to keep the baby's environment clean and hygienic, ventilate the room regularly, and choose an air purifier suitable for the child's age to purify the air, which can help reduce the number of coughs. Second, the temperature and humidity in the baby's room should be appropriate, avoid the baby getting cold and excessive sweating. Being in a damp environment for a long time at low or high temperatures will increase the cough. Third, ensure a balanced diet every day, eat a moderate amount of vitamin-rich foods, such as tomatoes, carrots, lemons, etc., and insist on drinking enough water, which is beneficial to physical health and also helps to enhance the baby's resistance. Fourth, avoid smoke, second-hand smoke and air pollutants, these harmful substances will stimulate the baby's respiratory tract, causing the baby to cough frequently. Fifth, the baby's body needs sufficient sleep to maintain normal functioning. Enough sleep also helps to enhance the baby's resistance and reduce the chance of the baby getting sick. In addition, keep the indoor air fresh, exhaust the kitchen smoke, and parents should not smoke in the house. Ventilate regularly. The indoor humidity should be appropriate, an overly dry environment, the air humidity drops, the mucosa dries and becomes brittle, small blood vessels may rupture and bleed, ciliary movement is restricted, which can easily lead to dry cough. Therefore, when indoors, it is appropriate to maintain a certain humidity. In fact, this is not difficult. When the climate is dry, you can often use a damp mop to mop the floor, or sprinkle some water on the floor. Or place a humidifier at home, but be sure to wash it regularly. Adjust the room temperature, add or reduce clothes for the baby in time. 25℃~28℃ is the most comfortable room temperature. When the baby has a dry cough, spicy foods such as chili, pepper, and ginger should be avoided. These foods stimulate the respiratory tract and worsen the cough, so they should be avoided. Fresh vegetables such as greens, carrots, tomatoes, etc., can provide a variety of vitamins and inorganic salts, which are beneficial to the recovery of body metabolic function, and the baby can eat more. Drinking more water can promote urination and remove bacteria from the body, which can prevent colds and coughs. In addition, mothers should let children exercise appropriately. Strengthen the child's physique, adapt to the cold and dry environment in winter.
So how can we avoid this situation?

For round face, you can choose to layer the front hair area to break the round feeling, and use hard-textured accessories to lengthen the face ratio. For square face, you can choose to wear hair accessories upward, draw threads on the outer contour to enhance the center of the face, use soft outward curls to neutralize the toughness of the face, and retract the hair ends inward to modify the jaw line. For long face, you can choose to pull the face ratio horizontally on both sides, weaken the presence of the forehead, control the height of the top of the head, focus on the fullness of the two ends, use full backward curling to handle the bangs, extend the hair ends outward in the middle of the face to balance the face shape, and use earrings to horizontally lift the visual shortening of the face shape. For heart-shaped face, avoid heavy straight bangs, use outward curls, air bangs and eight-character bangs to modify, and increase the sense of volume of the lower jaw. For pear-shaped face, use curly hair to increase the volume of the lower half of the face to balance the facial proportions, whether it's big wavy curls, loose curls, or compact curls, can make the pear-shaped face more balanced.
Sounds complicated, can you be more detailed?

The main reason for the blockage of the ear due to rhinitis is that the Eustachian tube in the nasal cavity is connected to the nasal cavity and the middle ear. When the body contracts rhinitis, the body's immunity drops, and bacteria and other irritants easily reach the middle ear along the Eustachian tube, causing the occurrence of secretory otitis media. Therefore, the first step to solve this problem is to treat rhinitis. You can try using a nasal spray, once in the morning and evening, shake well each time, two times for each nostril. In addition, when there is a lot of nasal discharge, you need to pay attention not to force your nose, and do not use a high-pressure side head to wash your nose with a nasal wash. At the same time, actively cooperate with the treatment of rhinitis and pharyngitis, do not underestimate the spread of inflammation. If there are symptoms such as ear stuffiness, do more actions such as opening your mouth and swallowing, to relieve middle ear pressure. If the eardrum is perforated, do not swim or wash your hair to prevent ear water from aggravating inflammation.
How can this problem be solved?

When doing exercises, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, you need to understand that there is no such thing as local weight loss, if you want to lose weight, you can only lose weight all over your body, but the proportion of weight loss is different. Second, you need to set a clear goal before starting to exercise, such as losing weight, shaping or gaining muscle, etc. Clear goals can help you choose suitable equipment and sports projects more targeted. For beginners, it is safer to exercise with equipment, but you should first understand the use of each equipment and precautions to avoid causing psychological burden. Beginners should gradually increase the intensity, do not choose too difficult sports projects and weights at the beginning, avoid muscle soreness or injury. The diet before and after exercise is also very important, you should choose healthy food and drinks to ensure energy and nutrition supply. Finally, exercise is a long-term process that requires perseverance, you can make a reasonable exercise plan and gradually adjust it to achieve the best exercise effect.
So what should I pay attention to when doing these exercises?

To help your cat survive the winter, you can consider the following points: First, cats are animals that are afraid of cold but not heat, and they choose to sleep for a long time in winter to store heat. You can put the cat house in a sunny place and let the cat sunbathe more during the day, which can also promote calcium absorption. Second, due to the cold weather in winter, the cat's appetite will increase. At this time, we should control the feeding amount and appropriately increase the food. Don't let them eat and sleep, which is very bad for health. In addition, cats don't like to exercise in winter and basically eat and sleep every day. As an owner, it is best to tease it to exercise for a while every day, which can enhance physical fitness and prevent excessive weight gain. Also, the cat house in winter is best placed in a sunny place, sunbathe more, especially important for kittens and elderly cats, can prevent rickets and osteoporosis. When taking the cat out in winter, it is best to dress them, choose clothes that only wear the front legs. Cats are different from dogs, they don't like to wear all four legs, it is not convenient for them to move. Finally, many pet owners in winter have overlooked the cat's cat house, causing the cat to catch a cold and get sick. In winter, you must pay attention to adjusting the position of the cat house, put it in a place where the wind is avoided indoors, and properly prepare some thick pads to keep the cat warm.
What else do I need to provide for my cat to help it through the winter?

The working principle of BackBackGood is very scientific. It corrects poor posture by applying appropriate pressure. Specifically, its design is based on the 3D structure of our chest cavity. When we breathe, we need to expand the chest cavity in four directions: forward, backward, left and right. This is exactly where these BackBackGoods squeeze. On the other hand, this squeezing on the back will cause the scapula to retract and move the entire chest cavity, creating shear force and compensation. In addition, BackBackGood is an auxiliary device that can help you improve your sitting, standing, and walking posture. By using BackBackGood, you can easily maintain the correct posture, thereby reducing problems such as cervical spine, lumbar spine, and back pain.
So, what's the principle of BackBackGood?

The eigenvalue of a matrix is a very important concept in linear algebra. It is a scalar value that can be obtained by operating on a matrix. Specifically, the eigenvalue of a matrix is a scalar value that satisfies the characteristic equation of the matrix. In other words, the eigenvalue is a root of the characteristic polynomial of the matrix. In addition, the eigenvalue also has some properties, such as the sum of the eigenvalues of a real symmetric matrix is equal to the sum of all elements on the main diagonal, and the product of the eigenvalues of a real orthogonal matrix is 1.
What does the eigenvalue of a matrix mean?

There are many ways to brew Tiaxue Lanfei, and the specific method can be chosen according to personal preference. One common method is the cover bowl brewing method, which includes the following steps: First, take 3 grams of Tiaxue Lanfei; then, use hot water to warm the bowl for about 1 minute; next, pour the tea into the covered bowl; then, shake the bowl and smell the aroma; then, pour in water to brew the tea, the water temperature is 80 degrees; finally, pour the tea into the fairness cup after 10 seconds, the time for each subsequent infusion varies from 10 to 15 seconds. Another method is the fairness cup brewing method, which includes the following steps: First, take 3 grams of Tiaxue Lanfei; then, pour 1/3 of the water into the fairness cup, the water temperature is 80 degrees; next, pour the tea into the fairness cup; then, fill the vessel to about seven or eight parts full; finally, pour the tea after 20 seconds, the time for each subsequent infusion is 20-30 seconds. In addition, there is another method, which includes the following steps: First, warm the cup, use a glass cup, rinse the cup with hot water; then, put in 5g of tea leaves, pour in 150ml of water, the water temperature is 90 degrees, soak for 1-2 minutes and you can enjoy it; next, each time you drink one third of the tea soup, you can add water to continue enjoying, and you can brew 4~5 times or more.
Is there anything special about the brewing method of Tiaxue Lanfei?

During the confinement period, there is indeed a controversy about whether to wash hair and bathe. However, according to the current understanding, mothers can wash their hair and bathe after a certain period of time after delivery. For example, mothers who have given birth vaginally can wash their hair and bathe 1 week after discharge, and mothers who have undergone cesarean section are recommended to bathe 10~15 days after delivery, but they must pay attention to waterproofing the wound to prevent infection. Generally speaking, according to the body's recovery, the general vaginal delivery can wash hair a week after, and two weeks after cesarean delivery. In addition, it's not hygienic and unscientific to not wash your hair in such hot weather during the confinement period, it's easy to breed bacteria and it's not good for health. Therefore, you can wash your hair 1~2 weeks after delivery, but you need to pay attention to the following when washing your hair after delivery: Firstly, you should pay attention to cleaning the scalp when washing your hair. Secondly, the water temperature for washing hair must be appropriate, not too cold or too hot. The hair is more oily after delivery, and it is also easy to lose hair, so don't use too stimulating shampoo. Finally, after washing your hair, you should dry your hair in time, use a hair dryer to dry it, and avoid catching cold.
Can I wash my hair?

Logic Dog is a system training tool for intelligence development and upgrade, suitable for children aged 3~12. It is a systematic logical thinking training system. Its gameplay is simple, just playing in various ways, but it subtly improves children's observation ability, reasoning ability, language use ability, mathematical logic ability, hand-eye coordination ability, focus, classification ability and other multiple abilities. The specific gameplay is as follows: First, insert the game card into the template and neatly arrange the colored round buttons below. Then, observe the card and move the colored round button to the correct answer position. When all the colored round buttons are moved to the correct position, it means you have completed this game. Finally, flip the card and see if the arrangement of the colored round buttons completely corresponds to the color points on the back. In addition, the colorful plastic board version has colorful round dots on one side, and it is very interesting to find the correct answer and slide the round dots to the correct position. It can improve children's observation ability, classification ability, mathematical logic ability, reasoning ability, hand-eye coordination ability, and spatial ability in an all-round way.

If you suspect that you might be allergic to mangoes, you can observe some symptoms. For example, some people might feel their lips swollen and have red swellings on their face after eating mangoes, and these areas might be itchy. In addition, some people might experience allergic reactions after touching mangoes. Moreover, the part below 5 millimeters of the mango skin is the most likely to cause allergic reactions, so if you peel the skin deeply and cut it into small pieces to eat directly in your mouth, you might not be allergic. However, if you just hold it and gnaw on it, you're sure to get an allergic reaction. Therefore, if you suspect that you might be allergic to mangoes, you can try to avoid direct contact with mangoes and see if your symptoms improve.
How do I know if I'm allergic to mangoes?

After using the RF beauty device, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the principle of RF is to heat the dermis layer, so when the beauty device leaves your skin, the temperature of the skin begins to drop, and it can no longer reach the temperature to stimulate collagen regeneration. At this time, you can wash your face with warm water, and if you use cold water to prevent skin sensitivity caused by alternating cold and heat. After cleansing, you can apply a moisturizing mask or a patch mask. Secondly, most RF beauty devices need to be used in conjunction with gel. The gel can tighten the skin with the beauty device RF device. After applying the gel, it can better introduce microcurrents. The gel acts as a conductor, allowing the RF current to be conducted to the skin, avoiding the tingling sensation brought by the microcurrent. Finally, it is not recommended to apply an icy cold mask afterwards to cool down, because RF works by temperature, cooling down is equivalent to doing it for nothing.
What should I pay attention to after using the RF beauty device?

The trimming and picking of tea trees mainly depend on their age and growth stage. For young forest tea trees, they are mainly shaped by trimming, combined with topping and light picking to establish a good skeleton of the tea tree. Mature forest tea trees mainly use light trimming and deep trimming measures to maintain the vigorous growth of tea trees and the neat crown picking surface, ensuring tea yield and quality. Aging tea trees mainly use heavy pruning and terracing measures, combined with shaping pruning and top-light picking to rejuvenate the tea tree crown. In terms of picking, there are standard picking, timely picking, batch multiple picking, and leaf retention picking. Hand picking includes pinching (breaking), straight picking, double-hand picking, and machine picking. The trimming time is generally in mid-to-late April for Longjing 43 tea garden. The spring tea can be pruned immediately after picking. At this time, it is generally heavy repair. The lower the cut, the stronger the bud will be next year. But if the cut is too low, the yield will be low next year. Therefore, pruning is also a technical activity. Especially for decades-old tea bushes, old roots are thick and pruning is more difficult.
How should tea trees be trimmed and picked?

There are many things to pay attention to when using a casserole. Firstly, the material of the casserole has natural pores, so it needs to be pre-seasoned to avoid the casserole flavour penetrating. Secondly, when cleaning the casserole, it is recommended to use neutral detergent and avoid using steel wool, because long-term use of acidic and alkaline detergents and steel wool may damage the glaze and affect the life of the casserole. In addition, the casserole should be kept dry and dry before storage, because the natural pores of the casserole material may breed mould in a damp state. Also, the casserole is fragile, so it should be handled with care, and it should not be knocked or bumped hard during use to avoid damaging the pot body. When cooking, pay attention to the fire control to prevent water overflow, avoid dry burning or empty burning, and be careful of burnt pot and burnt bottom. After the stew is over, do not put the product directly in cold and hard environments such as: water, refrigerator, bottom surface, etc. Be sure to place it on a thick dry towel or heat-insulating pad to prevent sudden cold and hot from damaging the product. Generally, when stewing soup, pay attention not to overflow and prevent uneven heating. Finally, when using a new pot, it must be heated with a gentle fire. After using it for a period of time, the raw pot becomes a ripe pot and will be more durable. During use, pay attention to the heating fire time, try to avoid dry burning, bumping, uneven heating, sudden cold and hot, empty burning, etc., keep sufficient moisture, water does not overflow, no burnt bottom, add water during heating, need to add warm water Oh, generally there will be no problems.
Are there any things to pay attention to when using a casserole?

There are indeed some risks and complications associated with mole removal surgery. First, if you choose to undergo laser mole removal, you need to go to a regular place for laser mole removal and find experienced doctors. If accidents occur during the surgery, or if the operation is improper, it is also easy to leave scars. To identify products labeled as 'pure chocolate', we can consider the following aspects: First, check the cocoa content on the outer packaging. Pure chocolate, such as dark chocolate, has high hardness and less milk fat than milk chocolate, and contains less salt. In addition, we need to distinguish 'cocoa butter' and 'cocoa butter substitute'. Cocoa butter substitute is a type of artificially hydrogenated vegetable oil, it has no nutritional value at all, it will increase bad cholesterol, lower good cholesterol, increase blood viscosity, and thus form thrombus. Finally, we need to pay attention to the packaging, appearance, taste and texture of the product. The genuine product will be softer at room temperature, and needs to be frozen in the refrigerator, because it was frozen after softening, so there are some flaws. The taste and texture of the genuine product are more like raw chocolate, and the filling turns into liquid in your mouth. How should we identify products labeled as 'pure chocolate'?

To prevent dumplings from cracking when cooked, you can try the following methods. First, you can use a small amount of water to evenly dip a circle of dumplings in the palm of your hand, and the surface powder will open. Then, gently knead it again. During the cooking process, you need to pay attention to the following points: 1. Put the dumplings in the pot when the pot bottom bubbles. When you see small bubbles coming out of the bottom of the pot, you can put the dumplings in the pot, slightly push the dumplings with the back of the spoon in one direction so that they are not squeezed together, and then use high heat to boil the water. 2. After the pot is boiled, pour in a bowl of cold water, continue to gently stir along the edge of the pot, and be careful not to touch the dumplings. After boiling, add a bowl of cold water again, repeat the operation, add cold water three times in total. Cook until the dumplings float. 3. Take out the frozen dumplings, put them in a large bowl, soak in cold water for 20-30 seconds, and they will not crack due to sudden heat after entering the pot. 4. First boil water in the pot, then pour the dumplings into the pot after the water is boiled. The key point is not to touch it when you cook it. If it is sticking together, you can gently separate them at this time. Then quietly wait for them to float up, and you can immediately scoop them out to cool down after the water boils twice. Finally, put them in the water with ice cubes after a while. Soak it, usually for 3-4 hours, you can change the water in the meantime.
So how can we prevent the dumplings from cracking when they are cooked?

Sulfonylurea drugs, such as glimepiride, are commonly used oral hypoglycemic drugs, suitable for type 2 diabetes with remaining pancreatic β-cell function of 50% or more. However, their main side effects are hypoglycemia. This is because they are insulin secretagogues, mainly by stimulating insulin secretion, increasing the level of insulin in the body to exert hypoglycemic effects, so they can induce hypoglycemia, especially the elderly, those with liver and kidney function abnormalities, overdose of medication, already medicated but not eating in time are more prone. On the other hand, biguanide drugs, such as metformin, are cheap, cost-effective, safe, do not cause hypoglycemia when used alone, less likely to cause lactic acid poisoning compared with Diabex. Its main side effects are gastrointestinal reactions, including decreased appetite, nausea, vomiting, dry mouth, bitterness, bloating, diarrhea, etc., most mild adverse reactions can be tolerated, adverse reactions disappear after 12 weeks of medication.

If the lumbar vertebrae are injured, it may be due to excessive hip joint flexion and half squatting causing too much pressure on the lumbosacral joint during volleyball training, which is a common lumbar injury in volleyball. The clinical symptoms of lumbar vertebrae injury include sudden onset of back pain, which is mostly dull or colic, and it is difficult to turn over, affecting daily life. Most of the time, there is radiating pain in the lower limbs at the same time as back pain. Those with a long course of disease often have numbness, mostly limited to the back of the calf, dorsum of the foot or toes. When extending backwards, the intervertebral space narrows and the intervertebral disc is squeezed, and most patients have more obvious limitations when extending backwards. In severe cases, lumbar vertebrae can have burst fractures, usually fractures will more or less cause some pressure or damage to the cauda equina nerves, resulting in partial paralysis of the lower limbs, or completely paralyzed. Even after internal fixation surgery, these symptoms may not be completely relieved, can only be partially recovered, so the sequelae is mainly the decline in muscle strength in the lower limbs, numbness in the lower limbs, can not stand or walk, severe will have uncontrollable urination and defecation sequelae.
What happens if the lumbar vertebrae are injured?

The specific method of trimming bangs is as follows: First, separate the bangs you want to cut, including the whiskers, start from the top of the head, at an angle of about 60 degrees. Then, all bangs are straightened, cut flat at the chin. Next, divide the bangs into 3 parts, the middle bangs are straightened to the tip of the nose, cut along the arc of the nail cap once. Comb it open with a comb, divide the bangs into 2 parts again, divide the left part into two parts, pull to the right and cut off the excess broken hair. Then, all the bangs on the left are pulled to the right, and the excess broken hair is cut off, the bangs on the right are cut in the same way. Finally, divide the bangs into 3 parts again, and cut the middle part to the position of the lower eyelid. If you want a more natural arc, you can pick out 1/3 of the middle bangs and cut it to the corner of the eye. Remember, cutting bangs is a delicate task, it is best to cut little by little, always staring at the length, don't rush, don't forget to do your homework after learning.
Then how to trim specifically?

The specific binding steps are as follows: First, choose domestic or imported large fishing hooks, tie 3 fishing hooks into an anchor hook. Then, prepare a sinker, about 100 grams in weight, and a nylon line, 60-80 meters long. Wind the line onto an empty can, and tie the other end to 3 anchor hooks, with a hook distance of about 30 cm. Finally, place the line on the can on a flat ground, pull the line in turn once, so that the end with a single hook is on the top, and the end near the can is at the bottom. Hold the sinker with your right hand, lift the anchor hook, hold the can with your left hand, and throw the sinker into the water with force. After the sinker sinks to the bottom, quickly reel in the line. The line retraction should be strong, and the line retraction range should be over 60 cm.
What are the specific binding steps?

There are some special techniques to avoid the situation where contact lenses touch makeup. Firstly, the principle of removing and wearing contact lenses when applying makeup is to wear glasses before makeup, and remove glasses before makeup removal. This is because if you wear glasses after makeup, the lens may get makeup on it, and wearing it will be uncomfortable. Secondly, the oily components of makeup may adhere to the lens, and wearing it will also be uncomfortable. In addition, if you wear glasses with hands that have touched eye makeup, there will also be discomfort. Therefore, when wearing and removing with makeup, you need to pay attention to the following points: ①When wearing and removing with hands, do not touch the eye makeup and lens with the same finger; ②After removing a lens, wash your hands immediately before proceeding to the next step; ③When wearing and removing with makeup, be sure to hold the root of the eyelashes on the upper and lower eyelids to avoid getting makeup into the eyes. Finally, if you wear contact lenses with makeup and feel uncomfortable, be sure to remove the lenses and rinse them immediately, then wash your hands and wear the lenses again.
Are there any special techniques to avoid this situation?

When raising the dough, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the amount of yeast powder and baking powder is not fixed, the fermentation time and temperature of the dough have a great relationship, if the room temperature is low, you can put more yeast powder, if the room temperature is high, you can put less, just grasp it flexibly. Secondly, when mixing the dough, you don't need to add all the water at once, first use chopsticks to stir the flour into cotton wool without dry powder, if you find there is a lot of dry powder, you can add water in small amounts multiple times, to reduce the chance of failure. When there is no dry flour, you can start kneading. At the beginning of kneading, it might feel sticky, it's alright, just knead a bit more, and finally you can knead it into a state of smooth dough, smooth basin, and smooth hand. The dough should not be too hard, the food made from slightly softer dough has a better texture. In addition, the fermentation time of the dough should be 2-3 hours, and you must use warm water to make the dough, which is easy to ferment. Finally, the resting time should be longer in winter and shorter in summer, the resting time in winter is about 60 minutes, the resting time in summer is about 30 minutes.
What should I pay attention to when raising the dough?

In addition to medication, there are other treatment methods for shell rot. Firstly, you can use potassium permanganate solution to mix with water to turn purple, soak for 40 minutes, then use hydrogen peroxide to wash, then use iodophor disinfect, and finally apply erythromycin ointment. Potassium permanganate can burn bacteria, and hydrogen peroxide is a suppressant. For severe turtles, you may need to use 5-7 days of potassium permanganate solution soaking, if it is not serious, only need to soak for 3 days, only need to soak once a day. The remaining hydrogen peroxide-iodophor-erythromycin ointment steps, 2-3 times a day, until cured. After each application of the medicine, dry for 40-50 minutes. If it is serious, try not to enter the original tank, use a box with shallow water to the neck for slow treatment, just provide enough water. Another method is to use gentamicin and dry keeping, which is also an effective treatment method.
Are there other treatment methods besides medication?

In addition to when lying down, there are many other situations that can cause a cat's eyes to become round. For example, when the cat is affected by the intensity of light, such as during the day, the pupil of the cat is mostly in the shape of a line to reduce the amount of light entering and avoid injury to the eyes. At night when the light is relatively weak, the pupils will fully dilate into a round shape to collect more light to help see objects clearly, which helps with nocturnal activities or hunting. Also, when the cat feels curious or focused, their pupils will become round and large, making it easier to observe. When the cat feels relaxed, it will become a suitable size. When the cat's pupils are fully dilated, it means that it has been strongly stimulated, possibly excited, scared or fearful. At this time, try to soothe it to calm it down. When the cat's mood becomes tense and depressed, its pupils will shrink, and at this time it may become aggressive, so don't provoke it at this time! The changes in a cat's pupils can be roughly divided into three types: round, oval, and linear. When the cat is in an environment where the light changes or the cat's own emotions change, the size of the cat's pupils will also change accordingly.
Besides when lying down, are there any other situations that can cause a cat's eyes to become round?

There are many ways to prepare ginger juice. One common method is to first buy 5 jin of small yellow ginger, then clean and peel it, drain the water, and juice it with a juicer. Next, let the juiced ginger juice stand for a while to let the starch settle down, otherwise it will become paste when heated. Then, heat the pure ginger juice over low heat until it boils, cool it naturally to room temperature, pour it into a glass bottle, and freeze it for preservation. Another method is to wash the ginger, put it in the juicer and cold press it. You can also try diluting the ginger juice with water, or try making ginger brown sugar bubble water or ginger brown sugar milk tea. In addition, you can also try making brown sugar ginger juice sauce, which requires peeling the red dates and ginger, putting them in the wall breaker, adding the right amount of water, and starting the wall breaker with one key, breaking and cooking for 30 minutes.
So how should ginger juice be prepared?

'Encore' has multiple meanings. On the Buick car model tail mark, the 'ENCORE' logo is a car model series under Buick, which is directly translated as 'Encore'. In performances, 'encore' is a demand for a repeat performance, which comes from French, where 'cor' is not 'heart', but equivalent to 'here', 'en' means 'to make ... in certain state', so 'encore' is to make here in certain state, that is, when the performer or actor is about to leave here, the audience hopes to make this state of 'here' continue, so they request encore, which means 'come again, another performance please'. In addition, 'encore' is also a unique gambling game in Ontario. It is also one of the easiest lotteries to win in Canada. It is not possible to buy Encore alone, you must first buy a certain lottery ticket, and then request to attach Encore to the ticket.
What does 'encore' mean?

If the cat still doesn't know how to use the litter box, you can try the following methods: First, give the cat a quiet place to land, such as placing the cat toilet in the corner of the room. Once the location of the cat toilet is determined, try not to move it around. Mixing things that smell like the cat's own feces in the litter box will make them easier to recognize and remember. When you see the cat restless, gently pick it up and gently take it to the litter box. In order not to scare the cat, you should gently pick it up and make sure not to make loud noises. Observe quietly before the cat finishes defecating. Because cats are clean animals, keep the cat toilet clean. When it successfully defecates, give the cat encouragement and praise. In addition, the cat's toilet should be in a fixed position, otherwise the kitten will easily get lost. Let the cat stay in the litter box for a while after setting the position, so she can familiarize herself with this position. Help the cat simulate the action of throwing cat litter, so the cat can learn how to use it. Every time you find that the cat needs to defecate, immediately take the cat to the litter box position.
What if the cat still doesn't know how to use it?

The operation of using hot milk to melt butter is as follows: First, put the milk and butter in the pot, let the butter melt on low heat, then turn on high heat to boil, and turn off the heat immediately after boiling. Then, pour the cooked mixture into a juicer or a broken wall machine, press the juice key for more than 1 minute, then pour it into a container, seal it and refrigerate for more than 12 hours. In addition, you can also try this method: Heat the milk and butter to completely melt and the temperature is above 80 degrees, then pour it into the broken wall machine while it is hot, and stir for about 1 minute. Finally, use it after cooling and refrigerating overnight.
So how do you operate with hot milk to melt butter?

The main ingredients for making soybean paste include 500g of soybeans and 350g of black beans, and the ingredients include 2 onions, 3 heads of garlic, and 1 piece of ginger. First, you need to soak the soybeans for 3 hours, then cook them with the rice cooking button on the rice cooker. The water for cooking the beans should be a little more, and there should be some water in the pot after cooking. Then, heat the oil in the pot, put star anise, cinnamon, pepper, green onion, ginger, garlic, Pixian bean paste, soybean paste, tomato, mushroom, diced chicken, stir-fry until the tomato is juiced! Pour in the cooked beans, simmer for about 40 minutes, frequently stir-fry to prevent the pot from sticking, medium-high heat for the first 30 minutes, medium-low heat for the last 10 minutes to reduce the juice! When there is no water in the pot and only oil is left, it's done.
Could you tell me the specific steps?

If you want to adjust the size of the collar through sewing, folding, or adding extra fabric, here are some suggestions. First, the sewing thread should be thick, if it is too thin it will break easily when pulled. Then, go along the edge of the collar, the needle does not exceed the upper edge of the collar, the lower needle just presses the lower edge of the collar. The distance of staggered seams should be larger, so it is easier when pulling. Also, the adjustment range should not be too large, otherwise it will easily deform severely. In addition, you can refer to the experience of reducing the size of the T-shirt collar, which has been reduced by about 1.5 cm. The reduction of the T-shirt collar slightly affects the smoothness of the collar. If the reduction is not too much, it can still have an effect. Finally, if the collar is too large, you can try to press a button, which is easy to wear and take off, and not afraid of shoulder cold.

There are many ways to make air-dried duck, here are two common methods. The first one is to use a bag of duck breast, first thaw it to a semi-frozen state, then remove the fat from the duck breast and slice it, the thickness is about 2-3mm suitable, then pad the net rack with food-grade silicone pad or oil paper, lay it flat on it, leave some space between the meat, finally set the time and temperature: 70 degrees for 10 hours (depending on the thickness of the meat). The second one is to cut the air-dried duck into pieces, soak it in warm salt water for 40 minutes, prepare some ginger, garlic and scallions, heat the pan with oil, stir-fry the ingredients in the pan, then put the air-dried duck in and stir-fry it, add water to cover the duck, cover the pan with a high heat and simmer for an hour and a half, then open the lid and add some chili and cilantro, a very delicious air-dried duck is ready.
Can you tell me in detail how to make air-dried duck?

The main difference between a wet beauty blender and a dry one lies in their usage methods and effects. When using a dry beauty blender, its concealing power is stronger, and the powder feeling is thicker. On the contrary, a wet beauty blender has a transparent effect, the powder feeling is weaker, and the concealing power is weaker. In addition, the makeup foundation and skin can fit better when using a wet beauty blender, which can avoid creasing and floating powder on dry skin, and avoid mottled makeup on oily skin. For large area makeup foundation, wet use can create a spray makeup feel. However, if the skin color is light, the pointed part of the dry beauty blender can also create a transparent blush.
What's the difference between a wet beauty blender and a dry one?

During the preschool teacher qualification interview, there are several key points to pay attention to. First, before the interview, you need to try a few times on the podium and then record it with your mobile phone. This can help you find your shortcomings in the video and improve. Secondly, don't believe in rumors about passing the exam without preparation. If you want to pass, you need to start reviewing the knowledge points now and practice more lectures and exercises. In addition, you can register for the interview later, so that the exam schedule will be arranged a bit later. Generally, there will be candidates who share the topics in the earlier exam schedule, so you can prepare more. Join a candidate group in advance, candidates who have taken the exam will share this year's new test points and structured questions in it, you can prepare according to others' preparation, the possibility of testing repeated questions is not small. Prepare some lines for communication with students during the trial lecture process, such as: I see that some students have the habit of drawing with a pen in the preview process, very good! As the saying goes, 'Don't move the pen and ink without reading', I hope you can keep such good habits; it seems that students have mastered it very firmly; this student's speech is very logical, do you think he is right; the second group The collected information is very accurate, very good, please sit; the girls in the last row raised their hands early, then please answer this question; there are many posts on the Internet that can be used for reference, you don't need to learn each one, find a few lines to form your own fixed match , You can use it no matter which knowledge point you match. If you don't want to stare at the examiner during the trial lecture, you can choose to stare at the wall in front, but occasionally you should look at the walls on both sides, and it is best to look at the examiner when asking questions during the trial lecture. The voice of the lecture must be loud, even if a sentence is wrong, it can be corrected immediately, don't feel unconfident because of a wrong sentence, after all, real teachers will also stutter when lecturing. Remember to say hello to the examiner when you try to lecture, and then report your candidate number. Remember not to say your name! Don't walk back and forth on the podium, don't kick your feet front and back (some people have the habit of kicking when standing), when pointing to the blackboard or projector, the gesture should be generous, don't appear to want to point and dare not. When inviting students to answer questions, you can also bring some gestures. Finally, remember to write on the blackboard! Don't just focus on lecturing in front.
Okay, is there anything special to pay attention to during the interview?

Hand soap is less irritating to the skin than soap. Whether it is liquid soap or non-soap-based formula, its PH value is close to neutral or weakly acidic, closer to the skin, and has less degreasing ability, so it is less irritating to the skin. However, hand soap is not suitable for washing the face, as it may cause certain irritation to the skin and may lead to symptoms of dry skin. This is because hand soap has a relatively strong ability to remove dirt, and it can easily overclean the oil and moisture on the skin surface, causing the skin on the face to feel dry or tight. In severe cases, it may cause damage to the skin on the face. Therefore, although hand soap is less irritating to the skin, it is not suitable for washing the face.
Will using hand soap harm the skin?

Aries is a very special constellation. First of all, Aries are passionate in nature, impulsive in doing things, and generous. Even if there are quarrels, they will not hold grudges. Secondly, Aries actually have a tendency to admire the strong, they think directly, but they have deep admiration and favor for the strong. In addition, Aries are the most common in novels where the domineering total appears, referring to the Li Min played by Chen Feiyu. They are complex mixtures of caring when angry and cute when happy. They can give everything for anyone they think is worthy. Aries will soon forget about angry things, don't hold grudges; they will remember the good things others do for them, and will always repay kindness. Aries are not good at expressing their feelings, so they often use silence to replace expression; they can't accept friends' distrust and betrayal, betrayal. They seem strong on the surface, hard-mouthed, but actually soft-hearted and easily hurt. Aries are naturally extraordinary in temperament, outstanding among people, and don't need to pretend. Because of the unruly side in Aries' nature, they show a kind of arrogant aura when getting along with others, so people who don't understand Aries may think that Aries look down on people. But if you have the opportunity to contact Aries, you will find that Aries are so easy to approach, so funny, they are simply a treasure constellation. Aries is a synonym for innocence. Innocence is because Aries always stick to their ideals and believe that the world is as beautiful as a fairy tale. Aries always look at the world with a positive attitude, they believe that tomorrow's sun will be more brilliant. People with the sun in Aries are optimistic and lively, dare to do and dare to be, full of energy, and belong to the action party, the adventurer. But sometimes they appear impatient, impulsive and irritable, and too adventurous.
Is there any other information about Aries?

To avoid factors that may trigger hives, you need to pay attention to the following points: Firstly, avoid drug allergies, because improper use of drugs can easily induce hives. Secondly, avoid food allergies, such as seafood, eggs, chili, mango, dairy products, peanuts, lychee, tomatoes, garlic, alcohol, and some food additives, which can all cause hives. In addition, avoid infections, such as viruses, bacteria, fungi, parasites, which can all cause hives. Physical factors, such as cold, heat, sunlight, friction, vibration, and pressure, can also cause hives. Animal plant factors, such as insect bites, contact with pets, inhalation of pollen, contact with dust, can also cause hives. Lastly, avoid excessive exercise, heat, tension, hot drinks or drinking alcohol that raises body temperature, which can induce cholinergic urticaria. In daily life, avoid anxiety, relax, avoid eating high-protein foods, such as seafood, eggs, milk, eat light food as much as possible, avoid spicy stimulation, smoking, drinking, etc.; try to avoid going to public places, such as decoration malls with formaldehyde environment, in addition, also avoid contact with allergens in life, such as animal fur, soap, shower gel, etc.
What factors that may trigger hives should I avoid for him?

Both laundry detergent and laundry liquid have their own advantages in stain removal. Laundry detergent usually contains alkaline substances, such as sodium carbonate, which helps to remove grease and stains, and can produce rich foam. For some heavier stains, laundry detergent may be more effective. On the other hand, laundry liquid is mainly composed of synthetic surfactants, which can effectively remove stains and hydrophobic grease. For some minor stains, laundry liquid may be more suitable. In general, laundry detergent and laundry liquid do not have a significant difference in cleaning effect according to the material of the clothes, the degree of the stain, and the quality of the water. Some users have reported that they prefer to use laundry detergent, feeling that the cleaning effect of laundry detergent is better than that of laundry liquid.
