emphasizing aviation safety knowledge and operating standards, including emergency handling, flight safety requirements, safety checks, emergency escape, etc., to ensure that employees can deal with emergencies and ensure passenger safety; training employees in customer service skills, such as etiquette, communication skills, problem-solving abilities, etc., to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty; teaching employees how to use the airline's information systems and tools, such as flight management systems, ticket reservation systems, baggage tracking systems, etc., so that employees can operate proficiently and provide accurate service; cultivating employees' good team spirit and leadership to improve team work efficiency and employees' career development; introducing laws and regulations related to air transport, including aviation safety regulations, passenger rights protection regulations, etc., to ensure that employees' work complies with legal requirements; introducing the airline's various business processes, such as ticket reservation, check-in, boarding, baggage check-in, etc., so that employees can be familiar with and able to operate proficiently; introducing the airline's various products, such as the service features of different cabins, onboard meals, entertainment facilities, etc., to provide accurate product information to customers; introducing the airline's brand image, reputation, and market positioning, and cultivating employees' awareness and sense of responsibility for representing the airline's image. In addition, the airline also requires service personnel to have good interpersonal relationships, learn to coordinate well with superiors, coordinate well with colleagues, and provide the most comfortable service for passengers. At the same time, they need to have strong execution, improve work efficiency, always maintain the corporate image, and share the fate with the enterprise.
Does the airline company have any special requirements for training service personnel?

Peanuts are known as longevity fruit and plant meat, they are very rich in protein and have high nutritional value, which is very suitable for women's daily consumption. Peanuts contain a kind of natural polyphenol called resveratrol, which is 908 times the content in grapes, reaching 27.2ug/g. During the germination process of peanuts, the content of resveratrol significantly increases, which is about 3~8 times that of ungerminated peanuts. The content of resveratrol in grapes is usually only one millionth, while the content of resveratrol in peanuts is as high as three ten millionths, and the content is highest in the seed coat. White peanuts are larger in size, the fat content is richer, often used for oil pressing and daily frying, the calorie content is lower than red peanuts, which can be eaten appropriately during the fat reduction period, the calcium content is higher, especially suitable for children in the development period, the elderly and people who need calcium supplementation. However, it is not recommended to eat raw, which affects the absorption of calcium. Red peanuts are smaller in size, often used for porridge and soup, have the function of benefiting qi, and the effect is more obvious when eaten raw, especially helpful for people who need to recover physical strength after childbirth and menstruation. The red skin of peanuts also contains abundant anthocyanins and iron elements, natural antioxidants, which are good natural maintenance snacks for people who often stay up late. Whether it's white peanuts or red peanuts, both can provide normal nutritional functions to the body. Eating a proper amount each week can improve the body's immunity.
What's the nutritional difference between white peanuts and red peanuts?

The gold standard system has both advantages and disadvantages. Its advantage lies in its strong mechanism, which can promote a country's trade balance. For example, if there are two countries A and B in the world, A has a trade surplus, B has a deficit, the supply of currency in A will increase, prices will rise, and the demand for goods in A will decrease. A will buy more goods from B, and B's demand for A's goods will decrease. Until the trade balance. However, the main disadvantage of the gold standard is its inherent defect, which is the risk of deflation. When output begins to grow dramatically, transactions increase the demand for gold (based on the anchor ratio of gold to currency to issue currency). But the supply of gold and the uneven distribution in various countries will cause some countries lacking gold currency to fall into the risk of insufficient currency supply in high-speed economic development, leading to deflation. And deflation is very harmful to debtors, constantly falling prices, thereby affecting profits and corresponding loans to be paid at a fixed rate, debtors will sooner or later have problems in repayment. Then the financial crisis will break out, banks will go bankrupt, savings will be lost, and then spread to the real economy, the destruction of the credit market makes the loans to enterprises and individuals collapse, and then the real economy collapses, and finally GG.
What are the advantages and disadvantages of this system?

Time affects the caffeine content in several ways. Firstly, after 15-30 minutes of caffeine intake, you can see an obvious refreshing effect, and the metabolism time of caffeine is 4-6 hours. Therefore, it is not recommended to drink caffeinated beverages after 4 pm. Secondly, long-term intake of caffeine will cause a small degree of dependence on the body. When you want to reduce the intake of caffeine or completely quit coffee, you may experience withdrawal symptoms. It is recommended to gradually reduce the intake of caffeine and give the body time to adapt. Lastly, the caffeine content of a single serving of Arabica bean espresso is about 70mg, and the caffeine content of a double serving espresso is 140mg. The espresso made from Robusta beans will have a higher caffeine content.

The maintenance of waterproof composite floors mainly includes the following points: First, maintain indoor humidity. Although SPC flooring is treated to reduce size changes, it can still deform with changes in humidity. During the dry season, especially when heating, the indoor temperature can be adjusted by different methods such as using a humidifier or placing a pot of water on the radiator. In the moldy season, open windows for ventilation and keep the indoors dry. Second, avoid direct sunlight indoors. When heating in winter, keep a certain distance between the heater and the wooden floor surface to prevent high-temperature objects from locally heating the floor. In daily use, keep the floor dry and clean, and avoid water on the floor. If water is accidentally spilled on the floor, wipe it dry immediately. Finally, when cleaning the floor, do not rinse with water. Generally, you can use a vacuum cleaner to remove debris and dust, or sweep it clean with a clean broom, and then mop it with a wrung mop to make it look new. Avoid using cleaning brushes that may leave dirt residue, do not use soap or polishing products, cleaning agents, abrasive cleaners.
Does the waterproof composite floor require special maintenance?

There are several things to note when making de-oiled peanuts. First, for beginners, it is recommended to fry with a lower heat, so the peanuts won't get burnt accidentally. Secondly, put peanuts into the pan with cold oil and cold pan. During the frying process, fry until you hear the 'cracking' sounds from the peanuts, taste one every 2 minutes. When taking them out of the pan, sprinkle some high-proof liquor and stir-fry for another minute while it's still hot, it won't get moist easily and will be crunchier. In addition, keep the heat low throughout the process, keep stirring and moving the pan away from the heat source when the temperature is too high, stir until the color is even, then you can take it out of the pan, sprinkle salt while it's hot, let it cool. Finally, keep the heat low throughout the process, must put peanuts into the cold pan with cold oil, keep stirring, the color of the peanuts changes, and when there is a rustling sound when stirring, it's basically done, it's easy to get burnt if the time is too long.
What should I pay attention to?

For the preparation of Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles, you can refer to the following steps: First, soak 150g of lean pork cut into thin strips in clear water for 5 minutes, and cut one sour pickled cabbage into small pieces. Second, heat up the wok, add 50g each of lard and corn oil. When the oil is 70% hot, add the chopped garlic and scallions to stir-fry until fragrant, then add the pickled cabbage to stir-fry until the water is dry. Then add an appropriate amount of broth to boil, add 3g of white pepper powder. After adding 5g of chicken essence, pour it into the electric rice cooker and simmer for 30 minutes. Next, wash the shredded pork twice and drain the water. Add a suitable amount of salt, a little white pepper powder, two drops of white wine, two drops of white vinegar, a little oyster sauce, two slices of ginger, and a section of green onion. Mix well with your hands and marinate for 10 minutes. Then pick out the ginger and green onion and discard them. Then add an appropriate amount of sweet potato starch and mix well. Add a few drops of corn oil or sesame oil and mix well to lock in the moisture of the shredded pork. Finally, heat up the pot, add 50g of corn oil. When the oil is 50% hot, add the shredded pork and stir-fry it cold. When the shredded pork is set, gently stir-fry and change color before pouring into the sour pickled cabbage soup. Boil water in a pot to cook the noodles. When the noodles are cooked, scoop them out and add the sour pickled cabbage and pork soup. Sprinkle with scallions and it's delicious.
What are the specific measurements? I am making Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles for four people

When drawing a person, there are several key points to note. First, you need to see the head as an oval, then find the shape outside the oval, use a triangle to determine the position of his nose, and then gradually find the details. Secondly, the human body is a must-learn foundation for painting, but it is not recommended to dissect the human body, because it is difficult and will consume the enthusiasm for painting. Instead, you can try to simplify the complex human body into a block scaffold, gradually adding muscles on the basis of the scaffold, and building a complete human body. This method can not only quickly capture dynamic expressions, but also cultivate spatial awareness and avoid drawing people too flat. Finally, mastering the head-body ratio, the proportions of facial features, head and shoulder ratio, head and hand ratio, etc., is also very important.
What should be noted when drawing a person?

If your kitten is particularly naughty and still gets on the bed, you can try the following methods: Firstly, educate from an early age, let the cat develop the habit of not getting on the bed from an early age. Secondly, prepare a comfortable nest for the cat, such as putting a blanket or a hot water bottle in the nest, to make the cat fall in love with its own nest. In addition, you can use the snack method, train the cat to stay in its own nest, prepare some snacks that the cat loves, or catnip, let the cat know that there are delicious things staying in the nest, and gradually adapt to sleeping in the nest. Also, you can transfer the smell, put things with the owner's smell, such as clothes, hats, etc., into the cat's nest. If you find the cat on the bed, you need to scold it loudly, tell it that it can't sleep on the bed, and you can also slap the cat appropriately to let it recognize its own mistakes. Whether to choose a 2-year or 4-year extended warranty depends on your specific situation and needs. If you buy the extended warranty within 180 days of buying the car, the price will be cheaper. For example, for a Tesla Model 3, a 2-year or 40,000-kilometer warranty extension costs 7700 yuan; a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer extension costs 14700 yuan. However, if your car has already driven more than 80,000 kilometers, you need to get the car inspected before extending the warranty. In this case, a 2-year or 40,000-kilometer warranty extension costs 11000 yuan; a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer extension costs 21000 yuan. If you buy the extended warranty when buying the car, the price will be cheaper, about 6300 yuan cheaper. Therefore, if you think you can reach 80,000 kilometers within a year, then choosing a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer warranty might be more cost-effective.
So, should I choose a 2-year or a 4-year extended warranty?

The principle of the colorful particle meteor shower is as follows: First, the pigment cannot be dissolved in edible oil, so the pigment is wrapped into droplets of pigment liquid when added to the oil. Then, after the edible oil mixed with pigment is poured into clear water, because the density of edible oil is less than the density of water, the edible oil wraps the pigment and floats on the water. After we leave it for a while, because the pigment has the greatest density, it then sinks drop by drop. After reaching the water layer, it dissolves into the water, forming a beautiful 'colorful meteor shower'. The materials needed for this experiment include water, edible oil, red, yellow and blue pigments, measuring tools, and transparent containers.
The colorful particle meteor shower is a special technique to create a falling effect of colorful particles like a meteor shower.

To become familiar with the basic structure and writing order of 'qian', you can refer to the following steps: First, the first stroke is a short straight slant, the second stroke is a horizontal hook, the horizontal part intersects the middle lower position of the short slant, the third stroke is a vertical slant, slightly long, with the upper section straight and the lower section extending to the left, the fourth stroke is a press, starting close to the starting point of the vertical slant and extending to the bottom right. It should be noted that 'qian' appears triangular, and the main stroke is the press extending to the bottom right. In addition, 'qian' has a single structure, narrower at the top and wider at the bottom, with the middle tightened. The top is slightly wide, avoid aligning the slants: the first slant starts to the bottom right, slightly heavy, then turns the nib to the bottom left, pay attention to the angle, do not write it long; the horizontal slant starts from the middle of the first slant, the horizontal stroke is large against the shoulder, not heavy, do not make it long, after reaching the position, lift the nib, pause, and write the slant, pay attention to the direction. The bottom 'person' character is narrower on the left and wider on the right: the slant starts slightly to the left, picks up in the air, the body of the slant is curved and powerful, pay attention to the position of the slant tip; the press starts from the body of the slant, makes a small curve in the body of the slant to the bottom right, gradually gives force, the angle is slightly flat, after reaching the position, pause slightly, slowly exit the nib to the top right, elegant and handsome. Finally, the bottom slant aligns with the intersection point of the top slant and horizontal.
How to become familiar with the basic structure and writing order of 'qian'?

In Word document, if you find page breaks or other hidden format symbols, you can delete them by following these steps: First, you can display the page break or paragraph mark (which is the shape of the return) when you feel something is wrong, then select this icon and delete it. Secondly, if you have multiple blank pages, you can use the find and replace function to delete them in batches. The specific operation is: <Ctrl+H> to open the 【Replace】 dialogue box, enter “^m” in 【Find content】, leave 【Replace with】 blank, then click 【Replace all】. Finally, if you encounter a situation where a page break occurs in a paragraph, the previous page is not full, the whole paragraph goes to the next page, you can try to change the 【Paragraph】 settings. If there is a page break before a paragraph, you can try to cancel the 【Page break before paragraph】 in the 【Paragraph】 settings. If there is a blank page after a table, you can modify the 【Paragraph】 settings of the blank page, set 【Line spacing “Fixed”, 1 pound】, and then delete.
I found these symbols, how do I delete them?

The Inuit, also known as Eskimos, are a people living in the Arctic. They are distributed from Siberia, Alaska to Greenland, inside and outside the Arctic Circle, including Greenland, the United States, Canada and Russia. Thousands of years ago, Asians migrated to America on a large scale, and some Asians fled to the Arctic to avoid the brutal slaughter and interception of the local indigenous people, the Indians. The Inuit are the descendants of these tough Asians who survived. They do not like to be called Eskimos, because this term comes from the language of their enemies, the Algonquin Indians, meaning 'eaters of raw meat', while 'Inuit' is their self-name, meaning 'real people'.

Finally, put the flesh neatly into the original grapefruit skin.
Are there any tips if I break it directly?

After removing the wisdom tooth, you need to pay more attention to your diet to ensure the smooth recovery of the wound. In addition, spicy foods, like hot pots, barbecue, etc., are irritating, not conducive to wound healing, and easy to bleed and get infected. Rough foods, like whole grains, are also not recommended, as they are easy to rub the mouth, making the wound harder to heal. Therefore, you should try to eat on the side that hasn't been extracted, avoid using oral muscles, and eat light, avoiding spicy and stimulating foods.

The procedure for making an appointment for the Subject One exam is as follows: First, you need to make an appointment for the Subject One exam on 12123 in advance. They arrange four sessions each day, two in the morning and two in the afternoon. For example, if you get the nine o'clock appointment, you can take the test at nine o'clock or in the few sessions after nine, but if your appointment is after the nine o'clock session, you can't take the test at nine. If there are vacant seats in the nine o'clock session, you can ask. Second, when you arrive at the test site, you have to wait. When it's your appointment time, someone will guide you to queue up to enter the exam room. During this period, you have to turn off your phone. If your phone rings when you enter the exam room, it will be considered cheating and your exam qualification will be cancelled. Third, after entering the exam room, a teacher will perform face and ID card recognition, and another teacher will tell you your seat number. You sit down according to the seat number, now the exam room is still blocked by partitions. Fourth, after sitting down, you need to verify information. After the verification is complete, you can start to answer the questions. It's inevitable to be nervous when you first go in, you can calm down while answering the questions. If you encounter a question you are not sure or have not brushed up on at the beginning, don't be nervous and scared, just put it aside and continue. At this time, you will gradually get into the answering state, and your nervous mood will gradually relax. Note that during the exam, you can read the questions out loud without affecting others to ensure that you don't miss words and understand correctly before answering. After answering all the questions, go back and answer the ones you didn't answer. At this time, you are relaxed, and the correct rate is relatively higher. Finally, after answering all the questions, you can submit. After the submission is successful, go to the front to swipe your ID card and sign. Now it's all electronic signatures.
You need to prepare your ID card and related exam fees. If you have completed the physical examination, you also need to provide the physical examination form.

Eating sesame seeds can promote the functions of kidney blood production, liver blood storage, and spleen blood control. Angelica belongs to the liver, heart, spleen, and large intestine meridians. According to the Postal Law, Contract Law, and Temporary Regulations for Express Delivery, couriers are required to deliver goods to the door. The normal workflow is for the courier to deliver the express to the recipient's address on the express order. If the order specifies which building, then deliver to that building, if it specifies which number, then deliver to that number, if it specifies station or express cabinet, then deliver to the station or express cabinet. In addition, the 'Temporary Regulations for Express Delivery' Article 25 stipulates that express business enterprises should deliver the express to the agreed recipient's address, recipient, or recipient's designated recipient, and inform the recipient or recipient to check in person. The recipient or recipient has the right to check in person. Therefore, you can request the courier to deliver the package to your door. If the courier refuses to deliver to the door, he must first obtain your consent. If you disagree, he must deliver to the door. In addition, according to the 'Regulations on the Promotion of Express Delivery Industry in Zhejiang Province', couriers should cooperate with home delivery. You can write down the demand for home delivery on the face sheet, or clearly demand home delivery, both are possible. If not, you can be fined less than 500, serious cases can be fined 2k. If the courier does not cooperate, remember to record or keep clear evidence in time.
Can I have the courier deliver the package to my home?

How many kilometers can Xiaopeng G9 run on a full charge?

The usage methods of hair lotion and hair conditioner are indeed different. Hair lotion can be used at any time, because it has a good moisturizing effect, you can apply it when you feel your hair is dry. While hair conditioner is used directly on wet hair after shampooing, and rinsed clean in about 5 minutes. The specific usage method is as follows: First, comb your hair and wet the ends. Then, use your cheap and large bowl of hair conditioner, apply it evenly on the ends of the hair, don't touch the scalp. Next, use cling film to wrap the ends of the hair, wait for 10-15 minutes. Then, wash your hair normally, you can use it twice, then use the hair conditioner again, this time 3-5 minutes is OK. Finally, after washing, use a towel to absorb the water until it doesn't drip, then blow it to 80% dry.
Then what are their different usage methods?

There are several ways to make osmanthus mochi. One is osmanthus brown sugar mochi, the ingredients needed are mochi, osmanthus brown sugar, white sugar, and a little cooking oil. The method is to dissolve the osmanthus brown sugar in some hot water, then heat the pan and pour in oil, put in the mochi and fry it until it's golden on both sides, then pour in the osmanthus brown sugar water, cook it on high heat until it's thick, and coat it with syrup. Another is osmanthus honey mochi, the ingredients needed are 240g glutinous rice flour, 185g warm water, 60g brown sugar, 1 bowl of water, and osmanthus honey. The method is to mix the glutinous rice flour with warm water to form a dough, divide it into 6 parts, flatten them, put the brown sugar in a bowl, add 1 bowl of water and mix until dissolved. Smear a layer of oil, put in the glutinous rice cake, fry until golden on both sides, pour in brown sugar water, heat until sticky, and drizzle osmanthus honey when serving. Another is osmanthus mochi, the ingredients needed are 100g glutinous rice flour, 40g white sugar, 50g starch, 150g milk, and some osmanthus. The method is to mix well, steam it for 25 minutes, while it's still hot, add a piece of butter and stir it into a ball, at this point, you can add the cooked glutinous rice flour and shape it into any shape you like.
Then how is osmanthus mochi made?

There are many ways to match a sweatshirt. Here are six common ones: 1. Sweatshirt + shirt for a casual and free style that shows a sense of taste. 2. Longshan Temple is a thousand-year-old temple in Jinjiang, covering an area of 4250 square meters. In front of the main hall, there are a pair of octagonal green jade stone dragon pillars built in the Qing Dynasty, and a wooden carving of Thousand-Hand Guanyin, which is 4.2 meters tall in total, has been listed as a provincial cultural relics protection unit. The courtyard also hangs a thousand-pound ancient bell, which is simple in shape and carved with the four characters of 'Tianzhu Zhong Fan' on the waist. It is one of the eight scenes of Anhai. In addition, Guoen Temple, also known as Longshan Temple, is located at the foot of Longshan in Liuzu Town, Xinxing County, Yunfu City, Guangdong Province. Since the Tang Dynasty, Guoen Temple has been regarded as the first holy land in Lingnan by the Buddhist community. It is known as the 'Southland's Blessed Land and Dongyue's Famous Mountain'. Guoen Temple contains separate stone archways at the entrance of the temple, the mountain gate, the Dharma Hall, the life release pond, the bead pavilion, the first land archway, the Vajra Hall, the Daxiong Hall, and the Liuzu Hall. The three main halls in Guoen Temple, the 'First Land' archway at the mountain gate, and the altar stone tablets, terraces, etc. are all unique ancient buildings.
What's special about Longshan Temple?

If you spray the setting spray first, it may affect the effect of the subsequent makeup. According to the principle of makeup, wet products should be applied first, followed by dry products, to prevent dry and wet from mixing, which can easily cause uneven makeup and balling up. Setting spray is a wet product, so it should be applied before dry products, such as loose powder. If you have special requirements for the durability of the makeup, you can also use it multiple times before foundation, after foundation, after concealer, to create a solid and durable base makeup effect. In addition, if you spray setting spray first, it can weaken the powdery feeling on the face, and the overall makeup will be set more firmly.
So what happens if you spray the setting spray first?

After the water is slightly dry or digested and absorbed, usually after 2~3 minutes of gentleness, pour some essence water in the palm of your hand, apply it lightly to the face in the same way, and knead it for 2~3 minutes. At this time, after it is digested and absorbed, take out the Weather Milk Eye Cream, close the ring finger and thumb together, apply the appropriate amount of eye cream to the fingertips, and apply it evenly around the eye area in a clockwise direction. The character 'Yang' has multiple meanings. Its original meaning is a general term for plants belonging to the genus Populus in the willow family, including poplars and willows, which hold special positions in Chinese culture and history and are often used as themes for poetry, literary works, and artistic creations. In addition, the character 'Yang' is also often endowed with emotional and symbolic meanings. In ancient times, people often used the character 'Yang' as a metaphor for the masculinity of men. Furthermore, the character 'Yang' is also the surname of the Yang family, which originated from the Yang state during the Spring and Autumn Period (now Hongtong County, Shanxi Province). The surname Yang is a typical multi-ethnic, multi-source surname, mainly derived from the Ji surname and a few ethnic groups changing their surnames, etc. Finally, in the name 'Yang Xin', 'Yang' is the surname, common in Chinese surnames, without a fixed specific meaning, and 'Xin' is a Chinese character, expressing joy, happiness, and cheerfulness.
So what does the character 'Yang' mean?

Firstly, washing the nose has many benefits, such as reducing the bacteria, viruses and other microbes remaining and breeding in the nasal cavity, cleaning the remaining nasal mucus in the nasal cavity, reducing nasal congestion, making breathing smoother, and also has a very good effect on alleviating swelling and edema of nasal tissues. Secondly, we can try using Huai Yam to nourish the spleen and stomach, which is a very good spleen tonic and is also a cold-treatment diet recommended by Luo Dalun. Especially when the child's cold is almost better, or only has a bit of nasal voice, or coughs a few times a day, feeding the child Huai Yam is very helpful. The method is very simple, 30 grams of dried Huai Yam, boiled for half an hour, and drink as water. The amount of water boiled is the amount of water the child drinks that day. When the cold is almost better, drink for 3 consecutive days. As long as the child drinks water during these 3 days, he drinks Huai Yam water. In addition, we can also try using ginger to fry, and then apply it to the Yongquan point, then put on socks, sleep for a night and take it off the next morning, apply for three days.
Then what should we do if it's a cold?

In addition to CT scans, there are other methods to determine the amount of alveolar bone. For example, we can use the root measurement method. The plane taken by the root measurement should overlap with the root canal image. When measuring the height of the near-median and far-median alveolar bone, the baseline of the buccal-lingual direction overlaps with the root canal image. When measuring the height of the buccal and lingual alveolar bone, the baseline of the near and far median surfaces should overlap with the root canal of the near and far median surfaces. In this way, the relatively accurate height of the buccal side, lingual side, near median side, and far median side of the alveolar bone can be measured. When the root is curved, it should overlap with the root canal as much as possible in order to measure the actual height of the alveolar bone. Of course, there will be systematic errors.
Besides CT scans, are there other methods to determine the amount of alveolar bone?

When using a multimeter, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, before using the multimeter, you should do a 'mechanical zeroing', that is, when there is no measured electric quantity, make the multimeter pointer point to the zero voltage or zero current position. Secondly, during the use of the multimeter, you should not touch the metal part of the meter pen with your hand. This can both ensure the accuracy of the measurement and also ensure personal safety. In addition, when measuring a certain electric quantity, you should not shift gears while measuring, especially when measuring high voltage or large current. Otherwise, the multimeter will be damaged. If you need to shift gears, you should first disconnect the meter pen, and then measure after shifting gears. The multimeter must be placed horizontally when in use to avoid errors. At the same time, be careful to avoid the influence of external magnetic fields on the multimeter. Finally, after using the multimeter, the conversion switch should be placed in the highest gear of AC voltage. If not used for a long time, the battery inside the multimeter should be taken out to avoid corroding other devices inside the meter.
How to use a multimeter?

Olive oil is a good source of unsaturated fatty acids, especially monounsaturated fatty acids. Every 100 grams of olive oil contains about 73 grams of monounsaturated fatty acids and about 11 grams of polyunsaturated fatty acids. Olive oil also contains a rich amount of vitamin E and other antioxidants, and has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects. On the other hand, flaxseed oil contains a large amount of α-linolenic acid (ALA), which is a polyunsaturated fatty acid. Every 100 grams of flaxseed oil contains about 53 grams of ALA, which is an essential fatty acid that cannot be synthesized by the human body and must be ingested from food. Flaxseed oil also contains other polyunsaturated fatty acids, such as linoleic acid and oleic acid, as well as some antioxidants, such as vitamin E and anthocyanins. In terms of taste, olive oil has a relatively strong taste, with a certain bitterness and fruity flavor. Its texture is relatively thick, suitable for cooking and baking, and can also be used as a seasoning. Flaxseed oil has a lighter taste, with a fresh grassy flavor, and its texture is thinner, suitable for use as a raw food oil, for making salad dressings and sauces, etc. In terms of cooking methods, flaxseed oil is not suitable for high-temperature cooking, because it has a high content of unsaturated fatty acids, which can easily oxidize when heated and produce harmful substances. Olive oil, on the other hand, can be used at moderate temperatures, suitable for various cooking methods such as stir-frying and grilling.
What is the difference between flaxseed oil and olive oil?

The normal temperature for car coolant is between 80 and 90 degrees Celsius. If the temperature is lower than 80 degrees Celsius, it means that the water temperature is too low; if it is higher than 90 degrees Celsius, the water temperature is too high. Both high and low water temperatures will affect the rotation state and performance of the engine. When the pointer of the water temperature gauge is in the middle position, the temperature is around 80 to 90 degrees Celsius. This temperature is within the normal range. In addition, the normal working temperature of small cars is 80 degrees—105 degrees (with antifreeze added), and the normal water temperature is usually maintained at about 90 degrees. Ordinary small cars should not exceed 100 degrees for a long time or 105 degrees is the limit temperature.

The daily calorie intake varies depending on gender and weight. Generally speaking, the daily calorie intake for women is between 1200 and 1600 kcal, and for men is between 1400 and 1800 kcal. The specific calculation formula is: Daily total calorie requirement=standard weight (kg) × daily calorie requirement per kg of standard weight (kcal). First, you need to calculate your BMI (body fatness standard), then calculate your standard weight, and finally calculate your daily calorie requirement per kg of standard weight. If you want to lose fat, you need to create a calorie deficit according to the calculated daily calorie intake. For example, if your target weight is 50kg, then your daily total calorie intake should be 50*30=1500Kcal. In addition, the calorie ratio of each meal is 3:4:3, that is, the morning meal is 450 Kcal, the afternoon meal is 600 Kcal, and the evening meal is 450 Kcal.
So how many calories do I need to consume daily?

There are several ways to make Kong Yang Potato Rice. One is the Potato Crusted Rice method, which includes the following steps: First, soak the rice in boiling water for about half an hour, then put the glutinous rice in the rice cooker to cook. During the cooking of the rice, prepare the potatoes, peel and slice them, of course, other shapes can also be used, but it is best to keep the size and thickness uniform. After the rice is cooked, it can be covered with potatoes. Add a little more sesame oil, fry the potatoes to golden color, remember to add a little salt. Then spread the potatoes flat, cover with rice, spread evenly, add half a bowl of water, cover and simmer on low heat, simmer until the water is dry, it is basically cooked. Finally, use a spatula to see if there is a golden crust on the edge, if not, simmer for a while, but pay attention to whether the water is dry, remember to use low heat, be careful not to burn. Another is the method of making Cured Meat Potato Rice, which includes boiling the rice until it can be pinched off with fingernails, preparing green beans, potatoes, cured meat or sausage, bamboo shoots, garlic, heating the pot, adding vegetable oil and lard, adding garlic, stir frying until fragrant, then adding green beans and other ingredients, stir frying, adding some salt, soy sauce, black pepper powder. Finally, put the rice on top, add half a bowl of water around the edge of the pot, cook for a few minutes on medium heat, then simmer on low heat.
So, how do you make Kong Yang Potato Rice?

Yes, besides the eyes, blue light can also affect other parts of the baby's body. Blue light can penetrate the skin tissue, and in the short term, it can make the skin easily dim and turn black. In the long term, it can accelerate aging. Specifically, blue light can promote the increase of melanin production, increase the production of reactive oxygen species, making the skin lax and dull, growing spots and fine lines, and even destroy our skin's self-repair function, affecting the secretion of melatonin, so it looks easy to age. In addition, blue light can penetrate the epidermis of the skin, reaching the dermis and subcutaneous tissue, accelerating the loss of human collagen, causing skin aging. The penetration of blue light on the skin is stronger than ultraviolet light, it is the main culprit in causing macula, freckles. Therefore, we need to avoid blue light from the source, such as reducing the use of electronic products, insisting on applying sunscreen, not only against ultraviolet light, but also against some blue light, you can stick a blue light filter film on your computer, tablet, and mobile phone, which can filter out some blue light, after it gets dark, switch your phone to night mode, because usually in this mode, its blue light will be relatively less.

It takes about a few days or a week to plant after drying. With the right care, new seedlings can grow from the position where the leaf is removed.

When choosing formula milk for the elderly, there are several key points to note. First, the elderly need to pay attention to the calcium content of the formula milk, because calcium loss, osteoporosis, and back pain are common problems faced by the elderly. Secondly, the elderly's digestive tract may have decreased digestive ability, slow metabolism, and loss of appetite, so they need to choose formula milk that is rich in nutrition, easy to digest and absorb, and has less burden. In addition, the elderly's heart and brain may have high blood lipids, high blood pressure, and heart/brain vascular problems, so they need to choose formula milk that is low in fat, low in sugar, and high in quality nutrition. Finally, the elderly's immunity may be reduced, so they need to choose formula milk that is rich in nutrition, high in protein, high in iron, and various trace elements. In general, the elderly need to choose formula milk that is high in protein, high in calcium, high in iron, low in fat, low in sugar, and easy to absorb.
Any advice on choosing formula milk for the elderly?

The correct way to walk is to let our heel, arch, and forefoot evenly step on the ground, and when taking a step, we can raise the knee joint about 2 cm before stepping out. The sequence of landing on the sole of the foot is: the heel—outside of the toe ball—inside of the big toe ball—big toe. When the front foot is ready to land on the palm, the back foot lifts the heel. When stepping out, the foot must land from the heel to the palm, you can lift the toes to let the heel land first, there is a feeling of showing the soles of your shoes to others. Grip the ground with your toes. While gripping the ground with the front toe, shift the weight forward, don't think that the back leg has nothing to do with it! The back leg must have a force to push the palm, pushing our body forward.
So how do I maintain a correct walking posture?

The Phoenician Face Glass making technique has many characteristics. First of all, the Phoenicians were known for their merchants and peddlers, and jewelry, with its value and small size, played an important role in exchange and trade. Secondly, Phoenician jewelry making existed from the Canaanite period, it was not only a handicraft, but also an art related to the rich Levantine art tradition, and was inspired by Egyptian style. The Phoenicians excelled in using glass paste, especially in making beads and pendants with glass, which was very original and completely changed luxury handicrafts. The technique is one of the most common techniques in making pendant characters and collar elements, known as 'for making core sand or clay or fragile sand core'. This wet core is adjusted according to the required shape, it is wrapped in a piece of canvas, fixed at the end of a stick, and inserted into a crucible filled with molten glass. In the second stage, it rotates on a metal or stone plate to obtain a smooth and uniform surface, and then removes the core. This work requires multiple dips and modifications, and it can also be facilitated by using molds. Finally, multicolored glass paste is the original invention to replace the study of usually difficult and expensive gems. These original jewels were made in the cities of the Eastern Phoenicians (Byblos, Sidon, Tyre...) and territories under Phoenician influence (Carthage, Tarros, Syracuse, Ibiza Island).
What are the characteristics of the Phoenician Face Glass making technique?

Nowadays, more and more pregnant mothers have gestational diabetes, but it was rare 30 years ago. One of the main reasons is that people eat better now, and they consume too many refined carbohydrates, high sugar and high oil. During pregnancy, it is recommended to reduce refined rice and refined noodles, and replace them with coarse grain rice, corn, purple potatoes, yam, oatmeal and other low-GI staple foods. Finally, you can try to eat vegetables until you are full, and reduce staple food appropriately. Many pregnant mothers with gestational diabetes like to eat a lot of staple food and fruit in the early and middle stages of pregnancy. There is no need to increase the intake of staple food during pregnancy, especially rice, rice noodles, and pasta. You can choose to eat more vegetables, supplement protein, dietary fiber, and you can also feel full. But pay attention to not completely stop eating staple food in order to control weight, ketone rise is more harmful than sugar rise.
So, if I want to reduce the intake of carbohydrates, what should I do?

The treatment of fetal clubfoot mainly depends on the severity of the disease. For some children with more serious disease, such as those with local bone deformities, surgery is needed for correction. At this time, it may be necessary to perform osteotomy and internal fixation on relevant parts, and then relax the corresponding soft tissues. In addition, after surgery, the child needs to wear corresponding supports and be guided in functional exercises.

If your skin is penetrated by a single or multiple bites or scratches, or your skin is licked, it falls under Level III exposure. In this case, you also need immediate treatment and vaccination. In addition, if you are unsure whether your skin is broken, you can first observe carefully with your eyes. Hairy crabs can indeed be frozen, but it's best not to use household freezing equipment for preservation. Because the home freezing equipment is just ordinary freezing, and the temperature in the freezer is very low, which will cause the texture and flavor of the hairy crabs to change. If the frozen hairy crabs are heated again, there will usually be severe dehydration of the muscle tissue, serious loss of juice, leading to a worse taste, and the flavor of hairy crabs will become weaker. However, if you use professional freezing equipment, such as a variable frequency deep freezing vertical cabinet, the hairy crabs can stay away from gray and yellow, poor taste, and maintain lasting freshness, making your taste buds bloom every day.

To care for Green Sakura Bougainvillea in winter, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, Green Sakura Bougainvillea is a plant with strong heat resistance and poor cold resistance. In winter, you need to pay attention to keeping warm when the temperature is below eight degrees. If the temperature is below five degrees, it may even suffer from frost damage. Therefore, you need to move it back indoors and place it in a well-lit place, ensuring that the temperature does not drop below 5 degrees. Secondly, you need to pay attention to watering. Although the ground-planted Green Sakura Bougainvillea is a plant that does not need watering, its root system will stretch to the moist water underground. However, in winter, due to the low temperature, the soil may dry out, so you need to water it appropriately. Finally, you need to pay attention to fertilizing. When fertilizing, you need to adjust according to the fertility of the land. If the land is fertile, you can directly apply some phosphorus and potassium compound fertilizers during its growth period. If the land is poor, you need to first apply some nitrogen fertilizer to care for the land, and then apply phosphorus and potassium fertilizer.
How to care for Green Sakura Bougainvillea in winter?

'Innocent childhood friends' is a Chinese idiom, which means two children who have been playing together since they were young, without any suspicion, and have a very close relationship. This idiom is often used to describe the pure friendship and feelings between children, and can also be used to describe the deep feelings and trust between two people, without any suspicion and estrangement. For example, you can say: 'They have been good friends who are 'innocent childhood friends' since they were young, and they have always maintained a deep friendship.' In addition, 'innocent childhood friends' also means that boys and girls play together when they are young, they are innocent and romantic, there is no suspicion, it also describes that boys and girls have good feelings from a young age, pure feelings. For example, 'living together in Changgan, the two children have no suspicion.' It means we live together in Changgan, the two children have no suspicion since childhood. In general, 'innocent childhood friends' are a pair of partners who are in perfect harmony, as if destined to explore the mysteries of the world together. Whether it's the joy of chasing kites together, or the endless imagination of reading books together, they can always find a tacit smile in each other's eyes. They communicate with their hearts, and connect each other with pure friendship. Whether it's laughter or tears, they always support each other and protect each other's happiness together.
What about 'innocent childhood friends'?

There are indeed some precautions for wearing a silver bracelet. First, it is important to note that silver is a heavy metal and can be harmful to the body. However, because gold and silver are relatively stable in chemical properties, high-purity gold and silver are very unlikely to cause allergies. Therefore, people who are prone to allergies should choose pure gold and pure silver, and should not wear alloy jewelry, and jewelry with uncertain ingredients such as Tibetan silver, Miao silver, and silver-plated. Secondly, due to the special nature of silver, improper maintenance can easily cause it to blacken or darken. At this time, we need to pay attention to its maintenance in daily life, so that we can wear it often and stay new, and use silver to nourish people. In addition, it is recommended to wipe the silver jewelry clean with a soft cloth and then store it in a sealed bag after each wear, which can extend the use time of the silver jewelry. Don't wear silver jewelry when taking a bath, because the chemicals in toiletries can easily accelerate the oxidation of silver. Finally, silver jewelry will turn black when it comes into contact with water, air, cosmetics, or sulfur soap and other chemicals, so daily care is needed.
So, are there any precautions for wearing a silver bracelet?

For people with back pain, a mattress that is too hard will cause the spine to lose its natural curvature, while a soft one cannot support the waist and will cause extra pressure. Therefore, a mattress that is too hard or too soft is not suitable for people with back pain. Choosing a mattress of medium hardness can relieve back pain. In addition, the height of the mattress is also important. A mattress that is too high will increase the difficulty of getting on and off the bed, while a low one will cause difficulty in getting up. Both too high and too low are not conducive to waist health. Therefore, choosing a mattress of suitable height can reduce the risk of aggravated back pain symptoms. For example, for people with lumbar disc herniation, the mattress should be of moderate hardness and supportive. In general, a hard mattress is more suitable for people with back pain.

To prevent stomatitis in cats, we can start from the following aspects: First, regularly check the oral health of cats, brush cats' teeth or use tooth cleaning powder. Second, when there is bad breath and gums have red lines, you must intervene in time. You can eat compound Banlangen, and then use a flower spray. If the cat's tongue coating is white in the middle, give some spleen pills. In addition, cultivate a good habit of eating jerky (harder food) from a young age. If cats eat liquid soft canned food for a long time, not only will their tooth function regress, but they will also easily breed bacteria and tartar. Provide nutritious food for cats, including high-protein, high-vitamin cat food. Finally, the earlier stomatitis is found and treated, the better. In daily life, regular vaccination and physical examination can prevent stomatitis caused by calicivirus. Pay attention to the oral hygiene of the cat and develop the good habit of brushing teeth. If the cat resists brushing teeth, you can prepare mouthwash, tooth cleaning powder, tooth cleaning sticks, etc. Feed low-allergenic food to reduce the probability of allergies. When novice drivers encounter the need to stop the car on a slope, especially when the slope is large, the correct operation steps are very important. First, pull up the handbrake first, then hang up the P gear, manually push the gear lever into the gear. In addition, when the vehicle stalls, immediately brake, return to neutral, pull the handbrake. This is because if you start with gear, you will fail directly. Quickly calm down, pause for a few seconds, think about the order of restarting. Reignite, hang first gear, right foot brake, left foot slowly lift clutch to find half linkage point. When the vehicle starts to shake violently, hold the clutch steady, slowly release the brake. If the vehicle starts to move forward, don't lift the clutch anymore; if the vehicle remains stationary, lift the clutch a little more until it starts to move forward. Familiarize and correctly control the clutch half linkage; after reaching the half linkage point, the right foot slowly releases the foot brake pedal.
Have you considered that it might be a problem with the brakes?

Light and shadow are important elements in art, they can help us present the three-dimensionality of objects. Shadow is the extension of the light source, it is a method to present the three-dimensionality of objects. In painting, shadow is indispensable, especially for sketching. Before learning to judge, you need to have a general understanding of light. The light position refers to the specific location of the lamp in three-dimensional space. After confirming the source of light, you can confirm the angle and distance of the light based on the shadow. Height: You can think of the light as a sun. If you stand still, the higher the sun rises, the shorter the shadow, and vice versa. Distance: You can think of the light as a sun. If you stand still, the closer the sun is to you, the stronger the shadow, and vice versa. In addition, the change of the angle and distance of the light irradiation will cause the size of the shadow to change.
How to understand light and shadow?

Lao She was called a 'people's artist' because he successfully portrayed the lives of urban commoners and strived to show the pleasing changes of the new society. His language was vivid and his style was unique. For example, his drama 'Dragon Beard Ditch' vividly contrasted the new and old societies, praised the party and the People's Government's care for the working people, and created some vivid characters such as Cheng Fengzi and Old Man Zhao. In addition, his novel 'Rickshaw Boy' reflected the pain of the vast number of working people living at the bottom of the city and exposed the evil of the old society. This work took Xiangzi as the main character and revolved around Xiangzi's actions. There were two main lines. One was Xiangzi's 'pulling a cart and buying his own cart', depicting how he strived hard and struggled constantly to become a free cart puller. In the end, his hope was shattered and he fell into a deeper abyss of suffering. The other was Xiangzi's entanglement with tigers, Little Fortune, Mrs. Xia, and other women, which was twisted with the main line, constantly pushing the development of the plot. 'Rickshaw Boy' is Lao She's masterpiece and one of the best novels in modern literary history. Since its publication, it has been translated into more than a dozen languages and has won Lao She world reputation.
Why could he become a people's artist?

To prevent rabies, we need to understand the following points: First, the degree of exposure to rabies virus determines the method of treatment. For example, grade I exposure does not require medical treatment, just wash the contact area; grade II exposure requires immediate wound treatment and rabies vaccine inoculation; grade III exposure requires immediate wound treatment, use of rabies passive immunity agent, and rabies vaccine inoculation. Secondly, the method of wound irrigation is to use soap water and pressurized flowing water to rinse the wound for at least 15 minutes. After rinsing, disinfect the wound with iodine or alcohol. The time of using passive immunity agents is as soon as possible, if not used on time, should be used within 7 days of the first dose of the rabies vaccine. The method of rabies vaccine vaccination is intramuscular injection, the vaccination time is 5-dose method: inject 1 dose each on days 0, 3, 7, 14, 28; 4-dose method: 2-1-1, inject 2 doses on day 0, and 1 dose each on days 7, 21. If bitten or scratched again, the method of vaccination is: completed full course of vaccination, within half a year: no need for re-vaccination; half a year to one year: inject 1 dose each on days 0, 3; 1-3 years: inject 1 dose each on days 0, 3, 7; over 3 years: full course of vaccination should be restarted. Finally, the best way to prevent rabies is to get the rabies vaccine, vaccines are no small matter, early vaccination for early prevention.
So how should we prevent rabies?

The size chart for cutting fabric for a duvet cover can be calculated according to the following methods. For regular cotton fabric, you can calculate it as follows: (width of your own quilt + 10cm) *2, the length of your quilt + 10cm is the length of the quilt. For example, for a 1.2 meter bed, the size of the duvet cover is 160*210cm, the size of the sheet is 180*230cm, and the size of the pillowcase is 48*74cm. For a 1.5/1.8 meter bed, the size of the duvet cover is 200*230cm, the size of the sheet is 230*230cm, and the size of the pillowcase is 48*74cm. In addition, if your bed is 1.8m×2m, the size of the bed cover can be calculated as follows: Bed cover size Length / width + mattress thickness ×2 + seam allowance ×2, for example, 200cm+25cm×2+10cm×2＝270cm, 180cm +25cm×2+10cm×2＝250cm.
How to make a size chart for cutting fabric for a duvet cover?

The temperature of making bread is indeed a key factor. If the temperature is too high, it will not be conducive to the formation and stability of gluten, which will affect the texture of the bread. If the temperature is too low, the bread will also have an unexpected sense of weight, fermentation is not enough, lack of flavor, the color of baking is heavy, the skin is thick. Therefore, the dough temperature should be below 28 degrees when kneading, and the final dough temperature should be below 26 degrees. The suitable temperature for the first fermentation is 28 degrees, and the suitable temperature for the second fermentation is 35 degrees. As for the baking temperature, it is a very important factor that affects whether the bread is successful or delicious. However, due to different oven heating methods, different brands, even products from the same manufacturer may have temperature deviations, so you need to adjust according to the actual situation.

The method of roasting chicken breast is actually very simple. First, you need to prepare the following ingredients: 2 pieces of chicken breast, 2-3 potatoes, 1 whole garlic, and 30g of butter. Next, you need to prepare the following marinade: 1 spoon of sea salt, 1 spoon of black pepper, 1 bottle cap of concentrated lemon juice, 2 spoons of smoked chili sauce, 1 spoon of cumin powder, and 2 spoons of olive oil. The cooking steps are as follows: 1. Clean the chicken breast and wipe off the surface water, cut into large pieces and put into the bowl, pour in the above marinade, knead and marinate for 30 minutes; 2. Peel and cut the potatoes into pieces, put them into boiling water and cook for 15 minutes, until they are soft and glutinous, then remove and drain the water; 3. Put the peeled garlic and cooked potatoes into the bowl together, put in 30g of butter while hot, then sprinkle some sea salt and black pepper for seasoning, stir until the butter is melted, then put in the marinated chicken breast, stir a little and spread it on the baking tray, put it into the preheated oven, bake at 210 degrees for 30 minutes, take it out of the oven and serve, done~

To determine the position and diameter of the rebar, you can use a reinforcing bar detector. Before detection, the rebar detector should be preheated and zeroed, and the probe should be kept away from metal objects when zeroing. Before detection, it is advisable to understand the layout of the reinforcing bars in combination with the design data. During the detection, avoid the reinforcing bar joints and binding wires, and initially locate the reinforcing bars to be tested. Move the probe regularly on the detection surface until the instrument shows the strongest reception signal or the minimum protection thickness value. At this time, the centerline of the probe basically coincides with the axis of the rebar, and the thickness of the rebar protective layer can be read. In addition, the multi-functional concrete rebar detector is a device used to detect the quantity, diameter, layout and protective layer thickness of rebars in concrete structures.
How should I determine the position and diameter of the rebar?

In addition to the routine blood test and routine urine test, the endocrinology department will also conduct some other examinations. For example, prostate fluid examination, which helps us to find out which kind of bacteria causes the lesion. Routine semen examination is mainly used to check male fertility and some reproductive and urinary diseases. B-ultrasound examination is commonly used to examine diseases of the kidneys, ureters, bladder, and prostate. Testicular biopsy can check whether there is azoospermia or oligospermia, directly check the spermatogenic function of the testicular seminiferous tubules and the development of interstitial cells, and the synthesis and metabolism of local hormones can be reflected by immunohistochemical staining. Male reproductive endocrine examination mainly involves the determination of sex hormones T, FSH, LH, PRL, E2 and various stimulation tests. Sexually transmitted disease examination includes urethral exudate smear, blood test for syphilis, AIDS, hepatitis C, hepatitis B, etc., and examination of the external genitalia for abnormalities.
What else will be checked?

There are several ways to prevent high bone salt levels. First, you can increase the intake of total protein nutrition, diversify the sources of protein, not only the sources of high-quality protein in food, but also increase the intake of collagen protein. Secondly, change high sodium diet habits, pay attention not only to the amount of table salt, but also to the sodium content in dining out and pre-packaged foods, less salt. In addition, eat more fresh vegetables, fruits, original flavored foods, sunbathe more, exercise more, promote the absorption of calcium, increase the metabolism of bone salt, and not just supplement calcium. Increasing the intake of B vitamins should also help energy metabolism, and our daily diet usually does not meet the B vitamins standard. Drinking more water to increase metabolism is also a good method. Finally, you can eat more high-protein, high-calcium foods, such as lean meat, fish, tofu, etc., and then prevent osteoporosis. If you want to metabolize the high bone salt, you can strengthen functional exercises, physical exercises, promote metabolism, accelerate local blood circulation, and the blood metabolism can metabolize the relatively high bone salt. Lastly, eat less food with high bone salt content, such as using less salt when stir-frying, eating lighter, avoiding intake of high-salt foods such as pickles, and lowering the bone salt level through the above methods.
How to prevent high bone salt levels?

In the early stages of anal cancer, patients may experience difficulty defecating and changes in defecation habits, accompanied by abdominal bloating and intermittent abdominal pain. In the later stages of colorectal cancer, the tumor can cause pain due to blocking the intestine, or pain can occur due to intestinal dysfunction, generally the pain will occur in the lower abdomen, with a feeling of anal prolapse.

The correct way to walk in high heels includes several key points. First, you need to tense the arch of your foot to control the angle between the front sole of the shoe and the ground. When it is basically the same as flat shoes, you can keep your knees straight and walk naturally. The strength of tensing the arch of your foot needs to be adjusted according to the height of the heel. If you tense too much, the front of your foot will touch the ground first. If not enough, the transition from the heel to the front of the foot when landing is not smooth. When tensed just right, walking is as smooth as with flat shoes. Secondly, ankle control is particularly important, stabilize the ankle to stabilize the foot and confidently take each step. In addition, high heels will change the slope of our feet, so when you step out, you don't need to hook your toes, just lightly tense them. When landing, straighten your knees but don't lock them. Finally, the main point is to straighten your leg when you stride out, and the heel should touch the ground first.
So how do you wear them and walk correctly?

On the other hand, bezel setting is the part below the waist of the gemstone sealed in the metal bracket. Customers who do not want to unpack the painting immediately can keep it for a while. Hand roll film is used to fix the foam corner guard strips, which can be easily removed. In addition, the innermost layer of oil painting packaging is usually pearl cotton, which prevents the painting from sticking to the packaging; then wrap several layers with bubble pads to prevent bumps, and the gaps on all sides should be filled with foam; customize a wooden box that fits the size of the work (slightly larger than the size of the work); make opening marks, handle with care, and other safety tips on the outer wooden box. To accurately judge the position of the line, you can refer to the following methods. Firstly, for the distance between the body and the sideline, the new rule of the driving test is: 'Deduct 10 points for more than 30 cm and less than 50 cm, and fail directly if the distance is more than 50 cm.' Therefore, you need to pay attention to the distance between the body and the sideline. Secondly, you can adjust the position of the body according to the following rules: 'Can be adjusted multiple times', 'The speed should be slowed down', 'Adjust in small increments', 'Move towards the side in advance'. In addition, you can try more reference objects, such as the rearview mirror, to help you judge the position of the line. Finally, you can use two methods to judge whether the body is just 30 cm away from the right side: one is to sit in the car and look at the wiper height point at the front of the car, when the height point intersects with the right sideline, the body is 30 cm away from the right side; the other is to look at the right rearview mirror, when the body is about one finger wide from the right line in the right rearview mirror, it also indicates that the body is 30 cm away from the right side.

According to the 'National Physical Health Standards' issued by the Ministry of Education, at the time of graduation, if a student's 'fitness test' total score is less than 50 points, he or she will be considered as a dropout; in the previous year, if a student's 'fitness test' score reaches the school's requirements, he or she can participate in the merit and award evaluation. Therefore, the college students' fitness test scores should be included in the graduation evaluation. The 'fitness test' total score at the time of graduation consists of the total score of the 'fitness test' in the fourth school year and the average score of the 'fitness test' in the first three school years, each accounting for 50%. For five-year program students and extended graduates, they only participate in the 'standard' test in the fourth school year, and the score is evaluated by the sum of 50% of the total score in the fourth school year and the average score of the total score in other school years.

The main steps to use ovulation test strips are as follows: First, take the mid-segment urine with a clean, dry urine cup. Then, immerse the end of the ovulation test strip with an arrow mark line into the urine, making sure not to exceed the MAX mark line, otherwise the result is invalid. After about 5-8 seconds, when you see the red climbing in the display area, take it out and let it color for 10 minutes. Then, you can gently scan the test strip with the pregnancy orange app to check the real-time intelligent reading results and analysis. Finally, open the curve page to view the LH hormone change curve based on the intelligent ovulation test strip. Please note that the test should be conducted between 10 a.m. and 10 p.m., and morning urine should not be used. To avoid missing the peak of the ovulation test strip, you should test at the frequency suggested by the app. Two hours before the test, you should reduce water intake, as diluted urine can lead to an inability to detect the LH peak. Once a weak positive result is detected, start testing every 4 hours, and the pregnancy orange app will automatically analyze and determine the peak. After the intelligent ovulation test strip is photographed and entered into the app, there is no need to save it, just discard it.
How to use ovulation test strips?

Prolactin is a polypeptide protein hormone secreted by the pituitary gland, mainly responsible for promoting the development of the R room and the secretion of milk. It acts on lactating cells to produce milk. In addition, prolactin also has three characteristics: the more frequent the milk is sucked, the more prolactin in the body, the more milk is stored, the less prolactin. Therefore, if a mother wants to increase the amount of milk, she must suck frequently and feed frequently; if she is weaning, the time interval for milk discharge should be extended. The frequency of sucking milk at night is about 3-4 hours. Also, the secretion of prolactin at night is ten times that of the day. Night milk discharge will increase the amount of prolactin. If you sleep all night, mothers with more milk may get mastitis due to engorgement, and mothers with less milk will have less prolactin and the amount of milk will significantly decrease. Prolactin, also known as lactogenic hormone, is a protein hormone. The secretion of prolactin is affected by estrogen, progesterone, and chorionic gonadotropin.
What is prolactin?

Boiling drinking is a common method of taking traditional Chinese medicine. Generally speaking, each packet of medicine is one dose, and each dose of medicine is boiled twice. The water volume is 2-3 cm above the medicine surface, about a knuckle. Before boiling the medicine, first soak the medicinal materials in cold water for half an hour, then boil the soaked medicinal materials with high heat, then turn to low heat and cook for another 25-30 minutes to finish the first boil. Immediately filter out the medicine juice, add clear water in the medicine residue to cook the second time, the water volume is still 2-3 cm above the medicine surface. After boiling with high heat, turn to low heat and cook for 20-25 minutes. In addition, boiling Chinese medicine is different from boiling tea, you can't directly add water to boil, many Chinese medicinal materials are relatively dry, if you directly add water to boil, it is difficult to fully release its medicinal effects.
What does boiling drinking mean?

White balance is a very important setting for both photo shooting and video recording. It can help us restore the white objects in reality to the correct white. In the camera, white balance is provided, and it's one of the most important controls for shooting color. The color temperature in the camera is opposite to the actual color temperature of the light source, which is the working principle of white balance, which compensates by using the corresponding complementary color. There are many modes of white balance, including K mode, scene mode, custom mode, and AWB mode. K mode allows you to manually adjust the color temperature. If you want to be more accurate, you can customize the white balance, which requires you to find a white object and show it to the camera, telling it that the color temperature of this object has become this color in this environment. At this time, the camera will use this white object as a reference to correct the color of the object. In addition, you can also enter the camera menu, choose daylight, shadow, cloudy, etc. according to the shooting environment, or manually set the white balance K value, adjusting the white balance can correct the color of the picture. The higher the K value, the warmer the picture, the lower the K value, the colder the picture.
So, how to manually set the white balance?

Striking is an important skill in playing the drum kit. First, you need to relax your hands, which is the foundation of striking. In terms of specific striking methods, you can try the following: the thumb and index finger hold the drumstick, and the last three fingers are relaxed on the drumstick to control the rebound and exert force. At the same time, the wrist drives the up and down strike. When we are expressing emotions, we may need the forearm to exert force to achieve a better effect. In addition, you can try the following points: the back of the hand is up, the drumstick is perpendicular to the ground after lifting up, the striking point is concentrated as much as possible, and when the left and right hands strike, they go straight up and down, and the track does not bend. These are all effective striking techniques, you can try them in practice.
Then how should I practice striking?

Yes, albinism is a hereditary disease. It is an autosomal recessive disease, which means that both parents need to carry the albinism gene, but they themselves do not get sick. If both spouses pass the pathogenic gene they carry to their children at the same time, the children may get sick. In addition, there is also X-linked recessive inheritance, where only the mother passes the albinism gene to the son, and they get sick, and generally do not get sick when passed to the daughter.
Is albinism hereditary?

Rolling up shirt sleeves is not just a matter of casually rolling them up. A man's casualness should be reflected in being casual but not casual. Rolling up sleeves also needs some appropriate methods. For example, you can try the normal rolling method, which is to unbutton the first button of the sleeve, and then fold the sleeve cover twice. This method is simple and convenient and will not fall off. The visual effect is also relatively clean. The disadvantage may be that it is not rolled up high enough, the position is below the elbow, and it is not convenient to work. Another method is the master sleeve rolling method, which is to unbutton the first button of the sleeve, and then fold and pull the sleeve cover above the elbow. Smooth the part below the sleeve cover, then fold this part over the sleeve cover, make sure not to cover the sleeve cover, expose the sleeve cover, this will look better with a sense of layering. This method is a bit more complicated, it's not very easy to operate with one hand, the advantage is that the visual effect is very strong, the position is above the elbow, it's more convenient to work.
Of course, rolling up shirt sleeves is actually quite simple. First, you need to unbutton the cuff, then fold up about half of the sleeve length, slightly pull down the fabric at the cuff to form a slightly wrinkled effect, and finally tidy up, that's it.

Replacing the flower pot is a very common operation. First, you need to understand two knowledge points related to plant roots: 'The root system is hydrophilic and fertile', which means that when it can't find nutrients and water at the moment, it will automatically grow around to explore and obtain nutrients; 'Remember small roots for big pots', because in this situation, the pot soil dries slowly, continuous flooding will squeeze out the air in the pot soil gap, the roots are forced to only do anaerobic respiration, this process will produce harmful substances such as sulfides, the specific performance is what we call rotting roots. When replacing the flower pot, you need to pay attention to the following points: 1, I changed the pot because the pot has weak water storage function, the watering frequency is too high, if you find other signals (the roots are full, stiff seedlings, etc.) you can decisively change the pot; 2, choose a breathable and permeable pot one size larger for the flower pot, don’t suddenly change a much larger one, it’s easy to accumulate water and rot roots; 3, choose loose and breathable nutritional soil for the soil; 4, try not to hurt the roots of the green plants when changing the pots, otherwise the green plants will easily yellow leaves or even die; 5, be sure to press the soil tightly, if there are gaps in the soil, the roots will not grow well; 6, for the green plants that like fat, you can apply base fertilizer, autumn begonia can not add; 7, water thoroughly after changing the pot, if the soil collapses after watering, add soil.
What if I replace the flower pot?

If you don't have a square piece of paper, you can correct an irregular paper into a square. First, take out a piece of paper, fold the colored side inside the box, the color of the back is the outside of the box, use scissors to cut the paper into a square. Then, fold the four corners of the paper to the center respectively, you can fold them in pairs, find the center position after folding out the diagonal. Next, fold the four corners that are folded into the center point out along the half-height line of the large triangle. Then, fold one edge of the square at this time along the quarter line. After that, restore the folded edge, pinch the crease more clearly, do the same for the other three edges, then restore them. Press the four edges backwards along the creases folded in steps 4, 5, 6, fold the four corners inward, stabilize the four creases. Then, press one corner with your index finger, thumb and middle finger press the two edges of the corner, process the four corners in turn. Separate the two layers of edges that are folded together with your index finger, and press the bottom with your thumb. Finally, press the four edges in turn, the basic shape appears.
What if I don't have a square piece of paper?
