The correct way to cook ribs is to first rinse off the bone fragments and blood streaks with cold water, then put the ribs in cold water to blanch, remember to add scallions and ginger, pour a bottle cap of cooking wine, when the water boils, a lot of white foam will float up, then remove the ribs. Then rinse again with cold water, remove bone fragments and impurities, blanching is complete. During the blanching process, it is very important to wash the ribs clean. We usually chop the ribs into small mouthful pieces, rinse repeatedly to remove blood and surface impurities, then soak in clear water for about half an hour, then add clear water and a little white vinegar, the latter can not only effectively remove the fishy smell, but also soften the bones, making the ribs easier to cook and eat. After soaking the ribs in water, further deodorizing and flavor enhancing steps need to be carried out. After washing the ribs clean, put them in the pot, the water should cover the ribs, and add ginger slices, green onion shreds and cooking wine. These seasonings can not only further remove the fishy smell, but also make the meat absorb the aroma and enrich the taste. Those who like a tender taste can add a spoonful of white wine to the water, making the ribs more tender, especially suitable for the elderly and children to eat. Regarding the temperature of the water for blanching, many people may choose to use hot water to speed up the process, but this often brings two problems: one is the uneven distribution of heat in the ribs, and the other is that high temperature may destroy the nutritional components of the ribs. Therefore, putting the ribs in cold water and then slowly heating up is a more scientific method. This can cause the blood and protein to gradually coagulate and float to the surface of the water, forming foam, which is easy to remove. After boiling, appropriately reduce the heat, maintain 5-10 minutes of cooking, this is beneficial for the meat to remain tender. At the same time, the foam needs to be constantly removed, to keep the soup clean and odorless. After blanching, the ribs should not be stewed for too long, 5-10 minutes is usually enough, too long will make the meat hard. Finally, rinse the ribs with clear water, remove the remaining impurities and foam.
Is it correct to put ribs in boiling water or

The interrogative pronoun is used to introduce special interrogative sentences. It is mainly used to ask 'who', 'what', 'what'. For example, 'what' means 'what', used to ask about things or objects, sometimes also to ask people. For example: 'What day is it today? What is your father doing?'. 'Who' means 'who', it is the subject, used in the sentence as the subject, can only be used to ask people. For example: 'Who is singing? Who is that old lady?'. 'Whom' means 'who', it is the object of who, used to ask people, in the sentence as the object. For example: 'Whom are you waiting for?'. 'Which' means 'which one', can be used to ask people, things or objects. For example: 'Which one would you like to eat?'. 'Whose' means 'whose', used to ask 'ownership'. For example: 'Whose ticket is this?'. Interrogative pronouns are usually used at the beginning of the sentence, constituting a special interrogative sentence, in the sentence can be the subject, object, predicate or attributive.
So what does the interrogative pronoun mean?

If you want to make a Pinyin grid yourself, you can refer to the following steps: First, open the Excel spreadsheet, click on the top left corner, select all cells, and set the column width to 2 characters. Then, select the first three rows from column A to AF, set the row height to 9 points, click Merge by Row, click Other Box Lines in all box lines, choose the thinnest solid line, choose green, click Outer Border, Inner Border, and confirm. Next, select the four cells on the left of the fourth and fifth rows, choose the thinnest solid line in Other Box Lines, choose green, click Outer Border, and confirm. Then, select the four cells operated in the previous step again, choose a dotted line in Other Box Lines, choose green, click Inner Border, and confirm. A grid is out. Then, select the grid again, drag the cross cursor to the right page break, and a row of grids will appear. Select the already appeared Pinyin grid, drag the cross cursor down to the lower page break, and a page of Pinyin grids will appear. At this time, it will be found that the new Pinyin grid is wider than the first row of Pinyin grids. Select all wider Pinyin grids and set the row height to 9 points. If there is a blank space at the bottom of this page, repeat the previous step until the Pinyin grid fills the entire page. Finally, select all Pinyin grids, choose a slightly thicker solid line in Other Box Lines, click Outer Border, and confirm. Preview it and find that the Pinyin grid is not in the middle of the page, insert a column in front of column A and preview again. The Pinyin grid is in the middle of the page and can be printed.
If I make it myself, is there anything I need to pay attention to?

To prevent nuclear pollution, we can adopt the following methods: First, understand the source and degree of harm of nuclear pollution, which can be obtained through government departments, media and other reliable resources. Secondly, try to avoid activities near nuclear accidents or nuclear pollutants, and avoid contact with soil, water sources and food that may be polluted by nuclear. Choose food materials from clean places of origin as much as possible, and avoid eating agricultural products contaminated in closed areas. In addition, maintain personal hygiene, wash hands, face, and bath frequently to reduce the pollution of the external environment on the body. Especially after contact with substances that may be polluted by nuclear, thorough cleaning should be done. Nuclear pollution will produce free radicals, so you can choose to eat foods rich in antioxidants, such as fresh fruits and vegetables, to help reduce the damage of nuclear pollution to body cells. Maintain good living habits, balanced diet, reasonable arrangement of exercise and rest time, increase body immunity, which can help reduce the impact of nuclear pollution on health. Pay attention to the protective guidelines issued by the government, understand relevant emergency measures and protective measures. In case of nuclear accidents or nuclear pollution events, act strictly in accordance with the requirements of the guidelines to protect the safety of yourself and your family. Finally, pay attention to the construction and operation of nuclear facilities and nuclear-related projects, actively participate in public supervision and actions, and ensure that nuclear safety and environmental protection measures are fully implemented.
So how should we prevent nuclear pollution?

To lower your protein levels, you can try the following methods: First, you can adjust your diet, such as reducing the proportion of protein and increasing the intake of carbohydrates or fats. If you have been on a low-carb, high-protein diet for a while and want to return to a balanced diet, this method is very effective. Secondly, you can try to control your protein intake reasonably, such as calculating your daily protein intake based on your weight. For example, normal people need 1g~1.2g/kg per day, if kidney function is normal, 0.8g~1g/kg per day, if blood creatinine is elevated but less than 265 micromolar per liter, daily protein intake should be 0.6g~0.8g/kg, if blood creatinine is greater than 265 micromolar per liter, daily protein intake should be 0.4g~0.6g/kg. Finally, if you have already undergone dialysis, you should return to the normal protein intake level of normal people.
How should I lower my protein levels then?

The treatment of urinary protein positive 1+ mainly depends on the specific situation. If the 24-hour urinary protein quantification is between 0.3g and 1.5g, generally no medication treatment is needed. However, if the 24-hour urinary protein quantification is more than 1.5g, active treatment is needed to prevent the development of renal failure and uremia. In addition, if the proteinuria is accompanied by backache, fatigue, chilliness, edema, etc., it is suitable for kidney and spleen tonic, commonly used medicines are Codonopsis, Astragalus, Euryale ferox, Epimedium, etc. If the proteinuria is accompanied by symptoms such as dizziness, tinnitus, nocturnal emission, sweating, dry mouth and throat, insomnia, irritability, and dreaming, it is suitable for liver and kidney tonic, commonly used medicines include Rehmannia glutinosa, Cornus officinalis, Ligustrum lucidum, Polygonatum, Danshen, dragon bone, oyster, etc. If it is hormone-dependent nephrotic syndrome, patients with a large amount of proteinuria, renal hematuria, etc., it is suitable for blood-activating and stasis-removing treatment, commonly used medicines include safflower, chuanxiong, peony, peach kernel, Danshen, etc. If the proteinuria is caused by excessive protein intake, just reduce protein intake. If it is caused by hypertension, it is recommended not to stay up late, eat more light food. If it is caused by kidney disease, follow the doctor's advice for the next treatment. If it is caused by urine contamination, take urine again for a second routine urine test.
How should this condition be treated?

When choosing a medical beauty clinic, you can consider two types of medical beauty plastic surgery clinics and medical beauty dermatology clinics. Each type has its advantages and applicable scenarios, so you need to consider according to your own business philosophy and market demand. The medical aesthetic plastic surgery clinic focuses on injection micro-shaping and surgery treatment, and is practiced by medical aesthetic plastic surgeons. The advantage is that medical aesthetic plastic surgeons are good at injections and surgery and can provide detailed and in-depth treatment. The medical aesthetic plastic surgery clinic is suitable for customers who want to improve their appearance through surgery or injections. On the other hand, the medical aesthetic dermatology clinic is more focused on optoelectronic instrument and problematic skin treatment, and is practiced by medical aesthetic dermatologists. The advantage is that it is relatively simple to start, focusing on providing effective skin treatment. The medical aesthetic dermatology clinic is suitable for customers who want to improve skin problems and undergo non-invasive treatment. It should be noted that most medical aesthetic dermatologists do not understand injections and minor surgeries. If you open an injection project in a medical aesthetic dermatology clinic and hire a medical aesthetic plastic surgeon to practice, it may exceed the scope of business and violate relevant regulations. Therefore, when choosing a suitable light medical beauty clinic type, you need to consider various factors such as your own expertise, market demand, and legal regulations.
Then how should I choose the right medical beauty clinic?

There are several methods to draw the folds of clothes. One is to treat the folds of the clothes as a tender lettuce, use arc lines to handle the transition, treat the folds as elastic leaves, avoid rigid corners, and create volume and thickness in minutes. Another method is to find a tissue, wrap it around your finger, and you get a hardcore clothes fold. If you want to imitate thick fabric, wrap more layers. Then twist your finger to get different shapes. In addition, there are some tricks for drawing folds, such as no matter what the outline of the reference clothes is wrinkled into, be sure to keep the outer outline clean and neat and not be led by the reference, only draw a little wavy line to indicate at the elbow bend or where the squeeze and pull is particularly severe, and cut all the rest with straight lines. Be sure to control your hand to draw as few folds as possible inside the clothes, squeeze folds can be summarized with a teardrop plus eight words, and other types of folds can be summarized with 2-3 lines. When coloring facing a large area of white space and not knowing what to do, add a triangular color block inside along the direction of the folds, and draw the edge into a sharp corner for a good transition.

The temperature and time for baking milk crisps vary depending on the type of oven and the specific recipe. If using an oven convection oven, the recommended temperature is 165 degrees, and the baking time is about 20 minutes. Another method is to use a high fire of 160 degrees and a low fire of 150 degrees, for about 10 minutes. Therefore, you can choose the appropriate temperature and time according to your oven and the specific recipe.

Caffeine has both positive and negative effects on the body. Mild to moderate caffeine intake has obvious benefits for human health. However, long-term excessive caffeine intake may cause side effects that interfere with daily life, and may even lead to serious health problems. For example, caffeine can cause dehydration in the body, and long-term chronic dehydration is a common cause of various diseases. The so-called refreshing effect of caffeine is not really refreshing, but caffeine stimulates the adrenal glands to secrete adrenaline into the blood, thus causing a feeling of being more energetic for a short time, which is at the expense of health. In addition, caffeine can cause gastrointestinal discomfort, constipation, diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, and cramps, etc., psychological confusion, nervousness, irritability and feelings of anxiety, etc., increase blood pressure, increase heart rate and heartbeat, decrease insulin sensitivity, increase serum adrenaline levels, etc. Therefore, although caffeine can help us stay awake, it is important to control the amount of caffeine intake to avoid excessive consumption.
Is caffeine harmful to the body?

Hyaluronic acid injections are a type of injection project, and the number of times needed varies from person to person. Long-term medical beauty projects mainly include skin care class and anti-aging class. The skin care class includes photon, hyaluronic acid, laser, etc., which are done 3-5 times a year, mainly to solve the problems of enlarged pores, dull skin, etc., to make our overall skin condition look better, more translucent. The anti-aging class includes Thermage, HIFU, botulinum toxin, 4D, etc., these projects can make your wrinkles less and your skin condition younger and tighter. Before choosing, you should go offline first to let a professional doctor do a face diagnosis, and choose the project according to your own state and needs.

The climate changes in autumn mainly include the following points: After the start of autumn, the mornings and evenings become cool, but the days are still hot, and there is a short period of return to heat after the start of autumn, known as the 'autumn tiger'. After the end of heat, the days are hot, the mornings and evenings are cool, and the temperature begins to transition from hot to cool. The temperature difference between day and night makes crops mature faster. The rainy season in most parts of our country is about to end, and precipitation begins to decrease gradually. The average daily temperature in South China is 3°C lower than at the end of heat, and the average daily temperature in the Yangtze River Basin and regions north of it will drop to below 22°C. This is the time of year with the greatest difference between day and night temperatures. The temperature in the Yangtze River basin drops significantly, the average daily temperature drops to below 22°C, while South China still has residual heat. The rainy season in most parts of our country has ended, and it's the time of clear and refreshing autumn weather. During the day, the weather is clear and refreshing, and at night it's cool, with morning dew almost condensing into frost. The Northeast and Northwest are about to enter winter, with an average daily temperature above 22°C in South China and continuous autumn rain in the Southwest.
What are the climate changes in autumn?

Although the soybean fiber quilt can be used directly, it is recommended to clean it before use. You can choose to use silk wool detergent for cleaning, or soak the soybean fiber quilt in neutral detergent for about 30 minutes, allowing the detergent to penetrate into every part of the quilt. Do not iron at high temperature. In addition, the soybean quilt cannot be dry cleaned or chlorinated. But it can be ironed at low temperature, machine dehydration or drum drying. After using for one to two months, it should be turned over and sunned to keep it fluffy. Remember to change the pillowcase frequently to prevent contamination, and do not beat after sunning. The steps to assemble the wood are as follows: First, you need to buy the right size and material wood table top according to your preference, and let the store help to drill holes and arcs. Then, you need to prepare some tools, including an electric drill, self-tapping screws, a marker pen, and a ruler. Next, you need to place the wood on the lifting bracket to adjust the front, back, left, and right distances, and place the wood in the neutral position. Mark the screw positions, after marking, remember to let the marks dry for a while. Then, turn the wood over and place it on a flat surface to observe whether the marking position is correct. Choose the right self-tapping screw, the lifting table usually comes with it, if not, you can buy it yourself, woodworking self-tapping screw. Determine the depth of the screw into the wood, mine is 8 millimeters. Directly use the self-tapping screw to lock in, strongly not recommended! The wood is easy to crack, and the harder the wood, the harder it is to screw in. Even if it does not crack for the time being, it is likely to crack due to thermal expansion and contraction, vibration, and heavy pressure. Choose the right drill bit, the thinnest can be used, too thick is not firm. Limit the depth of the drill hole, you can wrap the drill bit with masking tape, but never drill through the wood. Drill holes at the marked points. Take out the controller and power bracket and other items that need to be fixed, mark the screw positions, and continue to drill. Clean the holes, you can use a vacuum cleaner or brush. Put back the bracket and lock the screws to finish. Finally, the front of the table top faces the ground, the back faces up, pay attention to protect the table top. Put the lifting table leg in position, use a pistol drill (electric drill) to drill a hole about 1mm against the screw hole, then use the self-tapping screw to screw it in and fix it.
How should I assemble the wood then?

If you want to deworm your puppy at home, there are some things to note. First, deworming puppies internally for the first time should be done 28 days after birth, and then once a month. If the puppy has just arrived home, do not deworm the dog within a week. Deworming medicine will stimulate the dog's gastrointestinal tract, too much may cause the dog to be poisoned, so it must be strictly taken according to the dog's weight. Fast for more than three hours before deworming and after feeding the medicine, to avoid the dog vomiting due to the stimulation of the deworming medicine. If the dog vomits or expels too many worms after feeding the medicine, deworm the dog internally again after two weeks. In addition, it is recommended to deworm before vaccination to ensure the immune effect. The time interval between deworming and vaccination should be more than 7 days. In the absence of worms or vomiting, immunity can be arranged. The best time to take medicine is between two meals, it is not recommended to feed on an empty stomach, within 2-3 hours after the dog eats, pay attention to the dosage according to the instructions. The best feeding status is when the dog's body is relatively healthy. After taking deworming medicine, gastrointestinal discomfort symptoms may occur, such as vomiting and diarrhea, etc., you can feed the dog some probiotics to relieve symptoms. In the first two days after taking the deworming medicine, it is recommended to observe whether there are any worms in the stool. If there are, it proves that there are more internal parasites, and you need to deworm again after 15 days; if not, it indicates that there are not many worms in the body, or the drug effect is not good, need to deworm again.
Are there any precautions if I want to deworm at home by myself?

There are some precautions for drinking wolfberry and chrysanthemum tea. Firstly, wolfberries should be eaten in small amounts over a long period of time, and should not be consumed in excess. People with a cold, fever, inflammation, or diarrhea should try to not eat it. Wolfberries have a high sugar content, so people with diabetes should not eat too much. People with high blood pressure should not eat wolfberries. Secondly, chrysanthemum has some contraindications, such as people with a spleen and stomach deficiency should not drink it as it can stimulate the stomach and increase symptoms of a spleen and stomach deficiency. People with a deficiency in Yang should not drink it as it can damage the body's vitality. People who are prone to allergies can trigger allergic asthma or related allergic rashes and throat edema. Pregnant women should not drink it as it can cause discomfort in the stomach and even symptoms like abdominal pain and diarrhea. People with a cold should avoid drinking chrysanthemum tea as it can worsen cold symptoms. People with low blood pressure should not drink it as chrysanthemum has the auxiliary effect of lowering blood pressure. Lastly, although chrysanthemum can clear heat and detoxify, it is slightly bitter and cold, and people with weak bodies should not drink too much. Wolfberries have a strong effect of warming the body, so they should not be eaten when having a cold, fever, diarrhea, or inflammation in the body. Women who over-supplement with wolfberries during their menstrual period may increase their menstrual flow. People with poor spleen and stomach who often eat wolfberries may cause indigestion.
Are there any precautions for drinking this?

In music works, you can determine whether it is C major or A minor by the following methods. First, you need to pay attention to the key signature, which is one of the principles to determine the tonality of the music. When playing the whole piece, all notes have to be raised or lowered according to the key signature. The rules of sharps and flats in the key signature are 4152637 and 7362514 respectively. When determining the major key according to the key signature, you can look at what note the last sharp raises, then look at the name of the note before it, to see whether this note is raised in the key signature. For flats, you can look at the name of the penultimate flat. Secondly, you can find the minor key from the major key by looking for the minor third downwards, and find the major key from the minor key by looking for the minor third upwards. Finally, you can determine the tonality by counting the altered notes, which is a method that most people will use, but only suitable for situations where the altered notes are very few and can be seen at a glance.
Oh, I see. So in music works, how can I know whether it is C major or A minor?

The development of wood firing kilns reflects the diligence and wisdom of our ancient people. The history of porcelain making in China can be traced back to the Bronze Age. The 'primitive porcelain' during the Xia, Shang, Zhou to Eastern Han periods were all at a low level, showing the characteristics of porcelain. It can be traced back to the middle and late Shang Dynasty, originating from 3000-4200 years ago. After going through the Western Zhou, Spring and Autumn, Warring States, and Han dynasties, it was a product of the transitional period from pottery to porcelain, developed from stamped hard pottery. Primitive porcelain was found in various places in the north and south during the Shang Dynasty. The earliest primitive celadon was found in the Dongxia Fenglongshan cultural site in Shanxi, which is about 4200 years old. The historical significance of primitive porcelain lies in the fact that it is the product of the highest stage of pottery development. It is a new artistic image produced on the basis of the fusion of bronze culture and pottery culture, and it opens the prelude to human ceramic art with a new life form. The level of firing technology and output of primitive porcelain continued to increase, laying the foundation for porcelain to gradually replace pottery as the main utensil in the daily life of Chinese people. In addition, wood firing originated in Japan. Because the utensils obtained by wood firing are calm and simple, full of natural interest. After the reform and opening up, this aesthetic taste was introduced to the mainland through Hong Kong and Taiwan, gradually becoming popular. Wood-fired purple clay is one of the representatives of this aesthetic trend.
That sounds amazing, so how did wood firing technology develop?

When knitting children's vests, there are some things you need to pay attention to. First, the back piece should use a No.12 knitting needle, start with 91 stitches, knit to 5.3 inches on both sides under the arm each decrease 6 stitches, continue to knit to 4.2 inches. The front piece starts with 3 stitches, increase 1 stitch on both sides of the middle stitch every other row, add stitches, add 5 stitches on each side, a total of 10 stitches added, then increase one stitch every other row within 5 stitches on both sides, increase until the required number of stitches, usually increase to 51 stitches on the needle. In the process of increasing stitches, unevenness will appear, there will be concave situations, at this time you need to add a row on the edge stitch, as long as there is a concave situation, you need to add a row once, add a total of 3 rows on 5 stitches edge, and add another row after 51 stitches, so the triangle is knitted flat. In addition, after the underarm decrease is completed, knitting the sleeve hole will also be accompanied by digging the collar, and the xx rows marked at the top of the underarm decrease represent flat knitting on this side of the sleeve hole, not that there is no decrease in the middle!!! So don't just start knitting flat stitches after the underarm decrease! Finally, when picking the placket, the left placket, that is, the side where the buttons are sewn, needs to be picked up from the collar, don't get it wrong.
Okay, thank you! Are there any other things I need to pay attention to?

When picking roses, you need to pay attention to several aspects. First, for the flower head, if you're buying a whole bunch, check for obvious bends and rotten petals. If you're buying a few loose ones, check if there's any rotting at the bottom of the flower head, and if there are protective petals. Protective petals are a crucial reference, if not, they're probably not fresh enough, and you should remove the petals one by one until it looks fresh. Second, for the leaves, fresh roses have a lot of leaves, which may wilt a bit in transit. If the leaves have turned yellow or dried up and are falling off, don't buy it. Third, for the stalk, if it's green and resilient, it should be very fresh. If it's shriveled, or if there are large areas of black or brown, you should pick something else. Fourth, for the roots, if the roots are black, smell bad, or feel slippery, it's probably been there for a while, and won't last much longer. In addition, when choosing roses, you should choose flower crowns for brewing, buds for other uses; Pingyin and Mo Hong have high cost performance, Damascus for those who are not short of money; Selection should be based on shape, color and scent; Flower type selection Variety selection Three essentials for selection Matched therapeutic effects.
For example, to make rose jam, you need fresh roses, sugar, lemon juice and other ingredients, and it is made by slow stewing; to make skincare products, such as rose water, you usually need to distill to extract the aroma and beneficial components of roses; as a food additive, roses are usually ground into powder and added to food.

To present the luster and color of Lining Jade, you can follow these steps: First, lay a base color, then draw a variety of colors refracted by the Lining Jade. These fire colors need to be slightly brighter to show up on the dark base, and dab them on little by little. Next, after the colors are slightly dry, gently brush a thin layer of watercolor white on the edge. Finally, outline the highlights according to the curvature of the gemstone. When applying the highlight of the gemstone, you can refer to the example of emerald, if the white highlight surface outlines the frame, don't worry, you can try to find a pen or sharp object nearby to depict, it can highlight the highlight surface of the gemstone more clearly. To draw a realistic gem texture, pay attention to the following key skills: Color selection, choose the correct color. Different types of gems have different colors, such as sapphires, rubies, and jades. Carefully observe the color of the gemstone, use transparent watercolor or colored pencils to accurately reproduce the color of the gemstone. Highlights and reflections, gemstones usually have bright highlights and reflective light. Use white or light-colored paints to lightly brush the highlight areas to enhance their brightness. At the same time, determine the reflection area of the gemstone and emphasize it appropriately. Shadows and depth, add shadows to create a three-dimensional sense of the gemstone. Consider the position of the light source, determine the shadow area, and use dark colored paints or pencils to softly smudge them. Detail depiction, there may be faceted or textured on the gemstone. Carefully draw these details, use fine-tipped pencils or fine brushes to depict them. Transparency, gemstones are usually transparent, so you want to show this transparent effect. Use light colors to establish the transparency of the gemstone, but make sure to retain enough details. Background, consider the background of the gemstone, it can affect the appearance of the gemstone. The appropriate background color can highlight the color and luster of the gemstone. Reflections, consider the environment around the gemstone, draw the objects or scenery reflected on the surface of the gemstone to increase the realism of the gemstone.
Can you tell me how to present the luster and color of Lining Jade?

Yes, Merlion Park is indeed a symbol of Singapore. It is the smallest park in Singapore and a symbol of the city. The Merlion, a mythical creature with a lion's head and a fish's body, was designed by Singaporean Chinese Lim Nang Seng as a tourism logo and is a famous water-sculpture in the city center. It has been a landmark of Singapore since 1997. The design concept of the Merlion, a lion-headed fish standing on water waves, combines reality and legend: the lion's head represents the "Lion City" in the legend, and the fish's tail, swimming among the layers of waves, represents Singapore's transformation from a fishing port to a commercial port. It also symbolizes our ancestors who braved the seas to come south to make a living and work hard. Therefore, Merlion Park is a must-visit attraction for tourists in Singapore.
Is Merlion Park a symbol of Singapore?

Finally, you need to connect the current probes, which are mostly Poe powered, just need a network cable to supply power plus video transmission, use one end of the network cable to connect the probe, the other end connects to the network port behind the monitoring host, use an hdmi video cable to connect the monitoring host and a small monitor, finally, power on the monitoring host.

Adjusting the mentality before the exam mainly includes the following aspects: First, you need to understand the cause of anxiety, which is often our subconscious expectation of bad things that will happen in the future, and even it becomes a threat. The subconscious tries to control or change this result, but there are many external factors that we cannot control, so conflict arises. Secondly, you can adjust your mentality through the following five methods: adjust cognition, positive suggestion, focus on the present, crack the tip of the tongue phenomenon, and relaxation practice. In addition, you can also relax at home, breathe appropriately, start from the arm, then follow the order of the head, neck, chest, shoulder, abdomen, buttocks, thighs, toes, alternate contraction, relax skeletal muscles, experience muscle tightness. Finally, when entering the examination room, ignore the expressions and reactions of others, sit down in your own seat, focus your eyes on a point in the front of the classroom, gaze for about 1 minute, don't think about anything, let your emotions stabilize.
How should I adjust my mentality before the exam?

There are several ways to make scrambled eggs with chili. One is to use screw pepper, eggs, ginger and garlic, and millet pepper. First, crush the chili with a knife and cut it into small pieces, peel the ginger and garlic and slice them. Then, heat the pan and pour oil, beat in the eggs and fry until golden on both sides and cut into small pieces. Next, leave the base oil and pour in the chili, add a little salt and stir-fry to a tiger skin state, put in ginger, garlic, millet pepper and stir-fry, pour in the eggs, a spoonful of soy sauce, a spoonful of oyster sauce, half a spoonful of dark soy sauce, stir-fry evenly over high heat and serve. Another is to use eggs, small green pepper, millet spicy, and light soy sauce. First, beat the eggs into a bowl for later use. Then, put a small amount of oil in the pot, after the oil temperature rises, put in the eggs, the eggs are first shaped in the pot and then stir-fried. Finally, turn to low heat, add light soy sauce, and put in the eggs, turn on high heat, stir fry evenly, and serve.
Have you found out how to make scrambled eggs with chili?

There are several ways to make spicy grilled chicken wings. One is to first clean the chicken wings and make cuts, then add 2 spoons of minced garlic, 1 spoon of chili powder, 1 spoon of cumin powder, 1 spoon of pepper powder, 1 spoon of dark soy sauce, 2 spoons of light soy sauce, half a spoon of salt, 2 spoons of honey, 2 spoons of corn oil and marinate for 30 minutes. Then line the baking tray with oil paper, place the potatoes and then the chicken wings, send to the middle of the oven at 200 degrees and bake for 20 minutes, take out and brush with honey and bake for another 10 minutes. Another is to clean the chicken wings and make cuts, add a spoon of cooking wine, a spoon of pepper powder, a spoon of light soy sauce, a spoon of salt, a spoon of chili powder, a spoon of cumin, a spoon of tomato sauce, three spoons of corn starch and mix well to marinate for more than 2 hours. Put the marinated chicken wings on the grill, pour over the sauce, send to the preheated oven in the middle, bake at 200 degrees for 20 minutes. Another is to rinse the thawed chicken wings with water, drain the water, add 8 grams of chili powder, 12 grams of Orleans grilled wing powder, 5 grams of sugar, 12 grams of cooking wine, 24 grams of soy sauce and ginger slices into the chicken wings that have been drained of water and mix well. Put it in a plastic bag and refrigerate it in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, and it will be more flavorful if marinated overnight. Line the baking tray with tin foil, put in the grill, first evenly coat the marinated chicken wings with a layer of flour, then a layer of egg liquid, and then a layer of bread crumbs, and arrange them on the grill. The oven uses the air fry function at 210 degrees, the time is set for 28 minutes, and it is preheated by pressing the preheat key. When the preheating time is up, put the baking tray into the middle of the oven and bake for 28 minutes. About twelve minutes before the end, switch the positions inside and outside the baking tray, and turn the chicken wings over to continue baking. When the time is up, take it out. A plate of attractive, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, delicious spicy grilled chicken wings is ready.
How to make spicy grilled chicken wings?

The constant temperature control of the Joyoung electric baking pan mainly relies on the thermostatic valve. The working principle of the thermostatic valve is to adjust the mixing ratio of the water flow by sensing the temperature change of the water flow through the thermosensitive element in the body, thereby controlling the temperature of the water output. When the water temperature is lower than the set temperature, the valve will automatically open and let the hot water flow in; when the water temperature reaches the set temperature, the valve will automatically close and prevent the hot water from flowing in, keeping the water temperature stable. This can avoid the situation of sudden cold and hot during bathing. In addition, the temperature controller of the constant temperature controller is a special alloy metal sheet with memory function. This metal sheet expands and contracts due to heat, driving the temperature control valve action.
So how does the constant temperature control work?

There are some specific methods or steps that can help parents deal with their child's lying behavior. First, adults need to lead by example, hope the child does what you do. Second, encourage and reward honesty, when children are willing to tell the truth, even if the content is not pleasing, they should be praised and thanked for their honesty, which can help avoid unnecessary and bad consequences and let them see the benefits of honesty. Then, calmly deal with lies, although it's upsetting when you find out your child is lying, remember to separate the lie from what they did wrong, discuss and deal with them separately. In addition, don't over-punish, because the child may be afraid of being severely punished and is more likely to lie, which delays and covers up the real problem that should be solved. Finally, be a role model for the child, encourage the child more, respect and trust the child, strengthen communication with the child, and discover the child's lying behavior in time.
Are there some specific methods or steps?

You can try to read some articles that require quick and accurate understanding, such as verbal understanding questions. The method of speed reading verbal understanding questions includes: First, carefully read the question, understand the specific requirements of the question, determine the core information or keywords to be found. Then, quickly browse the article, pay attention to the title, first sentence and the beginning and end of each paragraph, understand the general content and structure of the article. Next, find the topic sentence of each paragraph, that is, the center sentence of the paragraph or the sentence that summarizes the whole text. Carefully read the paragraph, find key information related to the question, pay attention to nouns, verbs, adjectives and adverbs, and pay attention to specific examples, numbers, time and place details. By analyzing the views, attitudes and intentions expressed by the author, grasp the author's position and purpose, and infer the author's views on the problem. Finally, combine the question and the main idea of the article, integrate the extracted key information, summarize and summarize, and ensure that the answer is accurate and in line with the requirements of the topic. In addition, to improve the speed and accuracy of the center of verbal understanding in the civil service examination requires repeated practice. You can cultivate the ability to quickly read and extract information by doing exercises and reading related articles, and improve the efficiency of reading comprehension.
So, what kind of articles should I read?

When choosing a Bichon, in addition to looking at its hair color and nose color, you also need to pay attention to several other aspects. Firstly, the eyes of Bichon are very important because they reflect the overall health of Bichon. You need to pay attention to whether their eyes are clean, transparent and free of secretions. If there are tear stains, it may be due to improper diet or eye diseases. If there is a problem with smelly tears, consider whether there is a lack of vitamins, whether the dog's spleen and liver functions are healthy. Secondly, the Bichon's ears hang down, making them more prone to ear problems. Especially in the summer, humid seasons, problems like ear mites are prone to occur. In addition to regular deworming, regular ear cleaning is also very important. Furthermore, the health of Bichon's hair and skin directly affects their appearance. We need to check the growth rate and color of the hair. If their diet is improper, the hair will turn yellow. When skin diseases occur, it can also cause local hair to turn yellow. Healthy Bichon’s hair should be snow white without any mixed color. Lastly, the chance of dogs suffering from joint problems is high, and Bichon, as a small dog, is at a higher risk of joint diseases. Therefore, joint maintenance is also very important.
Are there any other places I need to pay attention to?

It is not recommended to use human shower gel to bathe pets because the pH of pet skin and human skin is different. Human skin is weakly acidic, while pet skin is weakly alkaline. If pets use human shower gel, it cannot be neutralized, but will wash away the oil that protects the skin, causing the skin to become fragile, thus leading to skin diseases. In addition, the epidermis of a dog's skin is thinner than that of humans, and it is easy to reduce its skin resistance by using human shower gel, which can lead to skin diseases. Moreover, the cycle of skin metabolism in dogs is different from that in humans. Their metabolism is faster. The owner should avoid using human alkaline bath products for dogs, which can cause skin allergies and disrupt the hair growth cycle. Therefore, it is best to choose a shower gel specifically designed for pets.
I see some pet stores use human shower gel, is this okay?

To adjust the water level in the toilet, first, you need to open the cover of the toilet at home, and you will find the inlet valve. The arrow points to the position to adjust the water level. Turning clockwise can increase the toilet water level, and the water level is high, the flushing force will naturally increase, and vice versa is to reduce the water level in the tank, adjust according to personal needs. The inlet valve is an important part of the toilet tank. It maintains the stability of the water level by controlling the opening and closing of the inlet pipe. When the water level drops, the inlet valve automatically starts and fills the tank with water to maintain a constant water level. At the same time, the inlet valve also has a pressure valve. When the water pressure is too high, it will automatically close the inlet pipe to prevent the tank from bursting. The key point is to replace the aging inlet valve in time to ensure the safe use of the toilet.
How to adjust the water level in the tank?

The requirements for large companies' overseas internship programs vary depending on the company and industry. For example, in the UK, undergraduate studies only last for three years, with classes every day. Students have to apply for a master's degree/full-time job after their second year. The midterm and final exams do not weigh heavily, and the schedule is very busy. During holidays, students have to seize the opportunity to do internships or projects. In addition, the student visa restricts internships. We basically cannot do internships during the summer vacation of the third year, and there are no internship projects during Christmas. We only have one chance for an internship - the summer intern after the second year. Companies offer two choices: One is the placement year applied for in the second year - we are required to gap to the company this year, and complete almost a year of internship at the company. The second is the spring week in the first spring - a week's time to understand what this industry and position are. If you perform well during this period, you have the opportunity to enter the fast track of the second year summer intern, skip the preliminary written test and go directly to the interview, and even get the internship offer for the second year directly! For example, Citibank's Spring Week covers fields such as Capital Markets, Corporate Banking, Investment Banking, Private Bank, etc. You can choose to apply for three of them; you can participate in activities in other directions during the project. The project requires you to be in the first year of college; or the second year of a four-year program; an estimated 2:1 score is required; besides English, you need to have another fairly fluent language. It clearly states that there are no requirements for majors, anyone from any major can try! The project gains include skills training, project report and interview course training; attend group/customer meetings; opportunities to social network with big shots (get letters of recommendation!); understand and observe the core content of this industry/job.
What are the general requirements for large companies' overseas internship programs?

The texture of beef varies depending on the part. For example, the beef shoulder is located on the front shoulder blade of the cow, upper part of the front leg, with high fat content, tender meat, high-quality protein, suitable for braised, boiled, stewed, roasted cooking methods. Beef brisket is located on the chest of the cow, on both sides of the leg cartilage, with coarse fiber, elastic and tough meat, suitable for boiled, stewed cooking methods. Beef tenderloin is located on the inside of the cow's waist muscle, under the spine, with low fat content, delicious meat, suitable for barbecue, steak, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef belly is located in the soft part of the cow's abdomen and near the ribs, with more lean meat, less fat, excellent meat quality, especially suitable for braising, suitable for red braised, stewed soup cooking methods. Beef neck meat is located on the fine meat of the cow's neck, with coarse meat with tendons, smooth and chewy, suitable for making stuffing, stewed, boiled cooking methods. Beef ribs have tender and thick meat, marble texture, suitable for red braised, barbecue, boiled, stewed cooking methods. Beef shank is wrapped in inner membrane, hidden tendon, moderate hardness, regular texture, suitable for braised, barbecue, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef eye meat has tender meat, high fat content, juicy, suitable for barbecue, hot pot, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef striploin has tender meat, mostly lean meat, suitable for barbecue, stir-fry, cold salad cooking methods. Tail sirloin is located on the cow's hind legs and buttock meat, with tender meat, rich flavor, fat permeating, suitable for barbecue, steak cooking methods. Upper brain is located at the back of the shoulder and neck, on both sides of the spine, with slightly hard meat, rich in collagen, suitable for fried, fried, stewed cooking methods. Beef buttock is located on the meat near the buttocks of the cow's hind legs, with less fat, slightly astringent taste, it is lean meat, suitable for whole roast, suitable for roast, gratin cooking methods. Cucumber strips are small cucumber strips are the lean meat separated from the edge of the bifidus muscle of the beef buttock line, large cucumber strips are located on the outside of the cow's hind leg, with long and wide meat, coarser meat quality, uniform fiber, suitable for hot pot, steak, sashimi cooking methods. Sirloin is located on the upper waist of the cow's back, with hard meat, appropriate fat and lean combination, strong chewy texture, suitable for fried, steak cooking methods.
I want to know more about the texture of beef, such as the difference in texture of different parts?

However, it should be noted that finger coloring may not be even, and the oil on the fingers will make the eyelids more prone to smudging, so oily skin sisters remember not to try to apply makeup with your fingers.

The specific steps to restore a shrunken sweater are as follows: First, pour warm water into the basin, add 100ml of shrink restoration agent and stir evenly, then completely immerse the shrunken clothes in it, and turn the clothes from time to time. Soak for 30-40 minutes, then remove and wring out by hand until no water drips. When the clothes are half dry, you can iron with gauze as an ironing cloth. In addition, you can also try the following steps: 1. Use shrink restoration agent and warm water to mix evenly, soak for 30 minutes, must be completely soaked; 2. Warm water soaking, must be enough to submerge all clothes, turn the clothes from time to time; 3. After soaking, remove the clothes and wring them out by hand until no water drips; 4. Stretch and iron while stretching. Another method is: 1. Add warm water and restorer to the basin and mix well; 2. The shrunken wool sweater is completely soaked in water for 30-40 minutes; 3. Wring to the state of no dripping water, take a thin gauze or towel as an ironing cloth, iron and stretch while ironing; 4. Just air dry normally.
What should I do specifically?

The representation of light and shadow in oil painting is very important. Different types of light have different meanings in the picture, and the visual effects of the picture are also different, and the ways of using them are also different. For example, side light is generally the light projected into the picture from the side of the picture, making the characters in the picture bright and dark, which is conducive to shaping the image and creating the atmosphere of the picture. Top light is generally the light and shadow effect projected down from the top of the picture. Front light is the light shining on the main object from the front, the light source is in the front. Back light is the light source of the picture shining from behind the object, making the main object in a large area of shadow. In addition, shadow is a continuation of the light source, it is a method to present the three-dimensional sense of the object; in painting, shadow is indispensable, especially for sketching, let's understand the light and shadow structure together.
How should I handle light and shadow?

The process of making crab paste is as follows: First, steam the crabs, adjust the time according to the size of the crabs, about 10-15 minutes. After frying out the yellow oil of the crab roe, add a little ginger to remove the fishy smell. Add crab meat, pork fat, yellow wine, vinegar in order, stir-fry over low heat until the water evaporates, then add salt and white pepper for seasoning. Finally, the crab paste is ready.
So how should I proceed?

When training the gluteus maximus, there are several points to note. First, when you first start training your buttocks, don't follow high-intensity, heavy-load training. Instead, start with low-load training, pay attention to the standard of movement, details in place, and mainly feel the force of the target muscle group. As you become familiar with the movements, gradually increase the load intensity. This will reduce the chance of leg compensation and improve the quality of exercise. Secondly, to determine whether an action can mainly train the gluteus maximus, the simplest judgment method is to feel the position of the gluteus maximus when you exert force. Is it hard? Is the muscle tight? If so, it means that the action is helpful for this part. Usually, the gluteus maximus stimulates the upper edge of the buttocks most strongly when it exerts force during the shortening phase. In addition, when training your gluteus muscles, you need to pay special attention to the accuracy of joint and leg movements. Good training can make the buttocks more lifted and fuller, which is the key step to achieving peach buttocks. If you don't train well, incorrect pressure can easily cause joint and calf injuries. Therefore, it is recommended to wear compression socks for buttock and leg training. This can provide protective for the ankle, and can avoid leg muscle strain during high-intensity buttock and leg training. Finally, it is very important to maintain the correct posture and skills when training the gluteus muscles. Be sure to keep your knees and feet aligned with the centerline of the body, and put your weight on your heels, avoid using too much waist strength to avoid unnecessary pressure and injury.
What should I pay attention to?

The specific steps for making large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun are as follows: First, clean a pound of large yellow rice, then dry it and put it into a broken machine to grind it into flour. If you already have ready-made yellow rice flour at home, you can skip this step. Then, take 450 grams of yellow rice flour and 150 grams of corn flour, and mix the two flours with chopsticks. Next, pour in 300 grams of boiling water bit by bit, first twist it into a noodle fluff, then knead it into a dough, knead it smooth and cover it with plastic wrap for 20 hours. In addition, you can also try this ratio: 1 pound of large yellow rice flour and 4 ounces of fine corn flour, use 420 grams of boiling water to make the dough, ferment for more than 12 hours in a warm place, the fermented dough needs to exhaust and sour many times. Another ratio is: 2 pounds of large yellow rice flour and 1 pound of fine corn flour, no need to ferment or rest the dough. If you want to eat sour, of course, you can let it ferment overnight in a warm place.
What are the specific steps for the large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun and the dough?

The most basic way to cut fish is as follows: First, chop the head with one knife, cut it in the middle from the mouth, do not cut it off. Then, from the neck, horizontally cut along the spine to the tail. Next, flip over and do the same on the other side. Finally, get a fish that is cut into four large pieces. The fish meat is horizontally cut from the rib root, and the rib is sliced off. The fish meat is diagonally cut into thick slices, the rib slices cut into large pieces, and the fish spine, vigorously chopped into squares. This way, you can get fish meat that is uniform in size and the meat pieces do not scatter.
I want to know the most basic way.

The side effects of growth hormone mainly include benign intracranial hypertension, which may cause headaches and swelling eyes a few days after injection, and this situation can generally alleviate itself after a week or two of injection. In addition, growth hormone may temporarily affect the child's thyroid function, so children who get injections are required to have a re-examination every 1/3/6 months. Long-term use of growth hormone may affect the sensitivity of insulin, and some mild insulin resistance may occur. Children who get injections also have a risk of inducing tumors, especially when the child has a tumor that the parents have not discovered. After injection, it may promote the growth of the tumor. Moreover, children who get injections may experience scoliosis or necrosis of the femoral head, but these are low-probability issues. In addition, growth hormone may increase the speed of eye axis growth, which may lead to nearsightedness.
What are the side effects of growth hormone?

The method of entering the street office is mainly through a combination of written examination and interview. The written test content includes basic knowledge such as laws and regulations, political and economic theories, current political guidelines, and science and humanities. After the written test, the candidates for the interview are determined according to the 1:3 ratio of the job recruitment plan. The interview adopts the method of structured interview, mainly examining the comprehensive quality, professional ability and job matching degree of the applicants. After the interview, the total score is calculated by the percentage system according to 40% and 60% of the written test and interview scores respectively. All scores are calculated to two decimal places, and the tail number is rounded. The total scores are the same, and the interview scores are preferred. Both the written test and interview set a minimum qualifying score.

Secondly, when entering and exiting underground garages, first find a good safe steering angle, close to the safe height, so entering and exiting are safe and reliable. Finally, when you see a parking spot on the left front, first drive forward parallel to the parking line, try to get close to the left, the right aisle is wide enough to tilt the body; observe the rear-view mirror or when the driver aligns with the target garage line, turn right to the maximum and drive forward, watch the left rear-view mirror, see the corner of the target garage; reverse to the left, remember "wide turn and narrow return" when the rear-view mirror is parallel to the rear-view mirror of the side car, it means that it has successfully entered the garage.

A real purple clay teapot is mainly judged by its material and craftsmanship. The original ore purple clay material has a rich particle sense, simple and elegant in shape, smooth lines, fine craftsmanship, you can clearly see the delicate texture of the clay, full of charm. It is easy to brew and maintain, suitable for a wide variety of tea. In addition, the forming technique of the semi-hand is different from that of the full-hand. The full-hand is forced from the outside to the inside (pat the body cylinder), and the semi-hand is forced from the inside to the outside (block the blank and scrape)! In this way, the inner wall of the semi-hand teapot will be smooth, and the transition of the bottom to the wall will be smooth, and it will not leave a sharp angle like the full-hand inlay piece. Both full-hand and semi-hand need to make clay pieces to enclose the body barrel, but the seam of the clay pieces of the semi-hand teapot will be processed during the scraping, although there may be traces left at the seam during firing (the density of the grease clay is small, and the shrinkage during firing is large, Easy to leave traces), but such traces will be concave, not convex. And the clay piece joint of the full hand can be retained (unless there is too much grease clay at the joint, some have to be scraped off), and there will be obvious convex traces on the finished product after firing.
So what kind of purple clay teapot is a real purple clay teapot?

To make boiled fresh peanuts tasty, you can follow these steps: First, take an appropriate amount of fresh peanuts, put them in a basin, add an appropriate amount of water, soak for 10 minutes, and then wash them several times to clean the mud attached to the surface of the peanuts. Then, after the peanuts are cleaned, add an appropriate amount of salt, add an appropriate amount of water, stir evenly, stir the salt until it dissolves, put a plate on the top of the peanuts, soak again for 10 minutes, then take out, rinse with running water, put into a hollowed-out basket, and drain. Next, take an oil-free pot, add enough water, the water should cover the peanuts, add an appropriate amount of fresh Szechuan pepper, ginger slices, bay leaves, star anise, dried red chili, stir evenly with chopsticks, then cover the pot, boil over high heat, after boiling over high heat, turn to low heat and boil for 5 minutes, let these seasonings blend into the water. Finally, after the broth is boiled, open the lid, add an appropriate amount of salt for seasoning, stir evenly with chopsticks, then add the cleaned peanuts into the pot, cover the pot, boil over high heat, after boiling over high heat, turn to medium heat and boil for 35 minutes, open the lid, stir evenly with a spatula, then turn off the heat, cover the pot, stew for 1-2 hours, let the peanuts soak in the flavor, and they are ready to eat.
Can you tell me how to make boiled fresh peanuts tasty?

The imaging phenomenon of a convex lens is due to its refractive nature. When the object distance is infinitely far, the image is focused. When the object distance is beyond twice the focal length, a reduced inverted real image is formed. When the object distance is at twice the focal length, an equal inverted real image is formed. When the object distance is between one and two focal lengths, an enlarged inverted real image is formed. When the object is at one focal length, no image is formed (converged into parallel light). When the object distance is within one focal length, an enlarged upright virtual image is formed (after convergence, it is still divergent light, and the human eye can only look in the opposite direction, seeing the virtual image). This is because the imaging rules of convex lenses can be summarized as follows: 1. When the object is at infinity (i.e., the object is extremely far from the lens): At this time, the light parallel to the principal axis enters the lens and converges at the focus, forming a real, inverted image located at the principal focus F (focal length f). 2. When the object is between twice the focal length 2f and infinity: At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and smaller than the object. The image position is between F and 2F. 3. When the object is at twice the focal length 2f: At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and the same size as the object. The image position is also at 2F. 4. When the object is between one and two focal lengths (i.e., between f and 2f): At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and larger than the object. The image position is beyond twice the focal length. 5. When the object is at one focal length (i.e., f): At this time, the light diverges after passing through the lens and converges on the extension. Therefore, we believe that this image is virtual and infinitely large. 6. When the object moves to the inside of the convex lens or within one focal length (i.e., less than f), the resulting image becomes upright and virtual. And as the object gets closer to the lens, the image gets larger.
I see, so how does this phenomenon occur?

There are many ways to cook peanuts, and I found several methods for you. First, you need to prepare the following ingredients: 500g fresh peanuts, star anise, cinnamon, bay leaves, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, salt, and oil. The steps are as follows: Rinse the fresh peanuts bought from the supermarket twice to remove the mud on the peanuts, put them in a plate, add a spoonful of oil and 1 liter of water, and soak for 10 minutes. Rinse with water, clean, pinch a small mouth for each peanut to make it more flavorful. Put the peanuts with pinched small mouths in the plate, add two spoons of salt, 1 liter of water (the ratio of peanuts to water is 1:1), and soak for 30 minutes. Finally, add cinnamon, star anise, bay leaves, Sichuan peppercorns, and dried chili to the pot, stir-fry until fragrant, pour in the soaked peanuts and water, add half a spoonful of oil (to prevent the peanuts from turning black) and 3 spoons of soy sauce, stir well, cover the pot, boil over high heat and cook for 15 minutes. The cooked peanuts can be taken out directly and eaten after cooling down. Another method is to buy fresh peanuts with mud, wash the mud thoroughly, pinch a small mouth for each peanut, this way the boiled peanuts will be very flavorful. Add seasonings: green onions, ginger, Sichuan peppercorns, salt, soy sauce, thirteen fragrant powder, add cold water to cover the peanuts, cook for 20~30 minutes, let it cool naturally, soak overnight and you can eat!

The 'half price for the second item' promotion is a discount method where the product with the lower actual payment price is considered the product with 'half price'. For example, if you recharge 750 shopping gold, your account will actually receive 800. If the shopping gold you paid for the two pairs of shoes you bought is 769.1, without red packets it would be 777.1, and your low-priced payment was 379, then the half price refund would be half of 379, which is 189. This money includes about 12 yuan of equity gold, and the refunded shopping gold should be 219.9, but the equity gold is a gift and is not refundable, so the refund amount is 204. Therefore, the final actual cost is the 750 spent when actually recharged minus the actual refund of 204, which is 546 for two pairs of Skechers. In addition, if you have four pairs of shoes in an order, it is the two lowest-priced items each! The actual payment includes the deposit, and the deposit also participates in the second half price.
Okay, thank you.

Imaging tests mainly include X-ray class, magnetic resonance class, ultrasound class, and nuclear medicine class. Among them, DR and CT are both types of X-ray examinations, DR is a type of X-ray film, its imaging of the human body is a kind of overlapping image, similar to a two-dimensional photo. CT is sectional imaging and can perform three-dimensional reconstruction in multiple dimensions according to specific examination requirements. The information obtained from CT scans is much more than DR, and the density resolution is better than DR, which can help clinicians understand more details and assist doctors in diagnosing diseases and treatment plans. Magnetic resonance imaging is a completely radiation-free safe examination, with excellent soft tissue resolution and high density resolution. It can perform multi-angle and multi-parameter scanning, and can also do a lot of functional imaging. PET-CT is a combination of PET and CT, and its principle is naturally based on both. PET can explore and analyze the tissues and organ functions in the human body through positron-emitting radionuclides, and the imaging is very clear, which can judge the disease more quickly and accurately.
What specifically does the imaging test include?

The washing machine keeps spinning may be due to several reasons. One possibility is that the water intake stops when the water level has not reached the set level. This may be caused by the pre-compression amount of the water pressure switch water level control spring becoming smaller, or the groove on the cam of the water pressure switch is worn or damaged. Another possibility is that the water intake must exceed the set water level before it will stop. This may be caused by the pre-compression amount of the water pressure switch water level control spring being too large, or the reversing push rod and transmission parts inside the water pressure switch are deformed or damaged. In addition, if the program enters the washing state, the motor rotates normally, but the pulsator does not rotate, it may be caused by the fastening screws of the motor pulley, clutch pulley and pulsator being loose, slipped or broken, or the V-belt slips or falls off. Finally, if the dehydration bucket follows the rotation, it may be caused by the brake belt being loose, reducing the braking torque of the brake belt on the dewatering shaft, or the clutch torsion spring falls off, breaks or the torsion spring and the dehydration shaft are too loose to slip, causing the torsion spring to lose its reverse stop function.
Why doesn't the washing machine stop spinning

Yes, people in Western countries also like pearls. Pearls have been a symbol of wealth and power for thousands of years, and they have been a symbol of wealth and power in Europe since the 16th century. In the 15th century, the Crusades in European history, one of the important reasons was that the Arabs blocked the trade route of Eastern pearls and other treasures to Rome. In 1492, Columbus, with the dream and entrustment of the King of Spain for pearls, crossed the Atlantic, set off for India, and discovered that the New World of America was rich in pearls, and the local 'Indians' were not rare, generously supplying pearls to Europe for a hundred years. The open sale of American pearls in Europe made the monarchs very upset. In order to maintain the lofty status of pearls as a symbol of wealth and power, after 1530, various countries have enacted laws, stipulating the status and corresponding levels of citizens wearing pearls, and started the so-called European 'Pearl Era'. During this period, Europeans plundered and overfished pearls around the world. At the end of the 19th century, the pearl resources in various places were exhausted one after another. At the same time, the emergence of plastics, petroleum, and cultured pearls ended the brilliant history of the natural pearl industry for thousands of years.
Do people in Western countries also like pearls?

The method of making steamed fish is as follows: First, clean the fish, slice the ginger, and shred the scallions. Then, cut a few slits on both sides of the fish, insert slices of ginger and scallions, and put it in a plate. Next, after the water is boiling, put in the fish and steam it on high heat for ten minutes. While steaming the fish, prepare shredded ginger and scallions. After ten minutes, pour out the water in the plate after steaming the fish, and take out the ginger and scallions that were inserted earlier. Then, take out the fish and put it in a clean plate. Changing the plate is the key to delicious steamed fish! Put the prepared ginger and scallions on the fish. Finally, dilute some steamed fish soy sauce with pure water and pour it on the fish. Heat the oil until it smokes, and pour it on the shredded ginger and scallions. Steamed fish is done.
Sounds delicious, how is the steamed fish made?

In VSCO, you can adjust the filter through the following steps: First, you need to fully understand the adjustment tools, including exposure (the overall brightness of the picture), contrast (soft and strong), adjustments (secondary composition), saturation (color vividness), hue (divided into highlights and shadows, highlight weakening and shadow compensation), skin color (sliding to the left will be rose, sliding to the right will make the skin color green), white balance (divided into color temperature and hue), hue separation (you can add some hue to the shadows and highlights separately), HSL (independent adjustment of color), dark corners (let the surroundings darken), fade (simulate film style, equivalent to raising the black part in the curve), clarity (increase the overall clarity of the picture including details), sharpening (similar to clarity, but only acts on the edge of the object). After selecting the filter, you can adjust the degree of the filter, from 0-12.
So how do you adjust the filter in VSCO?

To avoid palpitations during weight loss, you can try the following methods: First, you can try treadmill uphill for 40 minutes, choose a slope and speed of 4.5.6, increase first and then decrease, at least maintain for a week before starting strength or physical training. Second, you can prepare hot water and VC (effervescent tablets can be chewed). Then, you need to quit snacks first, and then gradually improve the diet structure. If you have a craving, you can choose low-calorie snacks instead. In addition, keep your mind calm, gradually feel the changes and progress of your body, weight loss is a long-term business, and it will pay a health price if you get it done all at once, it's not worth the loss. Finally, pay attention to keeping warm and eat less ice, stay up late. If you still have palpitations, you can try drinking plenty of water and taking in enough potassium or electrolytes. If the above methods still cannot completely eliminate palpitations, then this kind of palpitations may also involve an increase in the regulation of the adrenal gland secretion of hormones by the central nervous system, usually this is to ensure blood sugar levels, especially if you are currently receiving hypoglycemic treatment. However, this kind of palpitations is temporary. After 1-2 weeks, when the body adapts to low-carbohydrate ketone diet, the symptoms will disappear. In special cases, some people's palpitations will always exist. If it is troublesome, increase the intake of carbohydrates appropriately, of course, the effect of improving health and reducing fat will also be weakened, you need to balance this yourself.
What should I do to avoid palpitations?

Of course, here are more detailed steps. First, you need to prepare 250g of lean minced pork, 300g of fresh noodles, 3 tomatoes, 4 eggs, 3 cloves of garlic, and 1 spring onion. Then, add 1 tablespoon of cooking wine, 1 tablespoon of light soy sauce, half a teaspoon of salt and a little black pepper to the minced meat, and marinate for about 20 minutes. Next, chop the garlic, cut the spring onion into scallions. Slice a cross at the bottom of the tomatoes, scald them in hot water for 30 seconds and peel them, then cut them into small pieces for later use. Then, pour 2 tablespoons of light soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of dark soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of tomato sauce, 1 teaspoon of sugar, 2 tablespoons of Lao Gan Ma black bean sauce into a bowl to make the sauce. To make fried eggs, add half a teaspoon of salt to the eggs and beat them into egg liquid. Pour more oil into a deep pot, spoon a large spoonful of egg liquid into the hot oil, and fry over low heat for 3 minutes until golden brown, then flip it over and fry for about 2 minutes and take it out. Repeat this step with the remaining egg liquid. Finally, heat the pan with oil, add the chopped garlic and scallions to stir-fry until fragrant. Pour in the minced meat and stir-fry until it turns white, then add the diced tomatoes and stir-fry for 3 minutes until the juice comes out, then pour in the sauce and about three bowls of water (around 750ml), bring it to a boil over high heat, then simmer over low heat for 10 minutes. Spread the fresh noodles and fried eggs on top, simmer over low heat for 10 minutes, then flip them over and simmer for about 5 minutes before serving.

The main disadvantages of steel dental crowns include: Firstly, when doing magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), it is easy to cause false shadows in the MRI results, which are blurry and unclear and affect diagnosis; Secondly, metal dental crowns can cause metal ions to seep into the tissues around the gums, causing black lines at the edges; In addition, metal dental crowns can cause allergies, leading to rashes all over the body; Moreover, metal dental crowns can cause bad breath in the mouth; Finally, metal dental crowns can stimulate the gums, causing redness and bleeding. In addition, the disadvantages of metal dental crowns also include poor biocompatibility, long-term contact with the gums can easily turn black, affecting aesthetics, a few will cause gum bleeding, redness, allergic to metal materials, long time can cause gum atrophy; In addition, metal interferes with examinations such as MRI, affecting the examination results.
So, what are the specific disadvantages of steel dental crowns?

During the process of soaking shark fin, there are several points to note. First, shark fin should not be cooked for too long, generally not more than 3 hours, to avoid overcooking. Second, when eating shark fin, a good soup base must be matched, and the thickness and color of the soup must be mastered, so that the shark fin can be colorful, fragrant, and delicious. In addition, shark fin and fishy ingredients will destroy the fragrance of shark fin. Finally, the soaking steps are as follows: 1. Soak the shark fin in a clean utensil for 6-8 hours; 2. Take out the shark fin, brush it clean, and steam it on the steaming rack for half an hour; 3. Boil the shark fin with ginger, onion and wine for about ten minutes to remove the fishy smell, and let it cool naturally; 4. Pick out the fin needle and fin meat; 5. Soak the picked shark fin in ice water and put it in the refrigerator; 6. Successful soaking.
So, is there anything to pay attention to during this process?

When hiring a math tutor, you should consider the following points: First, it is especially important to guide children correctly in the early stages of learning and develop good habits. Secondly, when children have negative emotions, parents should first be calm, listen to the child's ideas, and then communicate with the teacher to understand the situation, and everyone can discuss solutions together. In addition, we should find the root cause and help the child solve the problem. For example, if the child does not want to do homework, is afraid of learning, or is afraid of teacher criticism, the root cause is mostly that the child does not know how to do it, does not know how to be afraid, and is afraid to resist. We should help children to improve their academic performance as much as possible. Furthermore, we should not just focus on which questions the child gets right or wrong, but should pay more attention to the habit of doing questions. For example, when the child is doing the questions, are there key words circled; when answering, are there traces of thinking left when answering; when checking, check with your fingers pointing, silently in your mind. Finally, we should help the child to be the best self, establish rules, and persist in completing daily tasks.

The so-called 'Priority Date' refers to the queue date for applying for a green card. If you are applying for immigration and need a labor certificate, the priority date is the date when the Department of Labor (DOL) receives the labor card application. If you don't need to apply for a labor certificate, the USCIS (U.S. Immigration Office) receipt date for professional immigration submission of I-140 and family immigration submission of I-130 is the priority date. When there are green card quotas (no need to queue), the priority date is not useful. But when there are no green card quotas and the queue begins, the priority date is very important for green card applicants. The earlier the priority date, the earlier you get the green card. Therefore, for prospective immigration applicants, don't hesitate, don't wait, start the green card application process as soon as possible, submit the I-140 immigration application as soon as possible, get approved as soon as possible, and get the I-140 priority date as soon as possible.
So how early should I apply?
