The maintenance of eyelash extensions mainly depends on personal care. Generally speaking, eyelash extensions can last for a month, and if the care is done correctly, they can even last for two months without falling off. The key to maintaining eyelash extensions is to avoid high temperature and humid environments within 6 hours after grafting, because the special glue for beautiful eyelashes is not completely cured at this time, and touching water will make the eyelashes easy to fall off, and it may also make the glue easy to whiten. When washing your face, try to use non-oily facial cleanser, don't burden the eyelashes, don't rub it casually, don't rub the eyelashes, you should wash it horizontally from above the eyelid. Don't directly face the eyes when taking a shower, strong water pressure will cause the eyelashes to deform and fall off early. After washing your face, start from the top of the eyelid and gently press to wipe off the water. Be careful not to let the fibers of the towel hook the eyelashes. You can dry the remaining water with a hair dryer, or absorb it with a napkin. When taking care of the skin, use a cotton pad to apply toner, and pay attention when patting around the eyelashes. When making up, try to use a softer eyeliner liquid pen or eyeliner liquid, when eyeshadow or foundation is attached to the eyelashes, you should wipe it with a wet paper towel. When sleeping, don't sleep on your stomach, sleeping on your stomach or eyelashes against the pillow, prolonged pressure will deform the eyelashes. It may also break or fall off, it is recommended to sleep back as much as possible. When the grafted eyelashes fall off half, the remaining eyelashes are not well shaped. At this time, don't pull it off by yourself. Forcibly removing it will damage the original eyelashes. Be sure to find a professional eyelash stylist to remove it!
Oh, I see. Is it difficult to maintain these styles?

The rules of playing mahjong are as follows: First, you need to understand the basic rules of mahjong, including the names of the combination of tiles, such as pair, kong, sequence, etc. Then, you need to recognize the tiles, including 1-9 'tiao', 1-9 'wan', 1-9 'tong', red, green, white, east, south, west, north, each tile has 4 pieces, a total of 136 pieces. Next, you need to arrange the tiles, arrange in a row of 17 tiles, two rows up and down. Then, you need to draw tiles, each person draws four tiles, takes turns drawing three times, the first person to draw skips two tiles, the other three each draw one tile, then flip a 'hun' (hun can replace any tile). Finally, you need to know how to win, including small drop flow, hun adjustment, drop flow dragon, hun adjustment dragon, pairs dragon, catch five, catch three, 13 unique, pung, kong, the function of hun, etc.
Then how do you play mahjong?

There are indeed some risks in squeezing comedones. Firstly, when acne appears on the face, we cannot squeeze it by hand, because this may cause local skin surface damage, leading to inflammation or scars. Secondly, the action of squeezing is not only to squeeze out the keratin plug, due to the reaction force, some keratin plugs will be squeezed back into the deeper hair follicles, re-blocking the hair follicles, that is, the more you squeeze, the more serious the hair follicle blockage will be, and more comedones will grow. In addition, it is not recommended to handle it by yourself. Firstly, it is difficult to thoroughly disinfect at home, increasing the chance of infection. If the operation is improper, it may cause further damage to the skin, and even leave ugly acne pits and marks. Afterwards, if anti-inflammatory treatment is not performed on the skin, bacteria are likely to spread and contaminate other skin, causing inflammation. Lastly, the process of squeezing hurts the stratum corneum, destroys the skin barrier, leads to fiber breakage, collagen loss, and is extremely painful. The skin appears a series of skin aging problems such as “wrinkles, loosening, and large pores”, and extremely causes sensitive skin, redness, red blood streaks, and leaves acne marks and pits; it may also aggravate inflammation, or infection, leading to more severe acne; multiple treatments are required, and recurrence is possible.
Will there be any side effects doing this?

Hair dyeing indeed has certain damage to the hair. Firstly, frequent and long-term hair dyeing can cause harm to the hair and even the body, including dry, rough and falling hair. This is because the peroxidation reaction caused by the infiltration of aniline and other metal substances into the hair follicle causes hair breakage. Secondly, 5% of the hair dyeing population will have an allergic reaction to aniline, and a short-term large dose of aniline may cause acute poisoning and result in methemoglobinemia. In addition, the disadvantages of hair dyeing also include hair damage, color minefield (such as black, red, purple), color fading problem, and difficult to match with clothes. Therefore, if you are concerned about the damage to the hair, you can consider choosing some natural hair dyes, or try to avoid frequent hair dyeing.

The method of using toothpaste and white vinegar to remove yellow stains is effective for most types of yellow stains, but it may not be suitable for all situations. For example, if the white clothes have been worn for a long time and have turned yellow, you can try using toothpaste, baking soda, white vinegar, and laundry detergent, and then soak the clothes in hot water. In addition, if the white clothes have mold, you can try adding toothpaste, table salt, white vinegar, and laundry powder to the basin, stir evenly with warm water, soak and scrub for five minutes. If the white collar sweat stains have turned yellow, you can try pouring baking soda, white vinegar, and hot water into the basin, soak and scrub for half an hour, the clothes will be immediately clean. However, if the white clothes have oil stains, you need to use alcohol and laundry detergent to scrub the oil stains, and then clean normally. If the white clothes have blood stains, you can directly soak with hydrogen peroxide, or scrub with hot water, clean with table salt and white vinegar. If the white clothes have been worn for a long time and have turned yellow, you can put in baking soda, toothpaste, table salt, and laundry detergent, soak the clothes in warm water for 20 minutes before cleaning. If the white clothes have fruit juice or tea stains, you can put a spoonful of explosion salt, rinse with 60-degree warm water, soak for an hour and a half to clean. If the clothes fade too seriously, you can add some table salt and beer to the basin, soak for half an hour, the clothes will be as good as new. If you're worried about mixing colors when washing clothes, you can add table salt and white vinegar to the water.
Is this method applicable to all yellow stains?

After hemorrhoid surgery, there may be some complications. These include edema, which is the most common complication after surgery, especially for women. The main solution is to reduce the force of defecation, walk less every day, eat more green bean soup and winter melon, combined with medication and sitz baths, it still gets better quickly. There may also be granulation, which is the growth of granulation tissue after surgery. The main solution is to stay away from pig's feet and mutton, eat some other meats, and eat more whole grains and fruits. In addition, there may be false healing, which is when the wound does not show the normal healing process. The main solution is to persist in letting your attending doctor check. There may also be narrowing or stenosis of the anus, which is related to the ability of the chief surgeon. The main solution is to find a good doctor, if there is, you can try to expand and maintain good stools, good stools can play a role in expansion. There may also be eczema or dryness, which is mainly caused by being too dry or too wet. The main solution is to clean properly, first dab with a wet tissue, then dab with a dry tissue, do not use a hair dryer or fan, let it air dry for 2-3 minutes, then apply medicine or dress. If you are a sweaty person, in order to avoid smothering, after the medicine is absorbed (about 1-2 hours), remove the excess medicine. There may also be drug rash, which is mainly caused by an allergy to a certain drug, the main solution is to change it in time. There may also be inflammation, the cause is unknown, the main solution is to go for a follow-up check. There may also be scar hyperplasia, which is not common, if you are prone to scarring, remember to communicate with the doctor before surgery.
What might one face after hemorrhoid surgery?

The method of performing dumbbell curls is as follows: First, sit on a bench, lean your upper body slightly forward and slightly to one side, hold the dumbbell with one hand with the palm up. The arm holding the dumbbell is stretched at the back above the knee joint and supported on the inner side of the thigh. The other hand is placed on the other thigh as support. Then, lift the dumbbell by bending the elbow joint, keep the upper body still, then move back to the starting position. The whole movement process must be slow and controlled. During the action, ensure that the idle hand is placed on the thigh and used to support the body, thereby reducing the pressure on the spine area. The specific action steps are: Rotate the upper arm fully outward, keep it close to the body and fixed, palm facing forward, contract the biceps, curl the forearm upward, exhale inward. Until the bicep is fully contracted, the dumbbell reaches shoulder height.
How is dumbbell curl performed?

Yes, the air defrost device needs regular maintenance. First of all, the air source heat pump dual supply is a highly automated device, and we need to correctly turn on the air source heat pump and check the status of the unit regularly during use to improve the efficiency and life of the device. Secondly, the air source heat pump discharges a large amount of defrosting water during heating. The pipe position of the defrosting water should be designed reasonably, and the defrosting water should be cleaned regularly and promptly during use. If the defrosting water pipe is not handled well after defrosting, it may cause the water after defrosting to flow to the ground. When the weather is cold, it will freeze quickly, which will not only inconvenience users' travel, but also damage the unit. Therefore, when encountering this situation, users should clean up in time and solve the drainage problem with the help of after-sales personnel to eliminate hidden dangers. Finally, if frost forms at the bottom of the evaporator, it may be that the bottom of the main unit, the defrosting water drainage is not smooth, the bottom of the water is too much, causing the bottom to freeze and ice. You can manually defrost to remove the debris at the bottom and make it drain smoothly. If frost forms on both sides of the evaporator, it may be that the temperature sensor of the evaporator is broken and the temperature cannot be detected. You can replace it with the after-sales service of the manufacturer.
Does the air defrost device need regular maintenance?

To adjust the mirror to better observe the straight line, you can follow these steps: First, find the door handle of the left front door in the rearview mirror, and adjust it to the lower right corner of the rearview mirror. Then, find the door handle of the right front door in the rearview mirror, and adjust it to the lower left corner of the mirror. In this way, the visual blind area is the smallest. Next, you can adjust the rearview mirror according to the following proportions: The body occupies 1/4 of the mirror surface, the ground and the sky each occupy 1/2. This can reduce the blind area of ​​the sight, making the driving safer. For the right rearview mirror, you can adjust it so that the body occupies 1/4 of the mirror surface, the sky occupies 1/3 of the mirror surface, and the ground occupies 2/3 of the mirror surface. This can make the sight effect of the right rearview mirror better. Finally, adjust the central rearview mirror to be able to see the entire rear windshield.

When using massage oil, you can pour the massage oil into the palm of one hand, and then rub it into the hands of the massage object. Both hands are facing up, and the little finger of one hand slides between the ring finger and little finger of the massage object, and the little finger of the other hand slides between the thumb and index finger of the massage object. Then, gently stretch the five fingers of the massage object to open its palm. Then use two thumbs to massage the center of the massage object's palm and gently transition to the wrist. Next, turn the palm of the massage object down, hold one finger at a time, hold it tightly and gently pull it twice, do not make the knuckles sound. When pulling the fingers of the massage object, the thumb and index finger of the masseuse gently slide over the front of the massage object's fingers and make a slapping sound. This can clear the tension that may accumulate in the masseuse's fingers and relax both hands.

Yes, you can migrate WeChat chat history. WeChat has a built-in migration function, which can solve your problem with one click. According to the actual situation, directly [Start] or click [Migrate specified chat history only] to select important chat records for migration. Finally, at this time, a QR code will appear on the page. According to the page prompts, log in to WeChat on the new phone and scan the code to start the migration. The main manifestations are abdominal distension, stomach discomfort, less urine, etc. If it gradually worsens, you should go to the hospital immediately. If you want to create a mountain model, you can follow these steps: First, stack the main mountain body with foam boards and foam blocks, using white latex for bonding. Wait for the glue to dry before proceeding to the next step. Next, mix plaster powder with water to a thick consistency, dip in a non-woven fabric (or facial tissue) into the plaster water and spread it on the mountain for shaping. Wait for the plaster to dry in 1~2 days before proceeding to the next step. Then, use acrylic paint or plasticine to make the color of the land, coloring the mountain. My first layer of color is earth yellow, wait for the first layer of paint to dry before applying the second layer of paint. My second layer of color is made of gray + yellow plasticine. Then, place vehicles of different sizes to see how big a car can match the mountain, so as to determine the scale of the model pieces. I used 1:100 and 1:200 cars for comparison, and found that the 1:200 car looks more suitable from the perspective of scale, so the scale of other model pieces can be determined as 1:200. Then, use a special model water maker to make a lake: first apply a layer of white latex evenly on the bottom of the lake, this is to protect the reefs and sand made before the bottom of the lake. After the white latex is completely dry, start applying water maker. The first layer I used is blue water maker, with an application thickness of about 2mm. After the water maker is completely dry, apply a second layer of colorless water maker, with a thickness of about 3mm. To speed up the drying of these layers, I used a hair dryer, the highest gear, hot air, to blow dry. Then, use dark gray acrylic paint or plasticine to draw the road on the mountain. After drying, draw the traffic lines on it. Then, apply model glue or white latex on the mountain, then sprinkle grass powder. I used a mixture of hay color and summer green grass powder. Let the grass powder naturally stick to the mountain. No need to specifically stick to a certain part. This makes the effect more realistic. Finally, install the well-made bridge model on the mountain model and take care of the details at the connection. Use the remaining dark gray paint to draw the tunnel and install 1:200 model trees and cars for decoration. The work is done.
How should I proceed if I want to create a mountain model?

To operate the small servo motor to make the eyes move, you can use PLC pulse control servo motor. Simply put, this is to control the movement of the servo motor by the pulse signal sent out by PLC (Programmable Logic Controller). PLC is a computer specifically used for industrial control, with high reliability and strong anti-interference ability. And the servo motor is a device that can convert the input pulse signal into mechanical movement. The combination of servo motor and PLC is like a pair of golden partners. They can achieve various complex movements and operations according to our needs. Servo motor as a high-precision control motor, has been widely used in various industries. Generally, there are three control scene modes for servo motor in the application process, namely position mode, speed mode, and torque mode. Position mode (such as using servo motor for positioning control) can use the pulse mode, by controlling the total amount of pulses output by the upper controller, to control the position of the servo motor. Speed mode (such as using third-party motion controller and servo motor for closed-loop control) can be realized by controlling the pulse speed, analog input, bus, etc. Torque mode (such as using servo motor to control bolt tightening machine) is generally used in scenes where strict control of output torque is required. In addition, there are four control methods of servo drive: 1. Control the servo through IO 2. Pulse control through PLC 3. Bus mode through PLC 4. Control through analog voltage.
How should I operate the small servo motor to make the eyes move?

What are the considerations for the layout of the children's room

When installing a secondary drainage pipe in the bathroom, you need to pay special attention to the following points: First, secondary drainage is an emergency drainage method, mainly to prevent leakage of pipes buried in the sunken box-type bathroom or seepage of the ground to the downstairs owner. Second, you need to lay pipes according to personal needs and apartment layout, but be careful not to damage the original waterproof layer when laying pipes. The pipe layout is just to build a simple frame, the ground needs to be leveled, and then a waterproof layer is made. You can do secondary drainage next to the main sewage pipe, so that the accumulated water of the secondary drainage can be drained along the main sewage pipe. In order to facilitate the smooth flow of accumulated water into the secondary drainage, the ground of the sunken layer needs to be sloped, so the place of the secondary drainage hole should be lower, and other places should be gradually raised. If the waterproof layer of the sunken wall is damaged, it needs to be repaired, leveled, and then a waterproof layer is made on the leveled surface. You can make some grids to support the bathroom floor, or you can use ceramic particles for backfilling, directly overhead, both methods are possible. Of course, many people use mortar. In addition, if the bathroom sets up secondary drainage, water is left in the mortar layer or the sunken box, and it is not drained in time, it may cause damp walls, and after a long time, it will seep into the water, which will cause the wall to powder or fall off. If the secondary drainage work is not done well, it may cause the waterproofing of the sunken layer to fail, and it will cause leakage to the downstairs. After that, the repair is relatively difficult, such as the need to smash the floor tiles, so the cost will be relatively large. Some masters will make secondary drainage at the position of the floor drain, which is simply a fault with drainage. This is one of the main channels for flooding the mortar layer.
What do I need to pay special attention to?

When choosing whether to use sealant or beautifying agent, you need to consider the following factors. First, the beautifying agent is hard glue, and the vibration of the window may cause it to crack. However, beauty glue is soft glue with certain elasticity, which can effectively prevent the edge of the window from cracking. Secondly, the beautifying agent is a hard glue, it dries harder, and the window is often opened and closed and undergoes sunlight oxidation. After wind and rain vibration, the beautifying agent will crack, affecting the sealing effect and beauty. Therefore, it is recommended to use soft glue such as structural glue or good home Wacker beauty glue sealing edge glue, which is more environmentally friendly, anti-mold and durable. In addition, if the window frame seal uses a beautifying agent, it may fall off due to the vibration of the window. Therefore, it is recommended to use anti-mildew material Tian Dong polyurea. Finally, for the edge sealing of doors and windows, bathroom cabinets, toilets, kitchen countertops, it is recommended to use glass glue, because glass glue is mildew and waterproof, environmentally friendly and odorless, the use effect is better.
So how should I choose?

Gum tumors are caused by a variety of factors. Firstly, factors like tartar attached between the gums and teeth, defective tooth roots, and poor restorations, which repeatedly (mechanically or inflammatory) stimulate the local gums, can lead to the formation of gum tumors. Secondly, it is also related to endocrine factors. For example, pregnant mothers with high hormone levels in their bodies are likely to grow gum tumors between 4~9 months of pregnancy, but after giving birth, as the hormone levels return to normal, the gum tumors will shrink and stop growing. In addition, local inflammatory stimulation is also a cause of gum tumors. There is a large amount of plaque and calculus deposited in the oral cavity, or food is often embedded in the adjacent surfaces of the teeth, these factors can cause gum tumors. Lastly, hormone changes in young women after pregnancy may cause tumor-like proliferations on the gums. This type of gum tumor has a specific term and is called a pregnancy tumor.
What causes gum tumors?

The strokes and structure of the character '故' mainly have the following points: Firstly, the character '故' is narrow on the left and wide on the right, the final stroke should be the lowest and furthest to the right, and should not be written short. Secondly, pay attention to the starting point of the short vertical and short slant, the positions of the two short horizontal lines are basically level, and the starting point of the short vertical is slightly high. In addition, the spacing between the three horizontal strokes at the bottom should be equal. The horizontal line in '古' is short, and the '口' is directly facing the upper vertical line, and the size is appropriate. The horizontal stroke of '攵' starts at the bottom of the upper slant, and the lower slant starts at the left end of the short horizontal line; the slant ends in a dot. Finally, the horizontal line in the character '古', the left side is longer, with a certain degree of tilt; the intersection on the right side is in the middle, and the arc of the two pens, I suggest that the lower arc of the slant is larger, and the dot is well written into the slant of the cursive script.
So how should the strokes and structure of the character '故' be written?

These complications of painless childbirth are relatively rare in clinical practice, and do not have a significant impact on most mothers. Even if some complications occur, they are within a controllable range and the price is much smaller compared to the smooth progress of childbirth.

When choosing sound insulation strips, you can consider the following types. First, there are independent foam materials, continuous foam materials, and semi-independent foam materials. The independent foam material has many independent bubbles inside, and gas and liquid cannot pass through, such as foam swimming boards or foam packaging. The continuous foam material has a connected bubble structure, and gas and liquid can pass through, such as dishwashing sponges and sound-absorbing sponge wall stickers. It has good resilience and can be squeezed. Some gap strips on the market use this material. The semi-independent foam material combines the two bubble structures of the independent foam material and the continuous foam material, gas and liquid cannot pass through, and it also has a certain resilience, such as soft EPDM foam, which can insulate heat, reduce vibration and waterproof when filling gaps. Secondly, there are two types of sound insulation strips on the market: rubber sound insulation strips and wool sound insulation strips. Most merchants will use synthetic rubber sound insulation strips, which are easy to harden and age after a long time. The wool sound insulation strip will lose hair after a long time, losing its sealing property. To prevent aging and maintain toughness, you need to choose natural rubber sound insulation strips, which are not easy to age and have higher toughness.
I would like to know what kind of sound insulation strip is good?

Excessive cooling can cause various problems. Firstly, due to the stimulation of cold air, the autonomic function of the human body may become disordered, disrupting the normal rhythm of intestinal movement and causing an imbalance in gastric acid secretion. This can easily lead to heartburn, acid reflux, bloating, abdominal pain, and other gastrointestinal diseases. Secondly, cold air can cause the blood vessels of the gastrointestinal mucosa to contract, leading to ischemia and hypoxia of the gastrointestinal mucosa, reducing nutrient supply, weakening the defense barrier of the gastrointestinal mucosa, and causing gastrointestinal discomfort. In addition, in order to resist the cold, blood is redistributed, reducing the blood supply to the stomach and intestines and decreasing their function. Finally, for the elderly, especially those with multiple chronic diseases, cold weather can easily lead to colds, coughs, rhinitis, and other diseases. The probability of elderly people suffering from stroke, paralysis, and cerebral hemorrhage in winter is twice that in summer. Elderly people with a history of high blood pressure are likely to have sudden increases in blood pressure due to sudden drops in temperature, which can easily lead to stroke and cerebral thrombosis if not detected in time. For the elderly, a sudden drop in temperature can put a great burden on the heart, which can induce angina and, in severe cases, cause myocardial infarction, endangering life.
Why can't the body be cooled too much?

Any medical cosmetic procedure may be accompanied by some side effects. For hyaluronic acid fillers, possible side effects include local reactions such as redness, swelling, bruising, pain or fever, which usually occur after injection and are temporary. Some people may be sensitive or allergic to hyaluronic acid, causing allergic reactions, such as skin itching, swelling, hives, etc. Nodules may form at the injection site, these nodules may require surgical intervention. Asymmetrical results may occur during the filling process, requiring additional corrections. Any injection process carries a risk of infection, although this situation is relatively rare. In rare cases, injection may lead to scar formation. In extreme cases, injection may cause vascular occlusion, leading to tissue necrosis. This is a serious but rare complication. Overall, hyaluronic acid fillers are considered safe and reliable. Hyaluronic acid itself rarely causes adverse reactions, the main problems occur during the injection process, there may be local fatigue, swelling, small hematomas, nodules, sensory allergies and other short-term problems. These usually recover in a very short time. There are also some more serious adverse reactions, such as hypersensitivity reactions, but this situation is very rare. In addition, over-injection may cause vascular compression, leading to local necrosis. There are also reports of foreign body reactions after injection, forming local small nodules, but these problems can be effectively dealt with through pathological examination.
It sounds very effective, are there any side effects to using hyaluronic acid?

The steps to wash a baby's clothes are as follows: Firstly, soak in about 40 degrees warm water for half an hour. Then, add baby laundry detergent and soak for another 15 minutes. Next, gently rub. It should be noted that adding boiling water directly to scald is wrong, because boiling water scalding will harden the baby's clothes. Soaking with salt is also wrong, because salt cannot kill the residual substances on the surface of clothes. Mixing adult and child clothes is also wrong, because there are many bacteria on the surface of adult clothes.
How should the baby's clothes be washed?

Simple operating system, the system should be easy to use, preferably with features such as large fonts and simple mode to facilitate the operation of the elderly. 6. Loud sound, the sound of the phone should be loud enough to ensure clear call sound and ringtone, especially for the elderly with hard of hearing. 7. Screen comfort, the screen should not be dazzling. You can consider choosing an LCD screen model with eye protection effect or an OLED screen that supports high-frequency PWM dimming. 8. There are several ways to solve the problems of electrical noise and poor contact. First, for electrical noise, you can try to ground the device shell through the wire, replace with well-shielded wire, or use an equalizer to cut off audio below 60Hz. For poor contact, usually caused by poor shielding of the audio line, you should use well-shielded twisted pair. In addition, you can try to keep the amplifier away, use software to reduce noise or eliminate sizzling sound in post-processing, or use high-end pickups. If it is line induction, you should use well-shielded shielding lines. If it is mobile phone interference, remember not to put the mobile phone near the recording equipment when recording. If it is monitor interference, keep the speaker and microphone away from the monitor. If it is monitor line frequency crosstalk, you can only temporarily turn off the monitor power during recording. If it is host interference, you can change power supply or motherboard and other hardware. Finally, if it is distortion, it is generally caused by too high recording amplification gain, the sound source microphone is too close, etc.
How can these problems be solved?

Yes, your symptoms may indicate seborrheic dermatitis. Seborrheic dermatitis is a chronic dermatitis that recurs and may last for decades. It favors two groups of people, one is infants from 2 weeks to 12 months old, and the other is adolescents and adults. Seborrheic dermatitis manifests as oily erythema, and the surface may have yellow crusts. Facial seborrheic dermatitis can affect the forehead, nasolabial folds, cheeks, eyebrows and between the eyebrows, etc., where sebum is secreted. It can be painless and itchless, or it may have mild itching. Having seborrheic dermatitis does not mean that it can never be cured. As long as you seek medical treatment in time, follow the doctor's advice, and actively cooperate with the treatment, smooth and healthy skin will come back.

Deep breathing is a simple but effective relaxation technique. The correct method is to place one hand on your heart and the other on your abdomen. As you exhale, pull your belly button towards your spine, just like blowing out birthday candles. Feel the hand on your abdomen slide back to its original position. Repeat three to five times, noting how you feel after each time.

When an electric current flows through a resistor, the current will do work and convert electrical energy into other forms of energy, which is the basic principle of resistance wire converting electrical energy into thermal energy. Specifically, this process is based on Joule's Law, which states that the heat generated by the current passing through the conductor is directly proportional to the square of the current, directly proportional to the resistance of the conductor, and directly proportional to the time of power supply. In other words, when the current is large, the heat generated is directly proportional to the square of the current, so a large amount of Joule heat will be generated in a very short time. In addition, electrical energy is converted into the internal energy of the resistance wire, causing the temperature of the resistance wire to rise. For pure resistive circuits, electrical energy is almost all converted into internal energy, and the heat generated by the resistance is equal to the work done by the current. In practical applications, such as electric heating plates, their working principle is based on the resistive heating effect. They include a resistance wire or resistance element. When the current passes, the resistance element will heat up and generate heat. This heat is transferred to the target object through conduction, convection or radiation, causing it to heat up.
How does the resistance wire convert electrical energy into thermal energy

Integrated Pest Management (IPM) is a holistic approach to pest risk management that uses preemptive control measures. It requires a combination of exceptional pest practices, including good hygiene procedures, and broad supervision. The benefits of IPM include early checks on potential pest problems, which can reduce pest risk. Monitoring pest trends can help determine the correct use of pesticides. Accurate identification and monitoring of pests are conducive to the correct deployment of maintenance plans. Reducing pest disturbances to daily operations and avoiding introducing new pests to the site are also important benefits of IPM. In the field of hydroponics, IPM is an eco-friendly approach that combines various pest management techniques to minimize harm. It includes regular monitoring and identification of plants for signs of pests, biological control, cultural practices, physical barriers, quarantine procedures, and chemical control. The benefits of IPM in hydroponics include environmental protection, economic efficiency, healthy crops, and sustainable agriculture.
What is Integrated Pest Management?

Excessive sweating in pregnant women is a normal phenomenon. One reason is that pregnant women have increased basal metabolism during pregnancy, will emit more heat, so the basal body temperature will be higher than before pregnancy, and heat resistance is worse than before pregnancy. Another reason is that the fetus needs growth and development, pregnant women will intake more energy, coupled with the increase in pregnancy hormones, will cause pregnant women's fat and blood circulation to increase accordingly, resulting in an increase in their own basal body temperature, and the situation of sweating will become more. In addition, the body burden increases after pregnancy, and you will sweat a lot with a little movement, which is also a normal phenomenon. Pregnant women can do appropriate exercise to enhance their physique. However, if the pregnant woman's mood is not good, sleep is not good, sweats a lot, and the body is weak, these will affect the baby. Therefore, pregnant women need to pay attention to their own physical condition and maintain a good mood and sufficient rest.
Does a pregnant woman's excessive sweating affect the fetus?

The range of books collected by Zhuanzhuan is relatively wide, and the purchase price is a bit higher, but there are quality audit requirements, such as damage, stains, yellowing of book pages, etc. will affect the actual price. If the book does not pass the audit, it needs to be retrieved at your own expense. In addition, Baijingyu is a public welfare mini-program on Alipay, if you don't want to sell books as waste paper, you can consider using this mini-program to donate. Finally, all recycled books will be sent to the recycling processing center uniformly, and will be accepted and initially classified according to the dimensions of genuine and pirated versions, and book quality (damage, mold, yellowing), etc., and the accepted books will be refurbished, disinfected, and packaged After that, it will be recycled again and start the next journey.

There are indeed some special requirements for hydroponic Spathiphyllum. First of all, Spathiphyllum hydroponics does not have high requirements for containers, but it is best to use transparent glass containers, so that the roots of Spathiphyllum can get better light and observe the growth situation. Secondly, Spathiphyllum hydroponics has higher requirements for water quality. If the water is not changed for a long time, it is easy to breed bacteria in the water and the nutrients are limited, which affects the growth of Spathiphyllum. Generally, the water is changed every five days. In addition, place the hydroponic Spathiphyllum in a bright diffused light indoors, avoid overly shaded maintenance environment, so as not to affect flowering. Spathiphyllum hydroponics is afraid of freezing, the winter maintenance temperature should not be lower than 10 degrees Celsius, and shading measures should be taken to cool down when it exceeds 35 degrees Celsius in summer. Keep the water level not over half of the root system, change the water in time when the water is turbid, and replenish the water in time when the water is insufficient. Each time you change the water, you can add 2-3 drops of nutrient solution to the water to provide nutrients. But fertilization should not be too much, so as not to cause Spathiphyllum root rot. Regularly prune dead leaves and excessively long root systems to promote plant growth. Pay attention to observe the growth of Spathiphyllum, and deal with pests and diseases in time to prevent spreading. During the maintenance process, pay attention to gradually adapt to different environments and avoid sudden changes in maintenance conditions.
Are there any special requirements for hydroponic Spathiphyllum?

Oxytocin has some side effects. Firstly, when the mother uses oxytocin, she may experience a situation where the drip speed is too fast, causing too much absorption of the drug. This can cause the mother to have rigid and spasmodic uterine contractions. These contractions can adversely affect the birth of the fetus, easily thinning the lower part of the mother's uterus, causing heavy bleeding, affecting oxygen supply, and causing the fetus to be hypoxic. Secondly, after using oxytocin, the time of uterine contractions will increase, and the interval time will be shortened. Some mothers even have contractions without interval. This not only increases the woman's pain, but also adversely affects the blood circulation of the placenta. If you cannot give birth smoothly, it may cause the fetus to have acute intrauterine hypoxia, and even suffocate. This not only threatens the life of the fetus, but may also affect the child's intelligence in the future. In addition, when using oxytocin, if the fetal heart rate is too high, it may cause the baby to have an adverse reaction. Some mothers may even have uterine rupture when using oxytocin, which is dangerous for both mother and baby.
Does oxytocin have any side effects?

To use the dryer correctly, first of all, the dryer is mainly used for drying, and the drying effect is relatively good, suitable for clothes to be stored in the closet after drying. Secondly, the placement position of the dryer is very important, because the drying is mainly done by the tower-style air duct at the bottom of the machine body, which is exactly where the fan operates during drying. Therefore, when in use, the machine body must be placed on a stable table or countertop to work, and it is strictly forbidden to use it on carpets, sofas, quilts, clothes and other cloth items, because these cloth items will directly block the air inlet at the bottom, directly affecting the drying efficiency. In addition, the dryer should not be placed in a poorly ventilated place, because the gas discharged by the direct-row dryer contains moisture, this moisture will increase the humidity of the outside air, this moist air entering the dryer will affect the drying effect, easily prolonging the drying time or the drying is not thorough. Before or after each use of the dryer, clean the filter, you can clean the lint and other debris inside, otherwise, block the filter, affect the drying efficiency. Finally, do not open the door before the drying program ends, because the inside of the drum of the household clothes dryer will heat up during operation, if you open the door halfway, hot air will be released, which can easily cause burns.
So how can the dryer be used correctly?

The process of making mink fur is complex. First of all, cutting is a key step in the entire mink production. The male mink and female mink are equally precious mink fur materials, but some crafts and styles will be selectively made of fur in the production process. It should be noted that the cutting of fur clothing is different from the cutting of ordinary woven clothing. Due to the rarity of fur materials, it cannot be cut directly according to the paper pattern like the cutting of ordinary woven fabrics. Instead, it needs to be cut during the matching process to achieve the required length of the garment piece, while ensuring that the hair on the entire garment is even.

There are indeed some side effects of teeth correction. Common ones include dental mask face, black triangle, tooth demineralization and white spots, and root absorption. In addition, there may be other side effects such as yellowing teeth, retainer, etc. However, these side effects can be prevented and improved through some methods. For example, try to choose invisible dental braces, which can be worn and removed by yourself, you can chew normally, which can reduce muscle atrophy. After removing the dental braces, you can eat some slightly tough food to exercise the muscles and help restore the dental mask face. Chew gum stick exercise is also an effective method, bite from the left molar to the right molar, then from the right to the left, so that each tooth can be bitten, 5 sets each time, 20 times each set, 5 seconds between each set. In addition, slightly press the cheek, then clench the teeth and relax, repeat this 80 times each time, 3-5 sets a day, which can exercise the masticatory muscles.
What are the side effects of teeth correction?

There are many ways to edit a vlog. For example, you can use the Jianying APP, search for the template-alpaca, and add your favorite videos and pictures in chronological order. If you want to edit, you can also use the template's beat points, synchronize the template to the cloud backup draft on your mobile phone, and then adjust the position of the video and photos on the Jianying computer side. Another method is to use the FCPX plugin: BeatMark X, which can automatically mark the beat of the audio, automatically beat, and then import the beat audio material into Final Cut Pro to make a beat video according to the beat points. You can also start creating, click on the material library, search for cars, add a material of a car passing from the front. Select the video, click edit, select mirror, and the direction of the car is reversed. Move to the position where the rear of the car is about to come out; click picture-in-picture, import a video. Manually enlarge it until it covers the last page, put a keyframe at the beginning, and then click on the mask, select the linear mask. Align the line of the mask to -90 degrees, move to the far left, and align with the rear of the car. Pull a little feathering, it will transition more naturally. Don't turn off the mask, just drag the video backwards. As the car moves forward a bit, the line of the mask also moves a bit, just keep behind the car. After the car drives away, pull the line of the mask to the far right, the keyframe is automatically formed, recording the moving trajectory of the mask. Then turn the volume of the two videos to zero, click text, add copywriting, choose your favorite font. Adjust the font size and duration a bit, then click audio, add a piece of your favorite music.
How should I edit my vlog then?

If you want to change the background, you can use the following tools and presets in Adobe After Effects: 1. "Brightness Key" - for videos and images with a strong contrast in brightness and darkness. 2. "Color Key" - for videos and images with a solid color background, if there are flaws on the edge, you can use the "Simple Blocking" tool. 3. "Difference Mask" - if there are background images and video files, use the difference mask to subtract the same background video, the cropping effect may vary depending on the version of AE. 4. "Cropping-CC Sample(erase wire)" - can be used in videos or images with wires. 5. "Real Scene Cropping-Roto Brush" - used for real scene deduction. 6. "Keying-Keylight". In addition, you can also use the software property keylight (different versions will have different effects), follow these steps: 1. Screen Colour  Color suction, after suction. 2. View-Screen Matte: black and white display, white for not deducted, black for deducted, gray for translucent (not fully deducted). 3. Find the corresponding matte below, you can adjust the black to be blacker, the white to be whiter, and exclude the gray (shadow part). 4. Return to view-Final Result(final display). 5. If the video animation is moving, and there are places that are not fully deducted, you can adjust the screen color to a deeper color.
What if I want to change the background?

Choosing cat food mainly depends on your cat's physique and needs. First, you need to determine your budget, generally suggest choosing cat food that’s 25r/jin+. Then, you need to determine your cat's needs, such as malnutrition does not gain weight, you can choose fresh meat cat food with crude protein≥40%; picky eaters, you can choose freeze-dried cat food with good palatability; black chin/oily tail, you can choose low oil low salt baked cat food. When choosing, you need to check the ingredients, preferably meat-based, the top three ingredients are meat, the best is fresh meat, which has good nutritional value and fresh quality. In addition, you need to check the nutritional value, such as crude protein≥35%, crude fat between 15-20%, taurine≥0.2%, crude ash≤10%. You also need to check the added ingredients, avoid harmful additives such as a large amount of vegetable protein and vague meat, chemical appetizers such as sodium glutamate, flavor enhancers, sodium tripolyphosphate, pet composite seasonings, etc., and feed natural appetizers such as animal fats and oils, beer yeast, etc. Finally, you need to choose cat food based on the cat’s age, stomach, physique, etc.
So how should I choose? My cat is rather picky.

The measurement method of the skull top mainly involves two aspects. First, the skull top refers to the distance from the hairline to the top of the head when viewed from the front. If this distance is 1:1 with the distance from the hairline to the eyebrows, it is a high skull top. Secondly, the height of the skull top can be understood as the distance from the lowest point of the hairline to the highest point of the head when viewed from the front. In addition, there is a simple one-minute test method, which is to judge by the 【skull-face ratio】, which is fast and accurate.
